original: mkha' 'gro zhes bya ba ni rdo rje'i mkha' la gnas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro zhes bya ba ni rdo rje'i mkha' la gnas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The dakinis are so called because they abide in the vajra space.

original: yan lag kha'i gdong zhes bya ba ni kha ni byang chub kyi sems so //
analyzed: yan lag kha'i gdong zhes bya ba ni kha ni byang chub kyi sems so //
translated: The branch face is the face of the bodhicitta.

original: yan lag ni rtags gang la yod ba de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: yan lag ni rtags gang la yod ba de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The branch is that which has the sign, and is so called.

original: 'dab chags zhes bya ba ni de'i dbyibs nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dab chags zhes bya ba ni de'i dbyibs nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The bird is so called because of its shape.

original: za phong ces bya ba ni las mang po byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: za phong ces bya ba ni las mang po byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The beak is so called because it performs many functions.

original: mi zad sga sgrogs zhes bya ba ni ye shes kyi me sgrib par byed pas shin tu mi zad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi zad sga sgrogs zhes bya ba ni ye shes kyi me sgrib par byed pas shin tu mi zad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The indestructible beak is so called because it is extremely indestructible, since it obscures the fire of wisdom.

original: snying po can zhes bya ba ni brtan ba'i ngo bo khrag rgyu ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: snying po can zhes bya ba ni brtan ba'i ngo bo khrag rgyu ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The essence is so called because it is the nature of stability, since it is the flow of blood.

original: gsod byed ma zhes bya ba ni aa'i yi ge'i rjes su 'gro ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gsod byed ma zhes bya ba ni aa'i yi ge'i rjes su 'gro ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The killer is so called because it follows the letter A.

original: rdul ba zhes bya ba ni las kyis rlung dang yang dag par sbyor bas rdul ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rdul ba zhes bya ba ni las kyis rlung dang yang dag par sbyor bas rdul ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The dust is so called because it is dusty due to the correct conjunction of the karmic wind.

original: dbyangs dang zhes bya ba ni dus gnyis la yang rang dang 'os pa'i sgra byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: dbyangs dang zhes bya ba ni dus gnyis la yang rang dang 'os pa'i sgra byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: “Melody” is because it is the sound of the self-nature of both times.

original: dbyangs skyes dang zhes bya ba ni aa yig sgra thams cad kyi bdag las grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dbyangs skyes dang zhes bya ba ni aa yig sgra thams cad kyi bdag las grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “ Born from melody” is because the letter A is the source of all sounds.

original: sprin zhes bya ba ni ye shes kyi me'i sngon du rtag tu bas bsgribs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sprin zhes bya ba ni ye shes kyi me'i sngon du rtag tu bas bsgribs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “ Cloud” is because it is always covered by the fire of wisdom.

original: chu ba zhes bya ba ni padma can bzhin du byang chub kyi sems la khyab pa nyid kyis kyang de bzhin du sems kyi khams kyi rnam par rtog pa sa ma gos pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: chu ba zhes bya ba ni padma can bzhin du byang chub kyi sems la khyab pa nyid kyis kyang de bzhin du sems kyi khams kyi rnam par rtog pa sa ma gos pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: “ Stem” is because it pervades the bodhicitta like a lotus, and in the same way, the element of mind is not covered by the concepts of the stages.

original: sdong bu can dang zhes bya ba ni lte ba'i padma la sdong bu'i rnam par gnas pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: sdong bu can dang zhes bya ba ni lte ba'i padma la sdong bu'i rnam par gnas pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: “ Stem-holder” is because it is located in the navel lotus in the form of a stem.

original: sngo ba zhes bya ba ni du ba'i mdog can nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: sngo ba zhes bya ba ni du ba'i mdog can nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: “ Blue” is because it has the color of smoke.

original: yud tsam zhes bya ba ni rno ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yud tsam zhes bya ba ni rno ba'i phyir ro //
translated: “ Instant” is because it is sharp.

original: yud tsam skyes zhes bya ba ni yud tsam aa yig gi rnam pa las skyes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yud tsam skyes zhes bya ba ni yud tsam aa yig gi rnam pa las skyes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Born for a moment means born from the syllable a in the aspect of a moment.

original: rgyab tu kha bltas zhes bya ba ni 'og tu rgyu ba nyid kyi phyin ci log ba'i gdong ngo //
analyzed: rgyab tu kha bltas zhes bya ba ni 'og tu rgyu ba nyid kyi phyin ci log ba'i gdong ngo //
translated: Facing backward means the face is turned away because it moves below.

original: dbyug pa dang zhes bya ba ni dbyug pa ltar shin tu drang ba'i rnam pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: dbyug pa dang zhes bya ba ni dbyug pa ltar shin tu drang ba'i rnam pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Like a club means it has the aspect of being very straight, like a club.

original: dbyug snyems dang zhes bya ba ni dbyug pa ltar snyems pa drang ba'i rnam pa gang la yod ba de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: dbyug snyems dang zhes bya ba ni dbyug pa ltar snyems pa drang ba'i rnam pa gang la yod ba de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: Like a club-conceit means it has the aspect of being straight and conceited, like a club.

original: rnying pa nyid dang zhes bya ba ni yang dang yang du rang dang 'os pa'i khams rgyu ba nyid kyis sra ba nyid kyis sra ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rnying pa nyid dang zhes bya ba ni yang dang yang du rang dang 'os pa'i khams rgyu ba nyid kyis sra ba nyid kyis sra ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Old age means it is hard because it moves again and again in its own appropriate element.

original: tshigs kyi lto dang @127a * //
analyzed: tshigs kyi lto dang @127a * //
translated: The cavity of the joints

original: zhes bya ba ni ldud pa'i dbyibs can nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ldud pa'i dbyibs can nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: means it has the shape of a cavity.

original: tshigs kyi mgo bo zhes bya ba ni tshigs kyi rnam pa'i mdog dang ldan pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: tshigs kyi mgo bo zhes bya ba ni tshigs kyi rnam pa'i mdog dang ldan pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The head of the joints means it has the color of the aspect of the joints.

original: tshigs kyi tshad dang zhes bya ba ni gdu bu'i dbyibs kyi rnam pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: tshigs kyi tshad dang zhes bya ba ni gdu bu'i dbyibs kyi rnam pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The measure of the joints is the shape of the bracelet.

original: pha rol gnon pa zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi rnam pa rnam par gnon pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: pha rol gnon pa zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi rnam pa rnam par gnon pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The hero is the conqueror of the forms of others.

original: tshigs kyi gnas zhes bya ba ni rtsa gsum gyi mdud pa la dmigs nas gnas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshigs kyi gnas zhes bya ba ni rtsa gsum gyi mdud pa la dmigs nas gnas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The place of the joints is the place of the three channels.

original: tshigs kyi gdong zhes bya ba ni mdud pa'i gdong ngo //
analyzed: tshigs kyi gdong zhes bya ba ni mdud pa'i gdong ngo //
translated: The face of the joints is the face of the knot.

original: tshigs kyi 'od ces bya ba ni de bzhin du rnal 'byor pa la gsal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshigs kyi 'od ces bya ba ni de bzhin du rnal 'byor pa la gsal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The light of the joints is the light of the knot.

original: tshigs kyis khyab pa zhes bya ba ni bar bar du mdud pas khyab pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshigs kyis khyab pa zhes bya ba ni bar bar du mdud pas khyab pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The pervasion of the joints is the pervasion of the knot.

original: dul bar byed pa zhes bya ba ni rlung rgyu bar byed pa nyid kyis so //
analyzed: dul bar byed pa zhes bya ba ni rlung rgyu bar byed pa nyid kyis so //
translated: The pacifier is the one who causes the winds to move.

original: dul 'gro zhes bya ba ni dul ba'i ngo bos rnam par rtog pa thams cad zad par byed pas de aa'i yi ge la 'gro ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dul 'gro zhes bya ba ni dul ba'i ngo bos rnam par rtog pa thams cad zad par byed pas de aa'i yi ge la 'gro ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The one who goes to peace is the one who goes to the letter A, because he causes the exhaustion of all concepts by the nature of peace.

original: gzi brjid dang zhes bya ba ni ye shes kyi me'i snang ba la brten nas gnas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzi brjid dang zhes bya ba ni ye shes kyi me'i snang ba la brten nas gnas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “Splendor” means that it abides in dependence on the light of the fire of intuition.

original: dri med ces bya ba ni sngags sreg pa'i dus su'o //
analyzed: dri med ces bya ba ni sngags sreg pa'i dus su'o //
translated: “Stainless” means at the time of the fire sacrifice.

original: dul ba'i snyems pa dang zhes bya ba ni aa'i yi ge dul ba'i ngo bo la brten nas nga rgyal dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dul ba'i snyems pa dang zhes bya ba ni aa'i yi ge dul ba'i ngo bo la brten nas nga rgyal dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “Subdued conceit” means that it is endowed with pride in dependence on the letter A, which is the nature of the subdued.

original: chun 'phyang zhes bya ba ni chun po thams cad 'phyang ba'i phyir ro /
analyzed: chun 'phyang zhes bya ba ni chun po thams cad 'phyang ba'i phyir ro /
translated: “Hanging tassels” means that all the tassels hang down.

original: chun 'phyang dga' zhes bya ba ni rtsa'i bdag nyid kyi chun 'phyang gi ngo bo nyid la dga' ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chun 'phyang dga' zhes bya ba ni rtsa'i bdag nyid kyi chun 'phyang gi ngo bo nyid la dga' ba'i phyir ro //
translated: “Fond of tassels” means that it is fond of the nature of the tassels, which is the nature of the channels.

original: chun 'phyang ma zhes bya ba ni chun 'phyang byed ces bya ba aa yig dang lhan cig tu bde sdug tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chun 'phyang ma zhes bya ba ni chun 'phyang byed ces bya ba aa yig dang lhan cig tu bde sdug tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “Tassel-maker” means that it is the non-differentiation of pleasure and pain, together with the letter A.

original: sbrang bu zhes bya ba ni sems kyi khams kyi ngo bo gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: sbrang bu zhes bya ba ni sems kyi khams kyi ngo bo gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya ba'o //
translated: “Bee” means that it is so called because it exists in the nature of the element of mind.

original: phru gu zhes bya ba ni yang de bzhin du'o //
analyzed: phru gu zhes bya ba ni yang de bzhin du'o //
translated: “Infant” means that it is just so.

original: phru gu ster zhes bya ba ni phru gu'i ngo bo sems nyid gsang ba'i 'khor lo na gnas pa'i rtsa rnams la ster bas na snyam du byas nas so //
analyzed: phru gu ster zhes bya ba ni phru gu'i ngo bo sems nyid gsang ba'i 'khor lo na gnas pa'i rtsa rnams la ster bas na snyam du byas nas so //
translated: The child is the nature of the child, the channels located in the secret cakra of the mind.

original: 'gro ba zhes bya ba ni rab tu 'gro bas na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba zhes bya ba ni rab tu 'gro bas na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The goer is the one who goes.

original: lo ma zhes bya ba ni lo ma'i gdong gi rnam pa yod pas na lo ma'o //
analyzed: lo ma zhes bya ba ni lo ma'i gdong gi rnam pa yod pas na lo ma'o //
translated: The leaf is the leaf because it has the form of a leaf-face.

original: lo ma'i mgrin pa dang zhes bya ba ni de bzhin du lo ma'i mgrin pa gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: lo ma'i mgrin pa dang zhes bya ba ni de bzhin du lo ma'i mgrin pa gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The leaf-throat is the one who has a leaf-throat in that way.

original: rab mchog ma dang zhes bya ba ni sems kyi rdzas rab mchog tu byas nas so //
analyzed: rab mchog ma dang zhes bya ba ni sems kyi rdzas rab mchog tu byas nas so //
translated: The excellent one is the one who has made the substance of the mind excellent.

original: rab gsal te zhes bya ba ni ye shes kyi me gsal bar byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rab gsal te zhes bya ba ni ye shes kyi me gsal bar byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The very clear is the one who is very clear because of the clarity of the fire of wisdom.

original: drug cu rtsa bzhir zhes bya ba ni dbyu gu drug cu rtsa bzhi'i rnam par dag @127b pas so //
analyzed: drug cu rtsa bzhir zhes bya ba ni dbyu gu drug cu rtsa bzhi'i rnam par dag @127b pas so //
translated: The sixty-four is the purification of the sixty-four nāḍīs.

original: de ltar brjod ces bya ba ni sngar bshad pa'i rigs pas so //
analyzed: de ltar brjod ces bya ba ni sngar bshad pa'i rigs pas so //
translated: The thus is the previously explained reasoning.

original: yang na rtsa drug cu rtsa bzhi la a'a li dang k'a li drug cu rtsa bzhi la brten nas don brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: yang na rtsa drug cu rtsa bzhi la a'a li dang k'a li drug cu rtsa bzhi la brten nas don brjod par bya'o //
translated: Or else, the meaning is to be expressed in dependence on the sixty-four vowels and consonants of the sixty-four channels.

original: lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lor gnas //
analyzed: lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lor gnas //
translated: It is located in the navel emanation wheel.

original: zhes bya ba ni go sla'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni go sla'o //
translated: This is easy to understand.

original: bdud rtsi mchog gis yongs su gang //
analyzed: bdud rtsi mchog gis yongs su gang //
translated: It is completely filled with supreme nectar.

original: zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems kyis yongs su gang ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems kyis yongs su gang ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: This is because it is completely filled with bodhicitta.

original: chos kyi 'khor lo'i rtsa rnams kyi ming gsungs pa ni /
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo'i rtsa rnams kyi ming gsungs pa ni /
translated: The names of the channels of the dharma wheel are stated:

original: rin chen cod pa na zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: rin chen cod pa na zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Jewel crown,

original: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi sa bon yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi sa bon yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it contains the seed of Ratnasambhava.🔽Great lotus,

original: padma che zhes bya ba ni snang ba mtha' yas kyi sa bon no //
analyzed: padma che zhes bya ba ni snang ba mtha' yas kyi sa bon no //
translated: because it contains the seed of Amitābha.🔽Great vajra,

original: rdo rje chen po zhes bya ba ni don yod grub pa'i sa bon nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rdo rje chen po zhes bya ba ni don yod grub pa'i sa bon nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because it contains the seed of Amoghasiddhi.🔽Great strength,

original: stobs po che zhes bya ba ni lus kyi sa bon yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: stobs po che zhes bya ba ni lus kyi sa bon yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it contains the seed of Sthāṇu.🔽Great head,

original: mgo bo che zhes bya ba ni spyan ma'i sa bon yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mgo bo che zhes bya ba ni spyan ma'i sa bon yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it contains the seed of Locanā.

original: sgra chen dang zhes bya ba ni bdag med ma'i sa bon yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgra chen dang zhes bya ba ni bdag med ma'i sa bon yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Great Sound is because of the seed of Nairātmyā.

original: nyer dga' chen po zhes bya ba ni gos dkar mo'i sa bon nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: nyer dga' chen po zhes bya ba ni gos dkar mo'i sa bon nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Great Joy is because of the seed of Pāṇḍaravāsinī.

original: myos po che zhes bya ba ni sgrol ma'i sa bon yod pa'i phyir te rigs pa 'dis so //
analyzed: myos po che zhes bya ba ni sgrol ma'i sa bon yod pa'i phyir te rigs pa 'dis so //
translated: Great Ecstasy is because of the seed of Tārā.

original: chos kyi 'khor lo'i nang du zhes bya ba ni dbus su'o //
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo'i nang du zhes bya ba ni dbus su'o //
translated: In the Dharma wheel means in the center.

original: snying ga zhes bya ba ni snying ga'i gnas la'o //
analyzed: snying ga zhes bya ba ni snying ga'i gnas la'o //
translated: Heart means in the location of the heart.

original: padmar yang dag gnas zhes bya ba ni padmar gnas pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: padmar yang dag gnas zhes bya ba ni padmar gnas pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Abiding in the lotus means abiding in the lotus.

original: longs spyod 'khor lo'i rtsa rnams kyi ming bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: longs spyod 'khor lo'i rtsa rnams kyi ming bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach the names of the channels of the enjoyment wheel,

original: longs spyod ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: longs spyod ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: he says, Enjoyment, and so on.

original: dbyangs yig bcu drug la brten pa nyid kyis rtsa bcu drug rnams kyi don shes par bya'o //
analyzed: dbyangs yig bcu drug la brten pa nyid kyis rtsa bcu drug rnams kyi don shes par bya'o //
translated: One should understand the meaning of the sixteen channels by way of the sixteen vowels.

original: longs spyod 'khor lor gnas zhes bya ba ni mgrin pa'i phyogs su ro drug la longs spyod pa'o ;
analyzed: longs spyod 'khor lor gnas zhes bya ba ni mgrin pa'i phyogs su ro drug la longs spyod pa'o ;
translated: Abiding in the enjoyment wheel means enjoying the six flavors in the throat.

original: / grangs ni zhes bya ba ni bgrang ba'o //
analyzed: / grangs ni zhes bya ba ni bgrang ba'o //
translated: “Number” means counting.

original: bcu drug tu ni brjod ces bya ba ni 'pho ba bcu drug gi dbye bas zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bcu drug tu ni brjod ces bya ba ni 'pho ba bcu drug gi dbye bas zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: “Sixteen” means that it is said to be sixteen by the division of the sixteen movements.

original: bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo'i rtsa'i ming bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo'i rtsa'i ming bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach the names of the channels of the great-bliss wheel,

original: de steng zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de steng zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: [the Bhagavān] declares, “Above that.

original: de'i steng ni mgo bo la'o //
analyzed: de'i steng ni mgo bo la'o //
translated: ” “Above that” is the head.

original: rim rigs zhes bya ba ni aa yig la brten pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rim rigs zhes bya ba ni aa yig la brten pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “In order” means based on the letter A.

original: dbyangs yig bcu drug rnams la thabs dang shes rab kyi dbye bas nyis 'gyur du byas nas /
analyzed: dbyangs yig bcu drug rnams la thabs dang shes rab kyi dbye bas nyis 'gyur du byas nas /
translated: The sixteen vowels are doubled by the division of method and wisdom.

original: de'i rjes su 'brangs nas nges tshig gis bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i rjes su 'brangs nas nges tshig gis bshad par bya'o //
translated: Following that, the explanation is by way of the etymologies.

original: man ngag gi khyad par gzhan gang zhig yod pa bla ma'i zhal las rtogs par bya ste /
analyzed: man ngag gi khyad par gzhan gang zhig yod pa bla ma'i zhal las rtogs par bya ste /
translated: Any other special instructions should be understood from the guru’s

original: de'i phyir 'dir rgya cher ma @128a * //🔽bshad do // sum cu rtsa gnyis zhes ni bshad //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'dir rgya cher ma @128a * // bshad do // sum cu rtsa gnyis zhes ni bshad //
translated: mouth. Therefore, they are not explained here in detail.

original: ces bya ba'i rigs pa 'dis so //
analyzed: ces bya ba'i rigs pa 'dis so //
translated: “Thirty-two” is explained by this reasoning.

original: bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo che //
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo che //
translated: The great wheel of great bliss.

original: zhes bya ba ni mgo po'i gnas la'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mgo po'i gnas la'o //
translated: This is the location of the head.

original: mchog tu dga' ba ster bar byed //
analyzed: mchog tu dga' ba ster bar byed //
translated: It bestows supreme joy.

original: ces bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems kyi khams kyis rgyun 'dzag pas so//
analyzed: ces bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems kyi khams kyis rgyun 'dzag pas so//
translated: This is because the bodhicitta element is constantly dripping.

original: phra dang reg bya mchog tu phra //
analyzed: phra dang reg bya mchog tu phra //
translated: It is subtle and has the most subtle touch.

original: zhes bya ba ni phra ba ni byang chub kyi sems kyi ngo bo las shin tu yang gdung ba zhi bar byed cing reg bya bsil ba dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni phra ba ni byang chub kyi sems kyi ngo bo las shin tu yang gdung ba zhi bar byed cing reg bya bsil ba dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because the subtle bodhicitta is extremely soothing in nature and has a cool touch.

original: gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs //
analyzed: gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs //
translated: It is free from the concepts of object and subject.

original: zhes bya ba ni yul dang yul can gyi rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni yul dang yul can gyi rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because there is no conceptualization of object and subject.

original: ngo bo nyid rten du gyur pa rnams kyis brten pa byang chub kyi sems 'jug pa zhes bya ba ni rnam rtog med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid rten du gyur pa rnams kyis brten pa byang chub kyi sems 'jug pa zhes bya ba ni rnam rtog med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The bodhicitta that is supported by the naturally arisen supports is called “engaged.” This is because it is nonconceptual.🔽It has the aspect of great bliss.

original: rang nyid bde chen rnam pa dang // zhes bya ba ni kun rdzob byang chub kyi sems kyi grogs yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang nyid bde chen rnam pa dang // zhes bya ba ni kun rdzob byang chub kyi sems kyi grogs yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because it is the companion of the relative bodhicitta.

original: gzhan dag la yang zhes bya ba ni rtsa gzhan rnams la yang bde ba chen po kun rdzob kyi bdag nyid can ster bar byed pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan dag la yang zhes bya ba ni rtsa gzhan rnams la yang bde ba chen po kun rdzob kyi bdag nyid can ster bar byed pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Also to others means also to the other nāḍīs, bestowing the great bliss that is the nature of the relative.

original: de ltar 'khor lo'i dbye ba rgyas par bshad pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar 'khor lo'i dbye ba rgyas par bshad pa bstan nas /
translated: Having explained the extensive classification of the cakras,

original: nye bar bsdu ba sngon du 'gro bas rtsa bstan pa'i dgos pa bshad pa'i phyir de'i yan lag dgos pa'i ngo bo mdor bstan pa'i phyir /🔽de ltar yang dag rtsa yi rim //🔽zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /🔽sngar bshad pa'i rigs pas so //
analyzed: nye bar bsdu ba sngon du 'gro bas rtsa bstan pa'i dgos pa bshad pa'i phyir de'i yan lag dgos pa'i ngo bo mdor bstan pa'i phyir / de ltar yang dag rtsa yi rim // zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te / sngar bshad pa'i rigs pas so //
translated: now, in order to explain the purpose of the teaching on the nāḍīs, having first summarized the purpose, in order to explain the purpose in brief,🔽the root text says:

original: yang dag ces bya ba ni phyin ci ma log pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag ces bya ba ni phyin ci ma log pa'o //
translated: The stages of the perfect nāḍīs

original: shes par bya zhes bya ba ni rtogs par bya ba'o //
analyzed: shes par bya zhes bya ba ni rtogs par bya ba'o //
translated: should be understood from the guru’s instruction.🔽The stages of the perfect nāḍīs should be understood from the guru’s instruction.🔽The stages of the perfect nāḍīs should be understood from the guru’s instruction.

original: bla ma'i zhal las zhes bya ba ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na rdo rje slob dpon gyi zhal las zhes bya ba'i don to //🔽des ci zhig byed ce na /
analyzed: bla ma'i zhal las zhes bya ba ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na rdo rje slob dpon gyi zhal las zhes bya ba'i don to // des ci zhig byed ce na /
translated: The stages of the perfect nāḍīs should be understood from the guru’s instruction.

original: de'i phyir rtsa'i rim med ces bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir rtsa'i rim med ces bya ba gsungs te /
translated: The stages of the perfect nāḍīs should be understood from the guru’s instruction.

original: rtsa'i rim pa spangs pas so //
analyzed: rtsa'i rim pa spangs pas so //
translated: because of the abandonment of the stage of the nāḍīs.

original: bden par zhes bya ba ni brdzun pa ma lags so //
analyzed: bden par zhes bya ba ni brdzun pa ma lags so //
translated: “Truly” means “not falsely.”

original: phung po la sogs zhes bya ba ni phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams la'o //
analyzed: phung po la sogs zhes bya ba ni phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams la'o //
translated: “Aggregates, etc.” means “aggregates, elements, and sense bases.”

original: mi 'byung zhing zhes bya ba ni skye bar mi 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: mi 'byung zhing zhes bya ba ni skye bar mi 'gyur ba'o //
translated: “Do not arise” means “are not born.”

original: phung po med na zhes bya ba ni gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po lnga med na'o //
analyzed: phung po med na zhes bya ba ni gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po lnga med na'o //
translated: “Without aggregates” means “without the five aggregates of form, etc.”

original: ye shes che zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i rnam pa 'am /
analyzed: ye shes che zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i rnam pa 'am /
translated: “Great intuition” means the aspect of natural luminosity,

original: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: or the nature of nondual intuition.

original: thob mi 'gyur zhes bya ba ni rnyed par mi 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: thob mi 'gyur zhes bya ba ni rnyed par mi 'gyur ba'o //
translated: “One does not attain” means “one does not obtain.”

original: rnal 'byor pa yis zhes bya ba ni rim pa gnyis sgom @128b pa pos so //🔽ji skad du /
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa yis zhes bya ba ni rim pa gnyis sgom @128b pa pos so // ji skad du /
translated: “The yogin” means “one who meditates on the two stages.”

original: dpal dgyes pa rdo rje'i rgyud las /
analyzed: dpal dgyes pa rdo rje'i rgyud las /
translated: As it is said in the Śrī-Hevajra Tantra:

original: lus la ye shes chen po gnas //🔽kun du rtog pa thams cad spangs //
analyzed: lus la ye shes chen po gnas // kun du rtog pa thams cad spangs //
translated: Great intuition abides in the body,🔽Abandoning all conceptual thoughts,

original: dngos po kun la khyab pa po //
analyzed: dngos po kun la khyab pa po //
translated: Pervading all things.

original: lus gnas lus las ma skyes pa'o //
analyzed: lus gnas lus las ma skyes pa'o //
translated: The body is not the body, not born from the body.

original: zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes gsungs te /
translated: Thus it is stated.

original: de ltar dgos pa rang gi ngo bo bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar dgos pa rang gi ngo bo bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the purpose and the essence,

original: de rgyas par bshad par brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de rgyas par bshad par brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to explain that extensively,

original: phung po lnga ni bdag nyid lus //
analyzed: phung po lnga ni bdag nyid lus //
translated: the five aggregates are the body.

original: zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes gsungs te /
translated: Thus it is stated.

original: lus ni lus so //
analyzed: lus ni lus so //
translated: The body is the body.

original: mkha' 'gro lnga ni rab tu grags //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro lnga ni rab tu grags //
translated: The five dakinis are well known.

original: zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rang bzhin du gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rang bzhin du gsungs te /
translated: Thus it is stated. The nature of the five tathagatas, Vairochana and so forth, is taught.

original: gnas skabs lnga nyams su myong ba'i rim pas de rnams grub pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gnas skabs lnga nyams su myong ba'i rim pas de rnams grub pa'i phyir /
translated: Because they are accomplished by the process of experiencing the five states.

original: de nyid ces bya ba ni ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid kyi lus so //
analyzed: de nyid ces bya ba ni ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid kyi lus so //
translated: That itself is the body of the nature of the five pristine consciousnesses.

original: 'byung ba'i ngo bo yis zhes bya ba ni sa la sogs pa 'byung ba chen po lnga'i ngo bos so //
analyzed: 'byung ba'i ngo bo yis zhes bya ba ni sa la sogs pa 'byung ba chen po lnga'i ngo bos so //
translated: By the nature of the elements means by the nature of the five great elements, earth, and so on.

original: ye shes lngar ni zhes bya ba ni me long la sogs pa'i ye shes lnga'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: ye shes lngar ni zhes bya ba ni me long la sogs pa'i ye shes lnga'i ngo bo'o //
translated: The five pristine consciousnesses means the nature of the five pristine consciousnesses, mirror-like and so on.

original: rnam par gnas zhes bya ba ni dngos po la de lta nyid du gnas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par gnas zhes bya ba ni dngos po la de lta nyid du gnas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Abiding means that things abide in just that way.

original: de ltar gzugs ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi ngo bo nyid kyis me long lta bus ye shes kyi rang bzhin yin te /
analyzed: de ltar gzugs ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi ngo bo nyid kyis me long lta bus ye shes kyi rang bzhin yin te /
translated: Thus, form is the nature of mirror-like wisdom, by the nature of Vairochana, the Tathagata.

original: don dam par lus ni gzugs brnyan gyi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //🔽tshor ba ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: don dam par lus ni gzugs brnyan gyi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro // tshor ba ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Ultimately, the body is the nature of a reflection.

original: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin te /
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin te /
translated: Feeling is the nature of the wisdom of equality, by the nature of Ratnasambhava.

original: tshor ba rnam pa gsum po la rnam pa gcig pas mnyam pa'i phyir /🔽'du shes ni snang ba mtha' yas kyi phyir /
analyzed: tshor ba rnam pa gsum po la rnam pa gcig pas mnyam pa'i phyir / 'du shes ni snang ba mtha' yas kyi phyir /
translated: The three types of feeling are equal in being one aspect.

original: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo ste /
analyzed: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo ste /
translated: Discrimination is the nature of the wisdom of individual investigation, by the nature of Amitabha.

original: gdod ma nas shi ba nyid kyis spyod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gdod ma nas shi ba nyid kyis spyod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is the nature of individual investigation because it is the investigation of the dead.

original: 'du byed ni don yod grub pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes kyi ngo bo ste /
analyzed: 'du byed ni don yod grub pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes kyi ngo bo ste /
translated: Compositional factors are the nature of the wisdom of accomplishment, by the nature of Amoghasiddhi.

original: mtshungs par ldan pa dang mtshungs par mi ldan pa la sogs pa dge ba'i rnam pa nyid du shes nas bya ba sems can gyi don gyi mtshan nyid bsgrub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mtshungs par ldan pa dang mtshungs par mi ldan pa la sogs pa dge ba'i rnam pa nyid du shes nas bya ba sems can gyi don gyi mtshan nyid bsgrub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Having known the nature of virtue, such as being associated with and not being associated with, etc., in order to accomplish the activity characterized by the benefit of sentient beings.

original: rnam par shes pa ni mi bskyod pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis shin tu rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi ngo bo ste /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa ni mi bskyod pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis shin tu rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi ngo bo ste /
translated: Consciousness is the nature of Akṣhobhya, the essence of the gnosis of the dharmadhātu, which is extremely pure.

original: rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyis nyon mongs pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams kyis 'khrugs par mi nus pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyis nyon mongs pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams kyis 'khrugs par mi nus pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because it cannot be disturbed by the concepts of affliction due to its emptiness of inherent nature.

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir lus ni ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir lus ni ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin no //
translated: Therefore, since the body is the nature of the five gnoses,🔽for that reason,

original: de'i phyir 'bad pa thams cad kyis //🔽zhes bya ba ni thun mong ma yin pa'i brtson @129a * //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'bad pa thams cad kyis // zhes bya ba ni thun mong ma yin pa'i brtson @129a * //
translated: with all effort,

original: 'grus kyis so //
analyzed: 'grus kyis so //
translated: with extraordinary diligence,

original: rtsa'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni phung po lnga'i bdag nyid can gyi lus kyi rten du gyur pa'o //
analyzed: rtsa'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni phung po lnga'i bdag nyid can gyi lus kyi rten du gyur pa'o //
translated: the “cakra of the nāḍīs” is the support of the body, which is the nature of the five aggregates.

original: btsal bar zhes bya ba ni ye shes chen po btsal ba'i phyir rjes su bskyed par bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: btsal bar zhes bya ba ni ye shes chen po btsal ba'i phyir rjes su bskyed par bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: “One should seek” means that one should generate the great intuition.

original: de ltar de rgyas par bshad pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar de rgyas par bshad pa bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the extensive explanation,

original: dpe bshad pa'i phyir /
analyzed: dpe bshad pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to explain the example,

original: ji ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: ji ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: he says, “Just as, etc. ”

original: chu'i dbus kyi zhes bya ba ni chu'i skyor ba zhes bya ba las so //
analyzed: chu'i dbus kyi zhes bya ba ni chu'i skyor ba zhes bya ba las so //
translated: “In the middle of water” means in the middle of a water-wheel.

original: shing zhes bya ba ni sa las skyes pa'o //
analyzed: shing zhes bya ba ni sa las skyes pa'o //
translated: “Tree” means one that grows in the earth.

original: 'phel nas 'gro zhes bya ba ni sdong bu dang / yal ga dang / lcug ma dang / 'dab ma phun sum tshogs pa las /
analyzed: 'phel nas 'gro zhes bya ba ni sdong bu dang / yal ga dang / lcug ma dang / 'dab ma phun sum tshogs pa las /
translated: “Having grown, it goes” means that from the perfection of trunk, branches, twigs, and leaves,

original: yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: it becomes fully developed.

original: rtag tu zhes bya ba ni dus shin tu ring por ro //
analyzed: rtag tu zhes bya ba ni dus shin tu ring por ro //
translated: “Always” means for a very long time.

original: de la 'bras bu sogs ldan pa //
analyzed: de la 'bras bu sogs ldan pa //
translated: “There, endowed with fruit, etc. ”

original: zhes bya ba ni shing rgyas pa'i rjes la 'bras bu sogs ldan pa me tog dang 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni shing rgyas pa'i rjes la 'bras bu sogs ldan pa me tog dang 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: means that after the tree has grown, it is endowed with fruit, etc. , which is to say, it is endowed with the perfection of flowers and fruits, etc.

original: ster ba 'di la the tshom med //
analyzed: ster ba 'di la the tshom med //
translated: “There is no doubt about this. ”

original: ces bya ba ni the tshom med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni the tshom med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because there is no doubt.

original: de ltar dpe bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar dpe bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the example,

original: don brjod par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: don brjod par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: in order to express the meaning,🔽he says:

original: de bzhin phung po shing zhes bya ba ni phung po lnga'i yan lag can no //
analyzed: de bzhin phung po shing zhes bya ba ni phung po lnga'i yan lag can no //
translated: Likewise, the tree called the aggregates has five branches.

original: shes bya zhes bya pa ni shing gi dpes shes par bya'o //
analyzed: shes bya zhes bya pa ni shing gi dpes shes par bya'o //
translated: The object of knowledge should be understood by the example of the tree.

original: rtsa yi chu yis 'phel nas ni //
analyzed: rtsa yi chu yis 'phel nas ni //
translated: It grows by the water of the channels.

original: zhes bya ba ni rtsa las byung ba'i khams sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi chus 'phel ba nyid kyi phyir chu des 'phel ba ni 'phel bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rtsa las byung ba'i khams sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi chus 'phel ba nyid kyi phyir chu des 'phel ba ni 'phel bar byed pa'o //
translated: This is because it grows by the water of the thirty-two elements that arise from the channels. That water which causes growth is the growth.

original: 'phel bas zhes bya ba ni rim gyis yongs su rgyas par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: 'phel bas zhes bya ba ni rim gyis yongs su rgyas par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: By growth, it gradually becomes fully developed.

original: 'bras bu ster zhes bya ba dang 'brel to //
analyzed: 'bras bu ster zhes bya ba dang 'brel to //
translated: It gives fruit, it is connected.

original: ji ltar zhen /
analyzed: ji ltar zhen /
translated: How?

original: de'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, he declares the activity of omniscience.

original: yang dag ces bya ba ni phyin ci ma log pa'i gdams ngag bsgoms pas zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: yang dag ces bya ba ni phyin ci ma log pa'i gdams ngag bsgoms pas zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Correct means the cultivation of unmistaken instruction.

original: lha'i rnam pa'i ngo bo yis //
analyzed: lha'i rnam pa'i ngo bo yis //
translated: By the nature of the divine form,

original: zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ba las so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ba las so //
translated: This is as will be explained.

original: rtsa rnams zhes bya ba ni 'khor lo drug gi dbye bas tha dad pa rnams la'o //
analyzed: rtsa rnams zhes bya ba ni 'khor lo drug gi dbye bas tha dad pa rnams la'o //
translated: The channels are the different ones divided by the six cakras.

original: rang bzhin gyis 'gyur zhes bya ba ni lha'i rnam pa'i ngo bos 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis 'gyur zhes bya ba ni lha'i rnam pa'i ngo bos 'gyur ba'o //
translated: They are transformed by nature, by the essence of the deity's form.

original: ji skad du le'u nyi shu rtsa bdun pa las /
analyzed: ji skad du le'u nyi shu rtsa bdun pa las /
translated: As it is said in the twenty-seventh chapter:

original: de rnams ming ni bshad bya ste //🔽de las gzhan pa'i lha rnams ni //
analyzed: de rnams ming ni bshad bya ste // de las gzhan pa'i lha rnams ni //
translated: Their names will be explained.🔽The other deities🔽are the channels of the body.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: And so on.

original: de ltar don rnam pa bzhis nye bar bsdu ba sngon du 'gro bas rtsa bstan pa'i dgos pa brjod pas so //
analyzed: de ltar don rnam pa bzhis nye bar bsdu ba sngon du 'gro bas rtsa bstan pa'i dgos pa brjod pas so //
translated: Thus, the purpose of teaching the channels is preceded by a summary in four topics.

original: da ni rtsa rnams bskyed pa'i rim pa brjod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: da ni rtsa rnams bskyed pa'i rim pa brjod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Now, in order to explain the sequence of the generation of the channels,

original: de'i yan lag me'i @129b drod kyis gdungs pas byang chub kyi sems 'byung ba ni /
analyzed: de'i yan lag me'i @129b drod kyis gdungs pas byang chub kyi sems 'byung ba ni /
translated: the arising of bodhicitta by the burning of the heat of the fire element is

original: reg bya'i rgyal mtshan gnyis phrad pas //🔽zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: reg bya'i rgyal mtshan gnyis phrad pas // zhes gsungs te /
translated: the union of the two banners of touch.

original: reg bya'i sgras ni padma la brjod de /
analyzed: reg bya'i sgras ni padma la brjod de /
translated: The word touch refers to the lotus.

original: shin tu reg bya ba de nyid kyi phyir rgyal mtshan gyi ngo bo'o //
analyzed: shin tu reg bya ba de nyid kyi phyir rgyal mtshan gyi ngo bo'o //
translated: Because of that very extreme tactility, it is the nature of the banner.

original: lhag ces bya ba ni bsrung bya dang bsgrub bya'i nus pa'o //
analyzed: lhag ces bya ba ni bsrung bya dang bsgrub bya'i nus pa'o //
translated: The remainder is the power of the object to be protected and accomplished.

original: de tshe zhes bya ba ni de'i dus su'o ;
analyzed: de tshe zhes bya ba ni de'i dus su'o ;
translated: At that time means at that moment.

original: / me ni yang dag 'bar zhes bya ba ni ye shes kyi me 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: / me ni yang dag 'bar zhes bya ba ni ye shes kyi me 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The fire is fully ablaze means the blazing of the fire of wisdom.

original: lte ba'i dbus su sprul ba'i 'khor lo dang / steng du gnas pa'i me'i 'khor lo gnyis ni 'bar ba'i rnam pa 'grub pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: lte ba'i dbus su sprul ba'i 'khor lo dang / steng du gnas pa'i me'i 'khor lo gnyis ni 'bar ba'i rnam pa 'grub pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The two, the emanation wheel in the center of the navel and the fire wheel located above, are established in the form of blazing.

original: me'i 'khor lo'i dbus zhes bya ba ni longs spyod kyi 'khor lo'i 'og na gnas pa'i me'i 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: me'i 'khor lo'i dbus zhes bya ba ni longs spyod kyi 'khor lo'i 'og na gnas pa'i me'i 'khor lo'o //
translated: The center of the fire wheel is the fire wheel located below the enjoyment wheel.

original: 'khor lo mig can padma rnams /
analyzed: 'khor lo mig can padma rnams /
translated: The lotus eyes of the wheel

original: zhes bya ba ni 'bar ba'i rnam pas ma lus par drod kyis khyab par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'bar ba'i rnam pas ma lus par drod kyis khyab par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: means that, with the form of blazing, it completely pervades with heat.

original: ji ltar 'gro bar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar 'gro bar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: How does it move?

original: de'i phyir rim gyis rim gyis zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir rim gyis rim gyis zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, it is said gradually, gradually.

original: 'dis ni sngags dang rgyud kyi rim pa bshad do //
analyzed: 'dis ni sngags dang rgyud kyi rim pa bshad do //
translated: This explains the sequence of mantra and tantra.

original: de rjes brtsal zhes bya ba ni ye shes kyi mes bsregs pas mi snang ba nyid du 'gyur bas so //
analyzed: de rjes brtsal zhes bya ba ni ye shes kyi mes bsregs pas mi snang ba nyid du 'gyur bas so //
translated: Then, having sought means that by burning with the fire of wisdom, it becomes invisible.

original: 'bab de la zhes bya ba ni kun rdzob kyi rnam pa'i byang chub kyi sems de'i drod kyis gdungs pas zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'bab de la zhes bya ba ni kun rdzob kyi rnam pa'i byang chub kyi sems de'i drod kyis gdungs pas zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: On that stream means that it is heated by the heat of the relative aspect of bodhicitta.

original: bde ba che zhes bya ba ni thabs dang shes rab kyi stobs kyis grub pas rtsa sreg par byed pa'i bdag nyid do //🔽sprul pa'i snying por yang dag thob //
analyzed: bde ba che zhes bya ba ni thabs dang shes rab kyi stobs kyis grub pas rtsa sreg par byed pa'i bdag nyid do // sprul pa'i snying por yang dag thob //
translated: Great bliss means that by the power of method and wisdom, it burns the channels, having the nature of bliss.

original: ces bya ba ni sprul pa'i 'khor lo nas gsang ba'i 'khor lo'i dbus su rim gyis thob par byas nas so //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni sprul pa'i 'khor lo nas gsang ba'i 'khor lo'i dbus su rim gyis thob par byas nas so //
translated: Having attained the essence of emanation means that having attained it gradually from the emanation cakra to the center of the secret cakra,

original: gcig gyur zhes bya ba ni ro gcig pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: gcig gyur zhes bya ba ni ro gcig pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: having become one means that it becomes of one taste.

original: bsdus nas ni gong bu'i rnam par byas nas 'gro bar 'gyur zhes bya ba lhag ma'o //
analyzed: bsdus nas ni gong bu'i rnam par byas nas 'gro bar 'gyur zhes bya ba lhag ma'o //
translated: Having gathered means that having made it into a ball, it moves.

original: de ltar mes kun nas gdungs pas byang chub kyi sems kyi ngo bo bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar mes kun nas gdungs pas byang chub kyi sems kyi ngo bo bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having taught the nature of the bodhicitta by the burning with fire,

original: rtsa gsum gyi khams 'bab pa'i rim pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir rtsa gnyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: rtsa gsum gyi khams 'bab pa'i rim pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir rtsa gnyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: in order to teach the sequence of the flow of the elements of the three channels, [the Bhagavān] declares, two channels, etc.

original: rtsa gnyis ni g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: rtsa gnyis ni g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i ngo bo'o //
translated: Two channels are of the nature of the right and left [channels].

original: kha'i lam zhes bya ba ni rang gi kha'i lam nas so //
analyzed: kha'i lam zhes bya ba ni rang gi kha'i lam nas so //
translated: The path of the mouth is from one's own mouth.

original: 'dzag pa zhes bya ba ni 'bab pa'o //
analyzed: 'dzag pa zhes bya ba ni 'bab pa'o //
translated: Flow is descent.

original: ci zhig ce na /
analyzed: ci zhig ce na /
translated: What?

original: de'i phyir nyi ma zla ba'o zhes bya ba gsungs te //
analyzed: de'i phyir nyi ma zla ba'o zhes bya ba gsungs te //
translated: Therefore [the Bhagavān] declares, sun and moon.

original: rdul dang khu ba ni nyi ma dang zla ba dag go //
analyzed: rdul dang khu ba ni nyi ma dang zla ba dag go //
translated: The sun and moon are the semen and blood.

original: skye gnas 'khor lo'i dbus su yang //
analyzed: skye gnas 'khor lo'i dbus su yang //
translated: In the center of the birth cakra,

original: zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba dang @130a * //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba dang @130a * //
translated: is the object of attainment.

original: sgrub par byed pa gnyis phrad ba'i dus su'o //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa gnyis phrad ba'i dus su'o //
translated: And the means of attainment is the time of the union of the two.

original: skye gnas 'khor lo ni padma'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su rnal 'byor ma dang 'brel pa'i rtsa gnyis srang bu'i rnam par gnas pa'o //
analyzed: skye gnas 'khor lo ni padma'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su rnal 'byor ma dang 'brel pa'i rtsa gnyis srang bu'i rnam par gnas pa'o //
translated: The birth cakra is the two channels connected with the yoginī located in the form of a scale-pan in the center of the lotus mandala.

original: gnyis ka 'dus pas za ma tog gi tshul du gnas pa'o //
analyzed: gnyis ka 'dus pas za ma tog gi tshul du gnas pa'o //
translated: The two together are located in the manner of a vase.

original: gal te de ltar yin na thabs shes rab dang 'brel pa'i rtsa gsum po gang las 'byung zhe na /
analyzed: gal te de ltar yin na thabs shes rab dang 'brel pa'i rtsa gsum po gang las 'byung zhe na /
translated: If that is so, from which of the three nāḍīs that are connected with method and wisdom does it arise?

original: de'i phyir rgyu gcig tu zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir rgyu gcig tu zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, it is said “from one cause.”

original: rtsa dbus ma rnam par rtog pa thams cad las 'das pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rtsa dbus ma rnam par rtog pa thams cad las 'das pa'i phyir /
translated: Because the central nāḍī is beyond all conceptuality,

original: de las gzhan pa'i rtsa gnyis la gtso cher te /
analyzed: de las gzhan pa'i rtsa gnyis la gtso cher te /
translated: it is the principal one of the two other nāḍīs.

original: gzhan rnams kyi yang rgyu yin no //
analyzed: gzhan rnams kyi yang rgyu yin no //
translated: It is also the cause of the others.

original: shes nas zhes bya ba ni shes par bya ba'o //
analyzed: shes nas zhes bya ba ni shes par bya ba'o //
translated: “Having understood” means having understood.

original: de nyid ces bya ba ni gtso bor gyur pa'i dbus ma'o //
analyzed: de nyid ces bya ba ni gtso bor gyur pa'i dbus ma'o //
translated: “That” means the principal central nāḍī.

original: 'bras bu zhes bya ba ni khrag dang khu ba 'bab pa nyid kyis 'bras bu las so //
analyzed: 'bras bu zhes bya ba ni khrag dang khu ba 'bab pa nyid kyis 'bras bu las so //
translated: “The result” is the result of the flow of blood and semen.

original: rnam pa gnyis zhes bya ba ni la la n'a dang ra sa na'i dbye bas so //
analyzed: rnam pa gnyis zhes bya ba ni la la n'a dang ra sa na'i dbye bas so //
translated: “The two” are the lalanā and rasanā.

original: g-yon pa zhes bya ba ni g-yon pa'i rtsa las so //
analyzed: g-yon pa zhes bya ba ni g-yon pa'i rtsa las so //
translated: “The left” is from the left nāḍī.

original: zla ba rnam par 'byung zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems kyi khams bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: zla ba rnam par 'byung zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems kyi khams bskyed pa'o //
translated: The “moon arising” is the generation of the element of the thought of enlightenment.

original: g-yas pa zhes bya ba ni g-yas pa'i rtsa'o //
analyzed: g-yas pa zhes bya ba ni g-yas pa'i rtsa'o //
translated: “Right” is the right channel.

original: nyi ma'i zhes bya ba ni khrag gi khams las byung ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: nyi ma'i zhes bya ba ni khrag gi khams las byung ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: “Sun” is the element of blood.

original: khams gnyis po 'di nyid ni bde ba chen po rjod par byed pa ste /
analyzed: khams gnyis po 'di nyid ni bde ba chen po rjod par byed pa ste /
translated: These two elements are the expressers of great bliss.

original: don dam par bde pa chen po'i rang bzhin du 'gyur zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: don dam par bde pa chen po'i rang bzhin du 'gyur zhes bya ba'o //
translated: They become the nature of ultimate great bliss.

original: g-yas pa zhes bya ba ni g-yas pa'i rgyu bas so //
analyzed: g-yas pa zhes bya ba ni g-yas pa'i rgyu bas so //
translated: “Right” is by the movement of the right.

original: gang tshe nyi ma ni zhes bya ba ni dus gang la nyi ma'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang tshe nyi ma ni zhes bya ba ni dus gang la nyi ma'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro //
translated: “When the sun” is when it becomes the nature of the sun.

original: de tshe khrag ces bya ba ni thabs kyi rnam pa'o //
analyzed: de tshe khrag ces bya ba ni thabs kyi rnam pa'o //
translated: “Then blood” is the aspect of method.

original: 'gyur bde ba'o /
analyzed: 'gyur bde ba'o /
translated: It becomes bliss.🔽It becomes great bliss.

original: zhes bya ba ni bde ba chen por 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bde ba chen por 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning.

original: de rgyu mthun par 'gyur ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de rgyu mthun par 'gyur ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because it becomes the natural outflow of that.

original: gang tshe g-yon pa'i zla ba zhes bya ba ni g-yon pa'i rtsa ni zla ba'i rnam pa'o //
analyzed: gang tshe g-yon pa'i zla ba zhes bya ba ni g-yon pa'i rtsa ni zla ba'i rnam pa'o //
translated: When the left moon, the left channel is the form of the moon.

original: gang tshe zhes bya ba ni dus gang gi tshe na'o //
analyzed: gang tshe zhes bya ba ni dus gang gi tshe na'o //
translated: When means at the time when.

original: gsal zhes bya ba ni dri ma med pa'o //
analyzed: gsal zhes bya ba ni dri ma med pa'o //
translated: Clear means stainless.

original: de'i tshe zhes bya ba ni dus de la'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe zhes bya ba ni dus de la'o //
translated: Then means at that time.

original: kunda lta bu yi zhes bya ba ni kunda'i me tog ltar dkar ba'o //
analyzed: kunda lta bu yi zhes bya ba ni kunda'i me tog ltar dkar ba'o //
translated: Like a jasmine flower means white like a jasmine flower.

original: bde ba zhes bya ba ni bde ba chen po nyid ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bde ba zhes bya ba ni bde ba chen po nyid ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: Bliss means great bliss.

original: de gnyis zhes bya ba ni g-yon pa dang g-yas pa'i rtsa dag go //
analyzed: de gnyis zhes bya ba ni g-yon pa dang g-yas pa'i rtsa dag go //
translated: Those two means the left and right channels.

original: khong du chud pa'i zhes bya ba ni aa ba dh'u t'ir gnas pa'o //
analyzed: khong du chud pa'i zhes bya ba ni aa ba dh'u t'ir gnas pa'o //
translated: Penetrating means abiding in the avadhūtī.

original: me zhes bya ba ni dus kyi me'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: me zhes bya ba ni dus kyi me'i rang bzhin no //
translated: Fire means the nature of the fire of time.

original: yan lag kun la yang zhes bya ba ni yan lag thams cad la thun mong du spyi'i tshul du gnas pa ste /
analyzed: yan lag kun la yang zhes bya ba ni yan lag thams cad la thun mong du spyi'i tshul du gnas pa ste /
translated: In all the limbs means abiding in all the limbs in a general way, in common.

original: khyab @130b byed nyid du zhes bya ba ni lhag ma'o //
analyzed: khyab @130b byed nyid du zhes bya ba ni lhag ma'o //
translated: Pervading means the rest.

original: de ltar rnam pa gnyis kyis me'i drod kyis byang chub kyi sems 'byung ba bstan nas /🔽bar ma dor srid pa 'jug pa brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de ltar rnam pa gnyis kyis me'i drod kyis byang chub kyi sems 'byung ba bstan nas / bar ma dor srid pa 'jug pa brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: Thus, by these two [verses], the arising of the thought of awakening through the heat of fire is taught.

original: sngon las zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: sngon las zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: In order to describe the entry into the intermediate existence, [the root text] says:

original: sngon gyi las kyi stobs kyis so //
analyzed: sngon gyi las kyi stobs kyis so //
translated: Due to previous karma.

original: rlung gi rnam shes ni zhes bya ba ni rlung dang bcas pa'i rnam par shes pa ste /
analyzed: rlung gi rnam shes ni zhes bya ba ni rlung dang bcas pa'i rnam par shes pa ste /
translated: The consciousness of the wind is the consciousness together with the wind,

original: bar ma do'i rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: bar ma do'i rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: the intermediate state consciousness.

original: brgya lam zhes bya ba ni shi ba'i srid pa'i rjes la rgyu mtshan med pa'i gang tsho 'gro bar 'gyur na zhes bya ba ni bar du nyi ma kha cig 'gro bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: brgya lam zhes bya ba ni shi ba'i srid pa'i rjes la rgyu mtshan med pa'i gang tsho 'gro bar 'gyur na zhes bya ba ni bar du nyi ma kha cig 'gro bar 'gyur te /
translated: Sometimes means that after the existence at death, if it goes to the place of rebirth, it goes for some days in the intermediate state.

original: 'khor bar 'gyur ni dri zhim pa dang / dri ngan pa za zhing longs spyod pa'o //
analyzed: 'khor bar 'gyur ni dri zhim pa dang / dri ngan pa za zhing longs spyod pa'o //
translated: Wandering in cyclic existence means enjoying the smell of fragrance and the smell of foulness.

original: de tshe zhes bya ba ni dus gang gi tshe'o //
analyzed: de tshe zhes bya ba ni dus gang gi tshe'o //
translated: At that time means at whatever time.

original: pha yi kha la mtshungs par gnas //
analyzed: pha yi kha la mtshungs par gnas //
translated: It abides in the mouth of the father.

original: zhes bya ba ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i ma mthong nas 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i pha yang mthong ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i ma mthong nas 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i pha yang mthong ste /
translated: Having not seen the mother, he sees the father, who is to be born, and

original: 'di dang lhan cig rol bar byed mi nus pa'o //
analyzed: 'di dang lhan cig rol bar byed mi nus pa'o //
translated: he is not able to enjoy himself with her.

original: mi nus pa zhes bya ba ni phyin ci log gi blo skyes nas pha nye bar gyur pa la yang rol pa bzlog pa'i blos kha la nye bar gnas pa'o //
analyzed: mi nus pa zhes bya ba ni phyin ci log gi blo skyes nas pha nye bar gyur pa la yang rol pa bzlog pa'i blos kha la nye bar gnas pa'o //
translated: Not able means that, having generated a mistaken idea, he turns away from the father who is near and abides near the mother.

original: de'i tshe zhes bya ba ni dus de'i tshe'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe zhes bya ba ni dus de'i tshe'o //
translated: At that time means at that moment.

original: chags pa'i dbang du 'gyur pa zhes bya ba ni ma'i yul la 'khrig pa la dga' bar 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: chags pa'i dbang du 'gyur pa zhes bya ba ni ma'i yul la 'khrig pa la dga' bar 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: He comes under the influence of passion means that he comes to delight in sexual intercourse with the mother.🔽As the Lord has said,

original: ji skad du bcom ldan 'das kyis dus de'i tshe dri za la sems gnyis las sems gzhan rgyu ba yin te /
analyzed: ji skad du bcom ldan 'das kyis dus de'i tshe dri za la sems gnyis las sems gzhan rgyu ba yin te /
translated: At that time, the gandharva, with a mind from among the two minds, moves to another mind.

original: 'di lta ste rjes su chags pa dang lhan cig par 'gyur ba'am /
analyzed: 'di lta ste rjes su chags pa dang lhan cig par 'gyur ba'am /
translated: It becomes one that is accompanied by attachment or

original: khong khro ba dang lhan cig par 'gyur ba zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: khong khro ba dang lhan cig par 'gyur ba zhes bya ba'o //
translated: it becomes one that is accompanied by aversion.

original: slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyi zhal nas kyang /
analyzed: slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyi zhal nas kyang /
translated: And Master Vasubandhu says,

original: dbang po kun tshang thogs med ldan //
analyzed: dbang po kun tshang thogs med ldan //
translated: They have all the faculties, are unimpeded,

original: phyir mi ldog cing dri za ba //
analyzed: phyir mi ldog cing dri za ba //
translated: and eat smells.

original: phyin ci log ba'i blo gros te //
analyzed: phyin ci log ba'i blo gros te //
translated: They have perverted understanding,

original: 'gro ba'i yul la rol par 'dod //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i yul la rol par 'dod //
translated: and want to play with the objects of the world.

original: ces gsungs pa dang / slob dpon chos kyi grags pa'i zhal nas kyang /
analyzed: ces gsungs pa dang / slob dpon chos kyi grags pa'i zhal nas kyang /
translated: And the master Dharmakirti says:

original: sems can gzhan du mi khyer ba //
analyzed: sems can gzhan du mi khyer ba //
translated: They do not take on other sentient beings,

original: dman pa'i skye gnas 'gro ba yang //🔽bdag la chags dang ldan par sdug / bde ba dor ba thob 'dod pas //
analyzed: dman pa'i skye gnas 'gro ba yang // bdag la chags dang ldan par sdug / bde ba dor ba thob 'dod pas //
translated: but go to inferior states of rebirth.🔽They suffer from attachment to self,

original: zhes gsungs so ;
analyzed: zhes gsungs so ;
translated: and want to give up happiness and get pain.

original: / zla mtshan ldan pa'i rtsa zhes bya ba ni dpyid kyi dus dang ldan pa ni zla ba mtshan dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: / zla mtshan ldan pa'i rtsa zhes bya ba ni dpyid kyi dus dang ldan pa ni zla ba mtshan dang ldan pa'o //
translated: The “menstrual channel” is the channel that is associated with the spring season, which is the time of the full moon.

original: gang tshe zhes bya ba ni dus gang gi tshe na'o //
analyzed: gang tshe zhes bya ba ni dus gang gi tshe na'o //
translated: “When” means at what time.

original: rtsa zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i ma'o //
analyzed: rtsa zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i ma'o //
translated: “Channel” is the mother of the arising.

original: me dang nyi ma 'char ba na //
analyzed: me dang nyi ma 'char ba na //
translated: “The sun and fire arise”

original: zhes bya ba ni dbus ma'i gyu ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dbus ma'i gyu ba'o //
translated: means the movement in the central channel.

original: nyi ma ni khrag gi khams 'char ba @131a * //
analyzed: nyi ma ni khrag gi khams 'char ba @131a * //
translated: “The sun” is the arising of the blood element.

original: yod pa ste 'char ba'o //
analyzed: yod pa ste 'char ba'o //
translated: It exists and arises.

original: de tshe zhes bya ba ni dus de'i tshe na'o //
analyzed: de tshe zhes bya ba ni dus de'i tshe na'o //
translated: “At that time” means at that moment.

original: lhag par chags pas zhes bya ba ni khyo dang lhan cig lhag par chags pas non pa ni gzhan dbang du gyur pa'o //
analyzed: lhag par chags pas zhes bya ba ni khyo dang lhan cig lhag par chags pas non pa ni gzhan dbang du gyur pa'o //
translated: “Overcome by excessive passion” means that she is under the control of excessive passion for her husband.

original: gcig tu chags pa zhes bya ba ni sa bon gtong bar 'dod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gcig tu chags pa zhes bya ba ni sa bon gtong bar 'dod par 'gyur ro //
translated: “She is filled with passion” means that she desires to emit the seed.

original: mchog tu zhes bya ba ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i sems can skye ba la cung zad rigs pa'i phyir mchog go //
analyzed: mchog tu zhes bya ba ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i sems can skye ba la cung zad rigs pa'i phyir mchog go //
translated: “Supreme” means that she is supreme because she is slightly more reasonable than the sentient being who is about to be born.

original: rdo rje padma zhes bya ba ni bo la dang kakko la'o //
analyzed: rdo rje padma zhes bya ba ni bo la dang kakko la'o //
translated: “The vajra and lotus” means the penis and vagina.

original: 'dres pa'i gdong zhes bya ba ni phan tshun du chags pa'i ngo bo thob pa'o //
analyzed: 'dres pa'i gdong zhes bya ba ni phan tshun du chags pa'i ngo bo thob pa'o //
translated: “Their faces are joined” means that they attain the nature of mutual passion.

original: 'jug pa zhes bya ba ni rab tu 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: 'jug pa zhes bya ba ni rab tu 'jug pa'o //
translated: “They enter” means that they engage in intercourse.

original: pha'i kha zhes bya ba ni thal mngon par phyogs so //
analyzed: pha'i kha zhes bya ba ni thal mngon par phyogs so //
translated: “The father’s mouth” means that the penis is directed toward the vagina.

original: rlung zhes bya ba ni las kyi rlung gis bskul ba'i bar do zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rlung zhes bya ba ni las kyi rlung gis bskul ba'i bar do zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: “Wind” means that the intermediate-state being is impelled by the wind of karma.

original: de ltar bar ma do'i srid par 'jug pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar bar ma do'i srid par 'jug pa bstan nas /
translated: Having thus explained the entry into the intermediate state,🔽now, in order to explain the entry into the womb, it is said:

original: sa bon 'des pa'i ngo bos rtsa bskyed par brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: sa bon 'des pa'i ngo bos rtsa bskyed par brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: Because it is said that the root is generated by the nature of the seed.

original: de tshe zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de tshe zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, it is said:

original: dus de'i tshe'o //
analyzed: dus de'i tshe'o //
translated: at that time.

original: sa bon du ni zhes bya ba ni pha ma dag gi khu ba dang thigs pa'i ngo bo la'o //
analyzed: sa bon du ni zhes bya ba ni pha ma dag gi khu ba dang thigs pa'i ngo bo la'o //
translated: The seed is in the nature of the father's semen and the mother's blood.

original: 'gyur zhes bya ba na 'byung bar 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: 'gyur zhes bya ba na 'byung bar 'gyur ba'o //
translated: It becomes means it arises.

original: sa bon las ni zhes bya ba ni de ma thag par bshad pas bar ma do'i srid pa brgyal bar 'gyur ba las so //
analyzed: sa bon las ni zhes bya ba ni de ma thag par bshad pas bar ma do'i srid pa brgyal bar 'gyur ba las so //
translated: From the seed means from the intermediate existence that arises immediately after the seed.

original: sems can zhes bya ba ni skye ba'i srid pa la rab tu zhugs pa la'o //
analyzed: sems can zhes bya ba ni skye ba'i srid pa la rab tu zhugs pa la'o //
translated: The sentient being means the one who has entered the birth existence.

original: 'byung zhes bya ba ni 'grub pa ste /
analyzed: 'byung zhes bya ba ni 'grub pa ste /
translated: Arises means it is accomplished.

original: zla ba bcu la sogs pa'i rim gyis 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zla ba bcu la sogs pa'i rim gyis 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it becomes in stages, such as ten months.

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni sa bon yongs su gyur pa las so //
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni sa bon yongs su gyur pa las so //
translated: Therefore means from the transformation of the seed.

original: rtsa las yang dag 'char zhes bya ba ni skye ba'i sems can la rtsa 'byung bas so //
analyzed: rtsa las yang dag 'char zhes bya ba ni skye ba'i sems can la rtsa 'byung bas so //
translated: It arises from the root means that the root of the sentient being arises.

original: yang dag ces bya ba ni mkhas pa'i gang zag gi dgongs pas so //
analyzed: yang dag ces bya ba ni mkhas pa'i gang zag gi dgongs pas so //
translated: The correct is from the perspective of the intention of the person who is skilled.

original: 'bras bu zhes bya ba ni sprul pa'i sku'i rnam pa'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu zhes bya ba ni sprul pa'i sku'i rnam pa'o //
translated: The result is the aspect of the emanation body.

original: ngo mtshar can ni //
analyzed: ngo mtshar can ni //
translated: The wondrous

original: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos nyid la bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir shin tu yang ngo mtshar skyed par byed pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos nyid la bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir shin tu yang ngo mtshar skyed par byed pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: means that because the reality of dependent origination is inconceivable, it is said to generate great wonder.

original: skyes zhes bya ba ni 'byung bar 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: skyes zhes bya ba ni 'byung bar 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The arisen means the meaning of will arise.

original: de ltar sa bon 'dres pa'i ngo bos rtsa 'byung ba brjod nas /
analyzed: de ltar sa bon 'dres pa'i ngo bos rtsa 'byung ba brjod nas /
translated: Having thus described the arising of the nāḍīs through the nature of the mixed seed,

original: byang chub kyi sems mi 'chor bas rtsa rnams mi 'byung ba brjod pa'i phyir /🔽de nyid byang chub sems kyang ni //
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems mi 'chor bas rtsa rnams mi 'byung ba brjod pa'i phyir / de nyid byang chub sems kyang ni //
translated: in order to describe the nonarising of the nāḍīs through the nonemission of bodhicitta,

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: [the tantra] declares,🔽That is also bodhicitta.

original: gnyis ka yang dag par sbyar ba las skyes pa'o //
analyzed: gnyis ka yang dag par sbyar ba las skyes pa'o //
translated: Both are born from the correct union.

original: 'dzin pa'i zhes bya ba ni sngar @131b bshad pa'i rnam pa gsum gyis so //
analyzed: 'dzin pa'i zhes bya ba ni sngar @131b bshad pa'i rnam pa gsum gyis so //
translated: The seizing is through the three aspects explained previously.

original: srog ni bsdus pa'o zhes bya ba ni srog ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rnam pa la bsdus pa ni /
analyzed: srog ni bsdus pa'o zhes bya ba ni srog ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rnam pa la bsdus pa ni /
translated: Life is collected means that life is collected into the aspect of bodhicitta.

original: nang nyid du bzhag par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: nang nyid du bzhag par gyur pa'o //
translated: It is placed inside.

original: de ltar byas par gyur pa la ye shes mchog dang zhes bya ba ni lhan cig skyes pa'i rnam pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar byas par gyur pa la ye shes mchog dang zhes bya ba ni lhan cig skyes pa'i rnam pa'o //
translated: In that way, having done that, the supreme pristine consciousness is the aspect of the connate [joy].

original: de nyid mchog ces bya ba ni don gyis lhan cig skyes pa'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: de nyid mchog ces bya ba ni don gyis lhan cig skyes pa'i ngo bo'o //
translated: That itself is supreme means that the meaning of the connate [joy] is the essence.

original: mchog tu bde zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya chen po'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: mchog tu bde zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya chen po'i ngo bo'o //
translated: Supreme bliss is the essence of mahāmudrā.

original: rmad byung tshe zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags kyi spyod pa'i stobs kyis sangs rgyas nyid thob pa de ni ngo mtshar ba'o //
analyzed: rmad byung tshe zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags kyi spyod pa'i stobs kyis sangs rgyas nyid thob pa de ni ngo mtshar ba'o //
translated: The life of the marvelous is the attainment of buddhahood through the power of the conduct of passion.

original: thob pa ye shes zhes bya ba ni shin tu rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: thob pa ye shes zhes bya ba ni shin tu rtogs pa'o //
translated: The attainment of pristine consciousness is complete realization.

original: ye shes rnal 'byor zhes bya ba ni gdams ngag gi ngo bo thos pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis so //
analyzed: ye shes rnal 'byor zhes bya ba ni gdams ngag gi ngo bo thos pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis so //
translated: The yoga of pristine consciousness is the essence of the oral instructions, which have the characteristics of hearing and so on.

original: mchog tu bde ba zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyi rgyud la mnga' ba'o //
analyzed: mchog tu bde ba zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyi rgyud la mnga' ba'o //
translated: Supreme bliss is possessed by the Bhagavān.

original: bla na med ces bya ba ni 'di las gong na gzhan med pa'i phyir bla na med pa'o //
analyzed: bla na med ces bya ba ni 'di las gong na gzhan med pa'i phyir bla na med pa'o //
translated: The Extensive Explanation of the Seventeenth Chapter🔽from the glorious tantra of Vajramala,🔽the great yoga tantra,🔽called The One Hundred and Fifty Stanzas on the Perfection of Wisdom,🔽the Mother of Conquerors,🔽composed by the great master Chandrakirti.🔽The Extensive Explanation of the Seventeenth Chapter🔽from the glorious tantra of Vajramala,🔽the great yoga tantra,

original: rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i rgya cher 'grel pa /
analyzed: rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i rgya cher 'grel pa /
translated: the extensive commentary called🔽The One That Illuminates the Profound Meaning,🔽the one hundred and fifty stanzas on the perfection of wisdom,

original: pandi ta aa langka ka la shas mdzad pa /
analyzed: pandi ta aa langka ka la shas mdzad pa /
translated: the mother of conquerors,🔽composed by the great master Chandrakirti.🔽The Extensive Explanation of the Eighteenth Chapter🔽from the glorious tantra of Vajramala,🔽the great yoga tantra,🔽the extensive commentary called🔽The One That Illuminates the Profound Meaning,

original: zab mo'i don shin tu gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba las le'u bcu bdun pa'i rgya cher bshad pa'o /
analyzed: zab mo'i don shin tu gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba las le'u bcu bdun pa'i rgya cher bshad pa'o /
translated: the one hundred and fifty stanzas on the perfection of wisdom,🔽the mother of conquerors,🔽composed by the great master Chandrakirti.🔽The Extensive Explanation of the Eighteenth Chapter🔽from the glorious tantra of Vajramala,🔽the great yoga tantra,🔽the extensive commentary called🔽The One That Illuminates the Profound Meaning,🔽the one hundred and fifty stanzas on the perfection of wisdom,

original: // / de ltar le'u bcu bdun pas rtsa'i 'khor lo'i rim pa gnas kyi yul la dri ba'i lan bstan nas /
analyzed: // / de ltar le'u bcu bdun pas rtsa'i 'khor lo'i rim pa gnas kyi yul la dri ba'i lan bstan nas /
translated: the mother of conquerors,🔽composed by the great master Chandrakirti.🔽The Extensive Explanation of the Eighteenth Chapter🔽from the glorious tantra of Vajramala,🔽the great yoga tantra,

original: da ni skabs su bab pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i lus la rtsa'i tshogs kyi yul la dri ba'i lan gdab pa brjod pa'i phyir le'u bco brgyad pa ston par byed cing /
analyzed: da ni skabs su bab pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i lus la rtsa'i tshogs kyi yul la dri ba'i lan gdab pa brjod pa'i phyir le'u bco brgyad pa ston par byed cing /
translated: the extensive commentary called🔽The One That Illuminates the Profound Meaning,🔽the one hundred and fifty stanzas on the perfection of wisdom,🔽the mother of conquerors,🔽composed by the great master Chandrakirti.🔽The Extensive Explanation of the Eighteenth Chapter🔽from the glorious tantra of Vajramala,🔽the great yoga tantra,🔽the extensive commentary called

original: dang por re zhig de rtsom par bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: dang por re zhig de rtsom par bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: The One That Illuminates the Profound Meaning,🔽the one hundred and fifty stanzas on the perfection of wisdom,🔽the mother of conquerors,🔽composed by the great master Chandrakirti.🔽The Extensive Explanation of the Eighteenth Chapter🔽from the glorious tantra of Vajramala,🔽the great yoga tantra,

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: the extensive commentary called🔽The One That Illuminates the Profound Meaning,

original: le'u bcu bdun pa bshad pa'i rjes la'o //
analyzed: le'u bcu bdun pa bshad pa'i rjes la'o //
translated: the one hundred and fifty stanzas on the perfection of wisdom,

original: gzhan yang zhes bya ba ni sngar la ltos pas khyad par can nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan yang zhes bya ba ni sngar la ltos pas khyad par can nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Moreover is a qualifier because it depends on what precedes it.

original: bshad bya zhes bya ba ni brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: bshad bya zhes bya ba ni brjod par bya'o //
translated: The object of explanation is what is to be expressed.

original: rnal 'byor lus la zhes bya ba ni sgom pa po'i lus la'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor lus la zhes bya ba ni sgom pa po'i lus la'o //
translated: In the yogin's body is in the body of the meditator.

original: rim pa ji lta bzhin du rtsa rnams nges pa ni zhes bya ba dang / bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo go rims kyi rtsa rnams nges pa'o //
analyzed: rim pa ji lta bzhin du rtsa rnams nges pa ni zhes bya ba dang / bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo go rims kyi rtsa rnams nges pa'o //
translated: The determination of the channels in their proper order is the determination of the channels in the order of the great-bliss wheel.

original: yang dag ces bya ba ni phyin ci ma log pa'i ngo bos so //
analyzed: yang dag ces bya ba ni phyin ci ma log pa'i ngo bos so //
translated: Correct is by the nature of non-erroneous.

original: brgyud pa yi ni rim gyis skye //
analyzed: brgyud pa yi ni rim gyis skye //
translated: Arises in the order of the lineage.

original: zhes bya ba ni gdams ngag gi brgyud pas 'ongs pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gdams ngag gi brgyud pas 'ongs pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is comes from the lineage of instruction.

original: de ltar rtsom pa'i ngo bo bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar rtsom pa'i ngo bo bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the nature of composition,

original: de nyid sba bar bya ba nyid brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de nyid sba bar bya ba nyid brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to express that very concealment,

original: gsal bar zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: gsal bar zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: he says clearly, etc.

original: @132a * // snod ma yin pa'i skye bo rnams la bstan par bya ba ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: @132a * // snod ma yin pa'i skye bo rnams la bstan par bya ba ma yin pa'o //
translated: It should not be taught to unworthy people.

original: ma gsungs pa zhes bya ba ni ngag tu brjod par bya ba ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: ma gsungs pa zhes bya ba ni ngag tu brjod par bya ba ma yin pa'o //
translated: Not spoken means not expressed in speech.

original: gang du yang zhes bya ba ni bya ba la sogs pa'i rgyud rnams su'o //
analyzed: gang du yang zhes bya ba ni bya ba la sogs pa'i rgyud rnams su'o //
translated: In any way means in the continua of actions, etc.

original: gsal bar ma gsungs pa zhes bya ba ni ma bstan pa'o //
analyzed: gsal bar ma gsungs pa zhes bya ba ni ma bstan pa'o //
translated: Not clearly spoken means not taught.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: skal ba med don du zhes bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: skal ba med don du zhes bya ba gsungs so //
translated: For the sake of those who are not vessels is stated.

original: skye bo zhes bya ba ni sems can rnams la'o //
analyzed: skye bo zhes bya ba ni sems can rnams la'o //
translated: Beings means sentient beings.

original: ji lta bu zhe na /🔽de'i phyir / dad pa'i bsam pa rnams spangs pa //
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na / de'i phyir / dad pa'i bsam pa rnams spangs pa //
translated: What kind?🔽Therefore,

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: it is stated: Those who have abandoned the intention of faith.

original: khyad par du 'phags pa'i bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung la yid ches pa'i ngo bo 'dod pa'i bsam pa dang rnam par spangs pa ni bral ba rnams la zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: khyad par du 'phags pa'i bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung la yid ches pa'i ngo bo 'dod pa'i bsam pa dang rnam par spangs pa ni bral ba rnams la zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of those who have abandoned, who are devoid of, the intention of desire, the nature of confidence in the exalted speech of the Bhagavān is stated.

original: snyigs ma lnga zhes bya ba'i dus zhes bya ba ni tshe dang / lta ba dang / sems can dang / nyon mongs pa dang / bskal pa'i snyigs ma dang ldan pa la'o //
analyzed: snyigs ma lnga zhes bya ba'i dus zhes bya ba ni tshe dang / lta ba dang / sems can dang / nyon mongs pa dang / bskal pa'i snyigs ma dang ldan pa la'o //
translated: The time of the five degenerations means the time endowed with the degenerations of life, view, sentient beings, afflictions, and eon.

original: snod du bya bar 'dod pa yis //
analyzed: snod du bya bar 'dod pa yis //
translated: With the intention of making a vessel,

original: zhes bya ba ni snod du bya ba'i bsam pas so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni snod du bya ba'i bsam pas so //
translated: means with the intention of making a vessel.

original: sems can myur du dngos grub don //
analyzed: sems can myur du dngos grub don //
translated: The meaning of quickly attaining power for sentient beings
