original: zhes bya ba ni de nyid ni lhan cig @138a * //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de nyid ni lhan cig @138a * //
translated: That itself is the supreme moment.🔽That itself is the supreme moment of maturation.🔽That itself is the supreme moment of maturation.🔽That itself is the supreme moment of maturation.🔽That itself is the supreme moment of maturation.🔽That itself is the supreme moment of maturation.🔽That itself is the supreme moment of maturation.🔽That itself is the supreme moment of maturation.🔽That itself is the supreme moment of maturation.🔽That itself is the supreme moment of maturation.🔽That itself is the supreme moment of maturation.🔽That itself is the supreme moment of maturation.🔽That itself is the supreme moment of maturation.🔽That itself is the supreme moment of maturation.🔽That itself is the supreme moment of maturation.🔽That itself is the supreme moment of maturation.🔽That itself is the supreme moment of maturation.🔽That itself is the supreme moment of maturation.🔽That itself is the supreme moment of maturation.🔽That itself is the supreme moment of maturation.🔽That itself is the supreme moment of maturation.🔽That itself is the supreme moment of maturation.🔽That itself is the supreme moment of maturation.🔽That itself is the supreme moment of maturation.🔽That itself is the supreme moment of maturation.🔽That itself is the supreme moment of maturation.🔽That itself is the supreme moment of maturation.🔽That itself is the supreme moment of maturation.🔽That itself is the supreme moment of maturation.🔽That itself is the supreme moment of maturation.🔽That itself is the supreme moment of maturation.🔽That itself is the supreme moment of maturation.🔽That itself is the supreme moment of maturation.🔽That itself is the supreme moment of maturation.🔽That itself is the supreme moment of maturation.🔽That itself is the supreme moment of maturation.🔽That itself

original: skyes pa'i rgyu'i rgyu zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: skyes pa'i rgyu'i rgyu zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: It should be called the cause of the cause of generation.

original: lte ba'i dbus na rab gsal la gnas //
analyzed: lte ba'i dbus na rab gsal la gnas //
translated: It is located in the middle of the navel, shining.

original: zhes bya ba ni las kyi rlung dang sbyar bas 'bar ba'i phyir rab gsal la'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni las kyi rlung dang sbyar bas 'bar ba'i phyir rab gsal la'o //
translated: It is shining because it blazes by being connected with the karmavāyu.

original: lte ba'i dbus na gnas zhes bya ba ni sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i dbus na gnas pa'o //
analyzed: lte ba'i dbus na gnas zhes bya ba ni sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i dbus na gnas pa'o //
translated: It is located in the middle of the navel, in the center of the emanation cakra.

original: gtum mo yang zhes bya ba ni gtum mo'i las byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gtum mo yang zhes bya ba ni gtum mo'i las byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Caṇḍālī is also the one who performs the function of caṇḍālī.

original: rnam rtog 'joms zhes bya ba ni sngags la sogs pa'i rnam rtog 'joms pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam rtog 'joms zhes bya ba ni sngags la sogs pa'i rnam rtog 'joms pa'i phyir ro //
translated: She is the one who destroys conceptuality because she destroys the conceptuality of mantra and so on.

original: ci zhig byas nas she na /
analyzed: ci zhig byas nas she na /
translated: What does she do?

original: de'i phyir bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo'i zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo'i zhes gsungs te /
translated: Therefore it says, “in the great-bliss cakra,”

original: mgo bor gnas pa'o //
analyzed: mgo bor gnas pa'o //
translated: located in the head.

original: zhu bar byed pa zhes bya ba ni 'dzag par byed pa'o //
analyzed: zhu bar byed pa zhes bya ba ni 'dzag par byed pa'o //
translated: She causes the melting, that is, the dripping.

original: mchog gi cha ni zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi ngo bo'o //
analyzed: mchog gi cha ni zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi ngo bo'o //
translated: The supreme part is the bodhicitta, which is the essence of the moon maṇḍala.

original: dga' bral nyams su myong ba ni /
analyzed: dga' bral nyams su myong ba ni /
translated: The experience of the separation from joy🔽is the supreme bliss.

original: dga' bral nyams su myong ba'i gnas skabs zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: dga' bral nyams su myong ba'i gnas skabs zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The meaning of the expression “the experience of the separation from joy” is the same.

original: bde ba dang kun rdzob pa rtogs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: bde ba dang kun rdzob pa rtogs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because of the nature of the realization of bliss and the conventional.

original: rnam 'joms skad cig mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: rnam 'joms skad cig mtshan nyid do //
translated: The moment of the destruction of the atom is the characteristic.

original: zhes bya ba ni ji skad du rnam 'joms mthong ba zhes brjod de /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ji skad du rnam 'joms mthong ba zhes brjod de /
translated: This is what is said in the Vajraḍāka:

original: bde ba bdag gis longs spyod do //🔽zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bde ba bdag gis longs spyod do // zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “I enjoy the bliss.”

original: de la ro gcig dngos po ni //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de la ro gcig dngos po ni // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The state of one taste is the entity.

original: gtum mos gdungs pa'i byang chub kyi sems lhung ba'i de ma thag par ro //
analyzed: gtum mos gdungs pa'i byang chub kyi sems lhung ba'i de ma thag par ro //
translated: The moment of the fall of the bodhicitta melted by caṇḍālī.

original: ro gcig par gyur pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi khams so //
analyzed: ro gcig par gyur pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi khams so //
translated: The element of the bodhicitta that has become of one taste.

original: rtsa ni gcig gi rgyud la brten //
analyzed: rtsa ni gcig gi rgyud la brten //
translated: It is based on the continuum of one nāḍī.

original: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje'i rtsa gcig las 'bab pas na /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje'i rtsa gcig las 'bab pas na /
translated: Because it descends from the one vajra nāḍī,

original: rtsa gcig gi rgyun las 'bab pa'o //
analyzed: rtsa gcig gi rgyun las 'bab pa'o //
translated: it descends from the continuum of one nāḍī.

original: bde ba chen po'i go 'phang zhes bya ba ni de nyams su myong ba sngon du 'gro bas lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba skyed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i go 'phang zhes bya ba ni de nyams su myong ba sngon du 'gro bas lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba skyed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The state called “great bliss” is so called because it produces the innate bliss that is preceded by the experience of that bliss.

original: zhi zhes bya ba ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs 'joms pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhi zhes bya ba ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs 'joms pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “ Peace” is so called because it conquers the opposing side.

original: lhan cig skyes dga'i mtshan nyid ni //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes dga'i mtshan nyid ni //
translated: The characteristic of innate joy

original: zhes bya ba ni ma bcos pa'i nyams su myong ba'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ma bcos pa'i nyams su myong ba'i ngo bo'o //
translated: is the nature of unfabricated experience.

original: mtshan nyid dang bral skad cig ces bya ba ni de las gzhan pa'i gnas skabs gsum gyi mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mtshan nyid dang bral skad cig ces bya ba ni de las gzhan pa'i gnas skabs gsum gyi mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
translated: “ Free from characteristics” is so called because it is free from the characteristics of the three other states.

original: ji skad du ;
analyzed: ji skad du ;
translated: As it is said:

original: mtshan nyid bral ba gsum las gzhan //🔽chags dang chags bral rnam par spangs //
analyzed: mtshan nyid bral ba gsum las gzhan // chags dang chags bral rnam par spangs //
translated: Free from the three characteristics,

original: zhes bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs so //
translated: it is free from attachment and nonattachment.

original: bde ba'i zhes bya ba ni gdams ngag gi rjes su 'brangs nas bsgom pa rab kyi mthar thug par grub pas rtag tu dga' ba'i rang bzhin gyi phyir ro //
analyzed: bde ba'i zhes bya ba ni gdams ngag gi rjes su 'brangs nas bsgom pa rab kyi mthar thug par grub pas rtag tu dga' ba'i rang bzhin gyi phyir ro //
translated: “ Bliss” is so called because it is the nature of constant joy due to the accomplishment of the highest meditation that follows the instructions.

original: gsungs zhes bya ba ni @138b brjod pa'o //
analyzed: gsungs zhes bya ba ni @138b brjod pa'o //
translated: The word says is a verbal prefix.

original: mchog tu rmad du byung zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags kyi spyod pa'i stobs kyis byang chub mngon du byed pa'i rnam pa'o //
analyzed: mchog tu rmad du byung zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags kyi spyod pa'i stobs kyis byang chub mngon du byed pa'i rnam pa'o //
translated: The word supreme is the form of enlightenment that is manifested by the power of the practice of passion.

original: de ltar rnam pa gnyis kyis lugs las 'byung ba'i rim pas de'i rnam par dbye ba bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar rnam pa gnyis kyis lugs las 'byung ba'i rim pas de'i rnam par dbye ba bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having taught the analysis of that [process] in the forward order by means of two aspects,

original: lugs las bzlog pa'i rim pas de'i rnam par dbye ba bshad pa'i phyir /
analyzed: lugs las bzlog pa'i rim pas de'i rnam par dbye ba bshad pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to explain the analysis of that [process] in the reverse order, [the Bhagavān] declares,

original: rlung gi de nyid rjes 'gro bas //🔽zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: rlung gi de nyid rjes 'gro bas // zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Following the reality of the winds,

original: le'u bcu gnyis par gsungs pa'i rim pa'i rlung gi de nyid sgom pa'i rim pas so //
analyzed: le'u bcu gnyis par gsungs pa'i rim pa'i rlung gi de nyid sgom pa'i rim pas so //
translated: [means] by the process of meditation on the reality of the winds, which is taught in the twelfth chapter.

original: de nyid ces bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems so //
analyzed: de nyid ces bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems so //
translated: The word reality [refers to] the bodhicitta.

original: rgyun ni steng song nas zhes bya ba ni slar yang rdo rje'i lam nas /
analyzed: rgyun ni steng song nas zhes bya ba ni slar yang rdo rje'i lam nas /
translated: The word continuously [means] having gone above, [that is,] having gone again through the vajra path,

original: bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo'i bar du khyer bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo'i bar du khyer bar byed pa'o //
translated: [the bodhicitta] is carried up to the great-bliss wheel.

original: rnal 'byor pas ni zhes bya ba ni rlung gi de kho na nyid sgom pa pos so //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pas ni zhes bya ba ni rlung gi de kho na nyid sgom pa pos so //
translated: The word yogin [refers to] the one who meditates on the reality of the winds.

original: sgrub par byed pa'i zhes bya ba ni rlung gi de kho na nyid la goms par bya ba'i phyir /🔽byang chub kyi sems la'o //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa'i zhes bya ba ni rlung gi de kho na nyid la goms par bya ba'i phyir / byang chub kyi sems la'o //
translated: “The one who accomplishes” is the one who is familiar with the reality of the wind.

original: de la sprul pa'i 'khor lo ni //
analyzed: de la sprul pa'i 'khor lo ni //
translated: “The mind of enlightenment” is the bodhicitta.🔽“In the emanation wheel”

original: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje'i rtse mo las sprul pa'i 'khor lor thob pa la'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje'i rtse mo las sprul pa'i 'khor lor thob pa la'o //
translated: means in the emanation wheel obtained from the tip of the vajra.

original: dga' ba zhes bya rnam par shes //
analyzed: dga' ba zhes bya rnam par shes //
translated: “The consciousness called ‘joy’

original: zhes bya ba ni cung zad bde ba'i rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni cung zad bde ba'i rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: ” means that it has the nature of a little bliss.

original: bde ba kun gyi yang dag rten //
analyzed: bde ba kun gyi yang dag rten //
translated: “The true basis of all bliss”

original: zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bde ba'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bde ba'i rang bzhin no //
translated: means that it has the nature of mundane and supramundane bliss.

original: rnam pa sna tshogs skad cig gsungs //
analyzed: rnam pa sna tshogs skad cig gsungs //
translated: “The moment of various aspects”

original: zhes bya ba ni rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i bde ba la nye bar dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i bde ba la nye bar dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: means that it is observed as the bliss of various aspects.

original: stong nyid kun gyi gzhi yi mchog / ces bya ba ni rtag tu rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: stong nyid kun gyi gzhi yi mchog / ces bya ba ni rtag tu rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: “The supreme basis of all emptiness” means that it is the cause of the constant natural luminosity.

original: mchog ces bya ba ni mchog gi rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: mchog ces bya ba ni mchog gi rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The supreme is so called because it is the nature of the supreme.

original: chos kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni snying ga las so ;
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni snying ga las so ;
translated: The Dharma wheel is at the heart.

original: / steng zhes bya ba ni lugs las bzlog pas so //
analyzed: / steng zhes bya ba ni lugs las bzlog pas so //
translated: Above is in the reverse order.

original: bsgrub bya zhes bya ba ni sngon bzhin du byang chub kyi sems dbang du gyur pa la'o //
analyzed: bsgrub bya zhes bya ba ni sngon bzhin du byang chub kyi sems dbang du gyur pa la'o //
translated: The object of attainment is the bodhicitta, as before, which is brought under control.

original: rnal 'byor pa'i zhes bya ba ni sngar bzhin no //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa'i zhes bya ba ni sngar bzhin no //
translated: The yogi/nī is as before.

original: gnas skabs zhes bya ba ni bde ba'i gnas skabs so //
analyzed: gnas skabs zhes bya ba ni bde ba'i gnas skabs so //
translated: The state is the state of bliss.

original: mchog dga' zhes bya ba ni de'i ming gi brjod pas bya ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: mchog dga' zhes bya ba ni de'i ming gi brjod pas bya ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The supreme joy is so called because it is the activity of the expression of that name.

original: rnam smin skad cig ces bya ba ni sngon gyi gnas skabs las rnam par smin pa'i phyir ro //🔽longs spyod 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni steng du byed pa'i skad cig la ste /🔽byang chub kyi sems steng du rgyu ba'i skad cig la'o //
analyzed: rnam smin skad cig ces bya ba ni sngon gyi gnas skabs las rnam par smin pa'i phyir ro // longs spyod 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni steng du byed pa'i skad cig la ste / byang chub kyi sems steng du rgyu ba'i skad cig la'o //
translated: The moment of full ripening is so called because it is the full ripening of the previous state.🔽The enjoyment wheel is above, in the moment of the upward movement of the bodhicitta.

original: gnas skabs bral ba'i dga' ba ni //
analyzed: gnas skabs bral ba'i dga' ba ni //
translated: The state of separation from joy is the moment of the upward movement of the bodhicitta.🔽The supreme joy is the moment of the downward movement of the bodhicitta.

original: zhes bya ba ni dga' bral @139a * //🔽gyi gnas skabs su'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dga' bral @139a * // gyi gnas skabs su'o //
translated: This is the state of the separation from joy.🔽The moment of the characteristic of the separation from joy.🔽This is the state of the separation from joy.

original: rnam nyed skad cig mtshan nyid ni //
analyzed: rnam nyed skad cig mtshan nyid ni //
translated: The moment of the characteristic of the separation from joy.🔽This is the state of the separation from joy.🔽The moment of the characteristic of the separation from joy.🔽This is the state of the separation from joy.🔽The moment of the characteristic of the separation from joy.

original: zhes bya ba ni longs spyod kyi 'khor lo'i byang chub kyi sems thob pa'i rnam par rtog pa khyad par du 'joms pa'i phyir mi mthun pa'i phyogs bzlog pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni longs spyod kyi 'khor lo'i byang chub kyi sems thob pa'i rnam par rtog pa khyad par du 'joms pa'i phyir mi mthun pa'i phyogs bzlog pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is the state of the separation from joy.

original: bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo che //
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo che //
translated: The moment of the characteristic of the separation from joy.

original: zhes bya ba ni mgo bo'i gnas su'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mgo bo'i gnas su'o //
translated: This is the state of the separation from joy.

original: de thob mtshan nyid skad cig ma //
analyzed: de thob mtshan nyid skad cig ma //
translated: The moment of the characteristic of the separation from joy.🔽This is the state of the separation from joy.🔽The moment of the characteristic of the separation from joy.🔽This is the state of the separation from joy.🔽The moment of the characteristic of the separation from joy.

original: zhes bya ba ni bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo'i zla dang lhan cig tu sems kyi thig le gyen du rgyu ba dang 'dres pa'i skad cig la'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo'i zla dang lhan cig tu sems kyi thig le gyen du rgyu ba dang 'dres pa'i skad cig la'o //
translated: This is the state of the separation from joy.🔽The moment of the characteristic of the separation from joy.🔽This is the state of the separation from joy.🔽The moment of the characteristic of the separation from joy.🔽This is the state of the separation from joy.🔽The moment of the characteristic of the separation from joy.🔽This is the state of the separation from joy.🔽The moment of the characteristic of the separation from joy.🔽This is the state of the separation from joy.🔽The moment of the characteristic of the separation from joy.🔽This is the state of the separation from joy.🔽The moment of the characteristic of the separation from joy.🔽This is the state of the separation from joy.🔽The moment of the characteristic of the separation from joy.🔽This is the state of the separation from joy.🔽The moment of the characteristic of the separation from joy.🔽This is the state of the separation from joy.🔽The moment of the characteristic of the separation from joy.🔽This is the state of the separation from joy.

original: lhan cig skyes pa'i gnas skabs ni //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa'i gnas skabs ni //
translated: The moment of the characteristic of the separation from joy.

original: zhes bya ba ni de'i ming gis brjod par gyur pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de'i ming gis brjod par gyur pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: This is the state of the separation from joy.

original: mtshan nyid dang bral skad cig go //
analyzed: mtshan nyid dang bral skad cig go //
translated: The moment of the characteristic of the separation from joy.

original: zhes bya ba ni chags pa dang chags bral las grol ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni chags pa dang chags bral las grol ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: This is the state of the separation from joy.

original: de ltar lugs las bzlog pa'i rim pas de'i rnam par dbye ba bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar lugs las bzlog pa'i rim pas de'i rnam par dbye ba bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the analysis of that in the reverse order,

original: rtsa rnams kyi nam mkha' la rnal 'byor pa'i tshogs kyi nges pa brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rtsa rnams kyi nam mkha' la rnal 'byor pa'i tshogs kyi nges pa brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to state the certainty of the assembly of yoginīs in the space of the channels,

original: de'i yan lag rang gi ngo bo bstan pa sngon du 'gro bas de rnams kyi bya ba bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de'i yan lag rang gi ngo bo bstan pa sngon du 'gro bas de rnams kyi bya ba bstan pa ni /
translated: he teaches their function, preceded by the teaching of their nature.

original: rtsa rnams kun gyi nam mkha' che //🔽zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: rtsa rnams kun gyi nam mkha' che // zhes gsungs te /
translated: The space of all the channels is great.

original: 'khor lo bzhi rnams sam 'khor lo drug gi rtsa'i nam mkha' khong stong gi ngo bo la'o //
analyzed: 'khor lo bzhi rnams sam 'khor lo drug gi rtsa'i nam mkha' khong stong gi ngo bo la'o //
translated: It is in the space, the nature of emptiness, of the four or six cakras.

original: rnal 'byor ma tshogs yang dag brten //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma tshogs yang dag brten //
translated: The assembly of yoginīs is well-established.

original: zhes bya ba ni las dang rdo rje dang / padma la sogs pa'i ming gis 'chad par 'gyur ba'i le'u nyi shu rtsa bdun pa las so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni las dang rdo rje dang / padma la sogs pa'i ming gis 'chad par 'gyur ba'i le'u nyi shu rtsa bdun pa las so //
translated: This is from the twenty-seventh chapter, which will be explained by the names of the action, vajra, lotus, and so on.

original: rab sad ces bya ba ni rang nyid kyi ngo bo rab tu sad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rab sad ces bya ba ni rang nyid kyi ngo bo rab tu sad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The “awakened one” is so called because of the awakening of one’s own nature.

original: de las zhes bya ba ni rab tu sad pa'i rjes la'o //
analyzed: de las zhes bya ba ni rab tu sad pa'i rjes la'o //
translated: “From that” is after the awakening.

original: gnas skabs mtshan nyid gcig pa zhes bya ba ni lhan cig skyes pa'i de kho na nyid thob pas khams ro mtshungs pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gnas skabs mtshan nyid gcig pa zhes bya ba ni lhan cig skyes pa'i de kho na nyid thob pas khams ro mtshungs pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The so-called “single characteristic” is the meaning of the “equal taste of the elements” through attaining the connate suchness.

original: yul chen po ni nyams su myong //
analyzed: yul chen po ni nyams su myong //
translated: The “great object” is experienced.

original: zhes bya ba ni gnyis ka dang sbyor ba'i dbang gis lhan cig skyes pa'i rnam pa'i yul la myong bar byas nas so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gnyis ka dang sbyor ba'i dbang gis lhan cig skyes pa'i rnam pa'i yul la myong bar byas nas so //
translated: Having experienced the object of the aspect of the connate [joy] through the power of both,

original: yang na go tsa ra zhes bya ste /
analyzed: yang na go tsa ra zhes bya ste /
translated: or, alternatively, go-ca-ra means

original: go ni rdo rje ste /
analyzed: go ni rdo rje ste /
translated: go is a vajra,

original: de la tsar ni spyod pa la kun rdzob kyi byang chub sems kyi rnam pa'o //
analyzed: de la tsar ni spyod pa la kun rdzob kyi byang chub sems kyi rnam pa'o //
translated: and ca-ra is the relative bodhicitta that moves in it.

original: de nyid la 'dzin par byed pa'i phyir chen po'o //
analyzed: de nyid la 'dzin par byed pa'i phyir chen po'o //
translated: Since it is held in that, it is great.

original: slar yang rnam 'gyur med par 'gro //
analyzed: slar yang rnam 'gyur med par 'gro //
translated: Again, it goes without change.

original: zhes bya ba ni las dang po pa la ltos nas de skad brjod pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni las dang po pa la ltos nas de skad brjod pa'o //
translated: That is said in dependence on a beginner.

original: las dang po pa yin pa la ltos nas de rnams la nam yang 'gyur ba med pa'o //
analyzed: las dang po pa yin pa la ltos nas de rnams la nam yang 'gyur ba med pa'o //
translated: In dependence on being a beginner, they are never changed.

original: rtag tu lhan cig skyes pa'i ngo bo las de rnams ma g-yos @139b pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtag tu lhan cig skyes pa'i ngo bo las de rnams ma g-yos @139b pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they never move from the nature that is connate.

original: de ltar rang gi ngo bo bstan pa sngon du 'gro bas /
analyzed: de ltar rang gi ngo bo bstan pa sngon du 'gro bas /
translated: Thus, having first taught their nature,

original: de rnams kyis bya ba brjod nas /
analyzed: de rnams kyis bya ba brjod nas /
translated: he describes their functions.🔽In order to explain their purity,

original: rnam par dag pa bshad pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rnam par dag pa bshad pa'i phyir /
translated: he says,🔽The final stage of arousal

original: rab tu sad pa'i gnas skabs mtha' //
analyzed: rab tu sad pa'i gnas skabs mtha' //
translated: The final stage is that of complete enlightenment.🔽

original: zhes bya ba ni de ma thag par bshad pa ltar lugs su 'byung ba'i rim pas dga' ba la sogs pa bzhi dang sna tshogs la sogs pa skad cig ma bzhi'i ngo bo dang / de bzhin du lugs las bzlog pa'i rim pas kyang brgyad du gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de ma thag par bshad pa ltar lugs su 'byung ba'i rim pas dga' ba la sogs pa bzhi dang sna tshogs la sogs pa skad cig ma bzhi'i ngo bo dang / de bzhin du lugs las bzlog pa'i rim pas kyang brgyad du gsungs so //
translated: As just explained, the four joys beginning with joy and the four moments beginning with the varied are said to be eight in number, both in the forward order and in the reverse order.🔽The sixteen emptinesses

original: stong nyid bcu drug bdag nyid can //
analyzed: stong nyid bcu drug bdag nyid can //
translated: The sixteen emptinesses.🔽

original: zhes bya ba ni nang stong pa nyid la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni nang stong pa nyid la sogs pa ste /
translated: are the emptiness of the inner and so forth.

original: grangs mtshungs pa dang mtshan nyid mtshungs pas so //
analyzed: grangs mtshungs pa dang mtshan nyid mtshungs pas so //
translated: They are the same in number and the same in nature.

original: bde chen go 'phang zhes bya ba ni lhan cig skyes pa'i ngo bo ye shes dang khyad par med pa'o //
analyzed: bde chen go 'phang zhes bya ba ni lhan cig skyes pa'i ngo bo ye shes dang khyad par med pa'o //
translated: The state of great bliss is the exalted wisdom that is connate with bliss, which is inseparable from the nature of the mind.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang gnas //🔽zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang gnas // zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Because of the state of Vajrasattva.

original: don dam byang chub kyi sems kyi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: don dam byang chub kyi sems kyi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because of the nature of the ultimate mind of enlightenment.

original: de ltar rnam pa gnyis kyis rtsa'i nam mkha' la rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs gnas pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar rnam pa gnyis kyis rtsa'i nam mkha' la rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs gnas pa bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having taught the location of the assembly of yoginis in the space of the channels by means of the two,

original: nye bar bsdu ba brjod pa'i phyir /🔽de ltar 'di ni dga' byed pa //
analyzed: nye bar bsdu ba brjod pa'i phyir / de ltar 'di ni dga' byed pa //
translated: in order to state the summary,

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: he says, thus, this is the delight.

original: de ltar zhes bya ba ni sngar bshad pa'i rigs pas so //
analyzed: de ltar zhes bya ba ni sngar bshad pa'i rigs pas so //
translated: Thus means by the reasoning explained previously.

original: dga' ba bzhi po rnams kyi rnam par dbye ba ni khyad par ro //
analyzed: dga' ba bzhi po rnams kyi rnam par dbye ba ni khyad par ro //
translated: The analysis of the four delights is the distinction.

original: gang du'ang gsal bar ma gsungs so //
analyzed: gang du'ang gsal bar ma gsungs so //
translated: It is not stated clearly anywhere.

original: zhes bya ba ni snod dang mi ldan pa'i sems can rnams las pa bar bya ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni snod dang mi ldan pa'i sems can rnams las pa bar bya ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because of the need to conceal it from sentient beings who are not suitable vessels.

original: rnal 'byor ma yi bka' drin gyis //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma yi bka' drin gyis //
translated: By the kindness of the yoginis,

original: zhes bya ba ni ye shes mkha' 'gro ma'i man ngag gi stobs kyis so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ye shes mkha' 'gro ma'i man ngag gi stobs kyis so //
translated: means by the power of the instructions of the dakinis of primordial wisdom.

original: shes par bya zhes bya ba ni rtogs par bya ba'o //
analyzed: shes par bya zhes bya ba ni rtogs par bya ba'o //
translated: To be known means to be realized.

original: bla ma'i zhal las shes zhes bya ba ni rdo rje slob dpon gyi zhal las zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bla ma'i zhal las shes zhes bya ba ni rdo rje slob dpon gyi zhal las zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: From the guru's mouth means from the mouth of the vajra master.

original: rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i rgya cher 'grel pa pandi ta aa langka ka la shas mdzad pa /
analyzed: rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i rgya cher 'grel pa pandi ta aa langka ka la shas mdzad pa /
translated: This concludes the commentary on the twenty-first chapter of the glorious tantra of Vajramala,

original: zab mo'i don shin tu gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba las le'u nyi shu pa'i rgya cher bshad pa'o /
analyzed: zab mo'i don shin tu gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba las le'u nyi shu pa'i rgya cher bshad pa'o /
translated: called the elucidation of the profound meaning.

original: // / de ltar le'u nyi shu pas dga' ba la sogs pa'i rnam par dbye ba'i yul la dri ba'i lan brjod nas /
analyzed: // / de ltar le'u nyi shu pas dga' ba la sogs pa'i rnam par dbye ba'i yul la dri ba'i lan brjod nas /
translated: Thus, having stated the reply to the question regarding the classification of joy and so forth,

original: da ni thig le gsum gyi rnam par dbye ba'i yul la dri ba'i lan brjod pa bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni thig le gsum gyi rnam par dbye ba'i yul la dri ba'i lan brjod pa bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: now, in order to demonstrate the reply to the question regarding the classification of the three bindus,

original: le'u nyi shu rtsa gcig pa ston par byed cing /
analyzed: le'u nyi shu rtsa gcig pa ston par byed cing /
translated: the twenty-first chapter is taught.

original: dang por re zhig de rtsom par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: dang por re zhig de rtsom par bstan pa ni /
translated: First, in order to demonstrate the composition of that chapter,

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa @140a * //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa @140a * //
translated: it says then, and so on.

original: gsungs te / le'u nyi shu pa bshad pa'i rjes la'o //
analyzed: gsungs te / le'u nyi shu pa bshad pa'i rjes la'o //
translated: The and is to be connected with the twenty-first chapter.

original: gzhan yang zhes bya ba ni sngar la ltos pa dang tha dad pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan yang zhes bya ba ni sngar la ltos pa dang tha dad pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Moreover is in contrast to previously.

original: nyon zhes bya ba ni phyag na rdo rje thos pa la sbyar ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: nyon zhes bya ba ni phyag na rdo rje thos pa la sbyar ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Listen is to apply the ear to Vajrapani.

original: thig le gsum ni bshad par bya //
analyzed: thig le gsum ni bshad par bya //
translated: The three drops are to be explained.

original: zhes bya ba dang 'brel to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba dang 'brel to //
translated: This is connected with are to be explained.

original: rdzas dang sngags dang ; 'od kyi ngo bo nyid kyis mtshungs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rdzas dang sngags dang ; 'od kyi ngo bo nyid kyis mtshungs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because of the sameness of substance, mantra, and light,

original: bla na med pa zhes bya ba ni bla na med pa'i ngag 'od gsal ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: bla na med pa zhes bya ba ni bla na med pa'i ngag 'od gsal ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Unsurpassed is because of the unsurpassed luminosity of speech.

original: des ci zhig byed ce na /
analyzed: des ci zhig byed ce na /
translated: What does it do?

original: de'i phyir gang gis zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir gang gis zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, it is said by which.

original: thig le gsum gyis so //
analyzed: thig le gsum gyis so //
translated: By the three drops.

original: shes pa tsam gyis zhes bya ba ni thos pa la sogs pa'i rim pas khong du chud pa tsam gyis so //
analyzed: shes pa tsam gyis zhes bya ba ni thos pa la sogs pa'i rim pas khong du chud pa tsam gyis so //
translated: By mere knowledge is by mere understanding through the stages of hearing and so on.

original: dngos grub 'gyur zhes bya ba ni sems bstan pa'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: dngos grub 'gyur zhes bya ba ni sems bstan pa'i ngo bo'o //
translated: Accomplishment is the nature of the taught mind.

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How?

original: de'i rnal 'byor pa'i zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i rnal 'byor pa'i zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: The yogin of that is stated.

original: rim pa gnyis sgom pa la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: rim pa gnyis sgom pa la gnas pa'o //
translated: He abides in the meditation of the two stages.

original: de ltar de rtsom pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar de rtsom pa bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the composition of that,

original: dngos su de brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: dngos su de brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to actually state that,

original: de'i yan lag gi thig le gsum gyi ngo bo rdzas kyi thig le bshad pa ni /
analyzed: de'i yan lag gi thig le gsum gyi ngo bo rdzas kyi thig le bshad pa ni /
translated: the explanation of the substance drop, which is the essence of the three drops that are its branches, is as follows:

original: rtsa rnams kun du dbab pa dang // zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: rtsa rnams kun du dbab pa dang // zhes gsungs te /
translated: The descent is into all the channels.

original: phyi rol gyi thabs shes rab snyoms pas lus su gtogs pa'i rtsa rnams thams cad la dbab pa ni gzhug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyi rol gyi thabs shes rab snyoms pas lus su gtogs pa'i rtsa rnams thams cad la dbab pa ni gzhug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The descent is into all the channels belonging to the body through the external method and wisdom entering into union.

original: byang chub sems ni zhes bya ba ni kun rdzob kyi rnam pa bde ba chen po'i gnas su zhu bar gyur nas 'byung ba ste de las so //
analyzed: byang chub sems ni zhes bya ba ni kun rdzob kyi rnam pa bde ba chen po'i gnas su zhu bar gyur nas 'byung ba ste de las so //
translated: The awakened mind is the relative aspect, which melts into the place of great bliss and arises from that.

original: bstan byas pa zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rigs pas bstan par byas pa'o //
analyzed: bstan byas pa zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rigs pas bstan par byas pa'o //
translated: The taught is taught by the reasoning that will be explained.

original: sems de nyid las thabs shes rab kyi ngo bo sgom pa po la ltos pas so //
analyzed: sems de nyid las thabs shes rab kyi ngo bo sgom pa po la ltos pas so //
translated: The mind itself is the meditation of the essence of method and wisdom in dependence on the meditator.

original: rdo rje'i rtse dang padma'i rtser //
analyzed: rdo rje'i rtse dang padma'i rtser //
translated: At the tip of the vajra and the tip of the lotus,

original: rlung ni gzung ba'i skad cig la //
analyzed: rlung ni gzung ba'i skad cig la //
translated: The wind is held in the moment of retention.

original: zhes bya ba ni rlung ni srog gi rlung ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rlung ni srog gi rlung ste /
translated: The wind is the life-force wind.

original: rnal 'byor mchog gis thob par byed //
analyzed: rnal 'byor mchog gis thob par byed //
translated: The supreme yogī should attain it.

original: ces bya ba dang 'brel to //
analyzed: ces bya ba dang 'brel to //
translated: This is the connection.

original: gzhan yang thabs gang gis rdzas kyi thig le gzung bar bya zhe na /
analyzed: gzhan yang thabs gang gis rdzas kyi thig le gzung bar bya zhe na /
translated: Moreover, by what means should the substance drop be held?🔽Therefore it is said:

original: de'i phyir / rkan la yi ge'i sbyor ba dang // zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir / rkan la yi ge'i sbyor ba dang // zhes gsungs te /
translated: The union of the letters on the palate,

original: rkan ni chos 'byung gi dbus su shin tu ring ba'i rtsa'i ngo bo'o //🔽de la sdebs pa'i sbyor ba ni shin tu dam pa nyid kyis bsdams pa'o //
analyzed: rkan ni chos 'byung gi dbus su shin tu ring ba'i rtsa'i ngo bo'o // de la sdebs pa'i sbyor ba ni shin tu dam pa nyid kyis bsdams pa'o //
translated: The palate is the essence of the very long channel in the center of the phenomena source.🔽The union of the combination there is the very tight binding.

original: de'i sbyor ba ni rab tu sbyor bas so //
analyzed: de'i sbyor ba ni rab tu sbyor bas so //
translated: The union of that is the application.🔽By the application of the mantra of KṢa,

original: kshl'i sngags kyi sbyor ba yis //🔽zhes bya ba ni rdo rje'i rtse mor bsgoms pas so //
analyzed: kshl'i sngags kyi sbyor ba yis // zhes bya ba ni rdo rje'i rtse mor bsgoms pas so //
translated: It is meditated on at the tip of the vajra.🔽The yogī should listen to it.🔽The yogī should listen to it.🔽The yogī should listen to it.🔽The yogī should listen to it.🔽The yogī should listen to it.🔽The yogī should listen to it.🔽The yogī should listen to it.🔽The yogī should listen to it.🔽The yogī should listen to it.🔽The yogī should listen to it.🔽The yogī should listen to it.🔽The yogī should listen to it.🔽The yogī should listen to it.🔽The yogī should listen to it.🔽The yogī should listen to it.🔽The yogī should listen to it.🔽The yogī should listen to it.🔽The yogī should listen to it.🔽The yogī should listen to it.🔽The yogī should listen to it.🔽The yogī should listen to it.🔽The yogī should listen to it.🔽The yogī should listen to it.🔽The yogī should listen to it.🔽The yogī should listen to it.🔽The yogī should listen to it.🔽The yogī should listen to it.🔽The yogī should listen to it.🔽The yogī should listen to it.🔽The yogī should listen to it.🔽The yogī should listen to it.🔽The yogī should listen to it.🔽The yogī should listen to it.🔽The yogī should listen to it.

original: rnal 'byor zhes bya ba ni rlung gi de kho na nyid bsgoms pas so //🔽thos par byed ces bya ba ni shin tu rtogs /
analyzed: rnal 'byor zhes bya ba ni rlung gi de kho na nyid bsgoms pas so // thos par byed ces bya ba ni shin tu rtogs /
translated: The yogī should listen to it.🔽The yogī should listen to it.🔽The yogī should listen to it.🔽The yogī should listen to it.🔽The yogī should listen to it.🔽The yogī should listen to it.🔽The yogī should listen to it.

original: @140b par bya ba'o //
analyzed: @140b par bya ba'o //
translated: The yogī should listen to it.🔽The yog

original: mchog ces bya ba ni sems brtan pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i ngag 'od gsal ba'o //
analyzed: mchog ces bya ba ni sems brtan pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i ngag 'od gsal ba'o //
translated: The supreme is the clear light of speech, which is the cause of the stability of mind.

original: rnal 'byor zhes bya ba ni ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par ro //
analyzed: rnal 'byor zhes bya ba ni ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par ro //
translated: The yoga is the special samādhi.

original: bde ba kun gyi gzhi zhes bya ba ni zag pa med pa'i bde ba'i gzhi'o //
analyzed: bde ba kun gyi gzhi zhes bya ba ni zag pa med pa'i bde ba'i gzhi'o //
translated: The basis of all bliss is the basis of uncontaminated bliss.

original: mchog ces bya ba ni so so'i skye bo'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mchog ces bya ba ni so so'i skye bo'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The supreme is free from the characteristics of ordinary beings.

original: de ltar rdzas kyi thig le rgyas par bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar rdzas kyi thig le rgyas par bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having explained the drop of substance extensively,

original: sngags kyi thig le rgyas par bshad pa brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: sngags kyi thig le rgyas par bshad pa brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to explain the mantra drop extensively,

original: chos kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni snying ga'i gnas la'o //
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni snying ga'i gnas la'o //
translated: he says the wheel of phenomena and so on. The wheel of phenomena is the location of the heart.

original: mchog ces bya ba ni mchog gi ngo bo ste /
analyzed: mchog ces bya ba ni mchog gi ngo bo ste /
translated: The supreme is the nature of the supreme,

original: sems kyi rten du gyur pa'i phyir ro //🔽snying ga'i padma'i lte ba la //
analyzed: sems kyi rten du gyur pa'i phyir ro // snying ga'i padma'i lte ba la //
translated: because it is the support of the mind.🔽In the center of the heart lotus,

original: zhes bya ba ni snying ga'i chu skyes kyi dbus su'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni snying ga'i chu skyes kyi dbus su'o //
translated: in the center of the heart lotus is in the middle of the heart lotus.

original: nges pa zhes bya ba ni nges par byas nas sems kyi zhes bya ba'i lhag ma'o //
analyzed: nges pa zhes bya ba ni nges par byas nas sems kyi zhes bya ba'i lhag ma'o //
translated: The definite is the definite, and the rest is the mind.

original: h'um yig ces bya ba ni cha lnga pa'i rnam par sngags kyi thig le la cha shas yongs su gyur pa las de grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: h'um yig ces bya ba ni cha lnga pa'i rnam par sngags kyi thig le la cha shas yongs su gyur pa las de grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The syllable “hum” is the transformation of the parts of the mantra drop into five parts, because it is produced from that.

original: thams cad stong pa nyid bdag nyid //
analyzed: thams cad stong pa nyid bdag nyid //
translated: The nature of all emptiness

original: ces bya ba ni sems kyi khyad par la'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni sems kyi khyad par la'o //
translated: is a special mind.

original: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba ni /
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba ni /
translated: Natural luminosity

original: don dam par sems nyid de //
analyzed: don dam par sems nyid de //
translated: is the mind itself ultimately.

original: zhi ba zhes bya ba ni rang dang gzhang yi don phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyu nyid du gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhi ba zhes bya ba ni rang dang gzhang yi don phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyu nyid du gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is peace, because it is the cause of the perfection of one’s own and others’ goals.

original: dngos dang dngos med rnam par grol //
analyzed: dngos dang dngos med rnam par grol //
translated: It is free from things and nonthings,

original: zhes bya ba ni don dam par rang bzhin med pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni don dam par rang bzhin med pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: because ultimately it is devoid of intrinsic nature.

original: dngos po las rnam par grol ba'o //🔽yi ge'i ngo bo nyid kyis rnal 'byor pa'i shes pa la snang ba'i phyir /
analyzed: dngos po las rnam par grol ba'o // yi ge'i ngo bo nyid kyis rnal 'byor pa'i shes pa la snang ba'i phyir /
translated: It is free from things.

original: dngos med las rnam par grol ba'o //
analyzed: dngos med las rnam par grol ba'o //
translated: It is free from nonthings, because it appears to the consciousness of the yogi as the nature of the syllable.

original: ye shes lus can zhes bya ba ni ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyi lus kyis nye bar thob pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ye shes lus can zhes bya ba ni ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyi lus kyis nye bar thob pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is the body of wisdom, because it is attained by the body that is the nature of wisdom.

original: phyogs yul dus dang rnam par bral //
analyzed: phyogs yul dus dang rnam par bral //
translated: It is free from directions, places, and times.

original: zhes bya ba ni dngos po la yul dang dus dang rnam pa rnams kyis yongs su 'chad pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dngos po la yul dang dus dang rnam pa rnams kyis yongs su 'chad pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: This means that it is not limited by places, times, and aspects in things.

original: thog ma bar dang tha ma spangs //
analyzed: thog ma bar dang tha ma spangs //
translated: It is free from beginning, middle, and end.

original: zhes bya ba ni yi ge med pa'i bdag nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni yi ge med pa'i bdag nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: This means that it is free from syllables, because it is the nature of the absence of syllables.

original: yi ge'i rang bzhin h'um yig la sogs pa la thog ma dang par ma la sogs pa tha dad par brtags pas legs pa ste /
analyzed: yi ge'i rang bzhin h'um yig la sogs pa la thog ma dang par ma la sogs pa tha dad par brtags pas legs pa ste /
translated: The syllables such as hūṃ are well imagined to be different from the beginning, middle, and end.

original: 'di la yang de spangs pa nyid kyi phyir de bzhin du zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di la yang de spangs pa nyid kyi phyir de bzhin du zhes bya ba'o //
translated: And here, it is just like that, because it is free from that.

original: cha med ces bya ba ni cha dang bral ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: cha med ces bya ba ni cha dang bral ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: It is partless, because it is free from parts.

original: rang gi ngo bos gnas zhes bya ba ni rang gi ngo bos gnas pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bos gnas zhes bya ba ni rang gi ngo bos gnas pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: It abides by its own nature, because it abides by its own nature.

original: ngag gi dri ma yongs su spangs //🔽zhes bya ba ni spros pa med pa nyid kyis ngag gi spros pa'i spyod @141a * //
analyzed: ngag gi dri ma yongs su spangs // zhes bya ba ni spros pa med pa nyid kyis ngag gi spros pa'i spyod @141a * //
translated: It is free from the stains of speech.

original: yul ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: yul ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: This means that it is not the domain of the proliferation of speech, because it is free from proliferation.

original: gtan tshigs tshad ma dang bral zhes bya ba ni rtog ge pas yongs su brtags pa'i mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa las phyi rol du 'gyur ba nyid kyi phyir gtan tshigs dang / tshad ma dag gis spangs pa zhes bya ba byas nas so //
analyzed: gtan tshigs tshad ma dang bral zhes bya ba ni rtog ge pas yongs su brtags pa'i mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa las phyi rol du 'gyur ba nyid kyi phyir gtan tshigs dang / tshad ma dag gis spangs pa zhes bya ba byas nas so //
translated: The phrase “free from valid reasoning” means that it is beyond the direct perception and inference imagined by logicians.

original: rtog pa'i spyod yul 'das pa zhes bya ba ni rang rgyud log pa'i rnam par rtog pa las ring ba nyid du yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro //🔽gnyis pa kun las rnam par grol //
analyzed: rtog pa'i spyod yul 'das pa zhes bya ba ni rang rgyud log pa'i rnam par rtog pa las ring ba nyid du yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro // gnyis pa kun las rnam par grol //
translated: The phrase “transcending all reasoning and valid cognition” is used because it is not an object of the conceptual mind, since it is far removed from the conceptual mind that is the cause of error.

original: zhes bya ba ni gnyis kyi rnam par rtog pa ma lus pas ma gos pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gnyis kyi rnam par rtog pa ma lus pas ma gos pa'o //
translated: The second line, “free from the duality of all,” means that it is unstained by any conceptualization of duality.

original: rtag cing zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyis rtag pa'o //
analyzed: rtag cing zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyis rtag pa'o //
translated: The phrase “permanent” means that it is permanent by nature.

original: mchog tu zhes bya ba ni gcig tu rnal 'byor pa'i yul rtogs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: mchog tu zhes bya ba ni gcig tu rnal 'byor pa'i yul rtogs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The phrase “supreme” means that it is the sole object of the yogi’s realization.

original: zhi'o zhes bya ba ni de las 'bad pa med par gzhan don 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhi'o zhes bya ba ni de las 'bad pa med par gzhan don 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The phrase “peace” means that the benefit of others is accomplished effortlessly from that state.

original: 'di ni sngags kyi thig lar bshad //
analyzed: 'di ni sngags kyi thig lar bshad //
translated: This is explained in the Drop of Mantra.

original: ces bya ba ni snying ga'i gnas su rlung lnga'i bdag nyid cha lnga pa bsgoms pas so //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni snying ga'i gnas su rlung lnga'i bdag nyid cha lnga pa bsgoms pas so //
translated: This is the meditation on the five parts, which are the nature of the five winds, in the location of the heart.

original: zhe sdang gi rigs can gyi rnal 'byor pa la ltos pas so //
analyzed: zhe sdang gi rigs can gyi rnal 'byor pa la ltos pas so //
translated: This is in consideration of the yogi/nī of the angry type.

original: dngos grub ster zhes bya ba ni rdo rje'i bzlas pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi dngos grub ster ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos grub ster zhes bya ba ni rdo rje'i bzlas pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi dngos grub ster ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Granting powers means that they grant powers characterized by vajra repetition.

original: rnal 'byor rnams kyi zhes bya ba ni rlung gi de kho na nyid sgom pa po rnams la'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor rnams kyi zhes bya ba ni rlung gi de kho na nyid sgom pa po rnams la'o //
translated: Of the yogis/nī means of those who meditate on the reality of the winds.

original: rtag pa'i zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu thob pa'i mthar thug pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: rtag pa'i zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu thob pa'i mthar thug pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The eternal means that they are the ultimate attainment of the result.

original: de ltar sngags kyi thig le rgyas par bshad pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar sngags kyi thig le rgyas par bshad pa bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the extensive explanation of the bindu of mantra,

original: 'od zer gyi thig le bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'od zer gyi thig le bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to teach the bindu of light rays,

original: rlung gi thig le zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: rlung gi thig le zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: the “bindu of wind” is stated.

original: rlung lnga bsdus pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: rlung lnga bsdus pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: This is the process of gathering the five winds.

original: rnal 'byor mchog ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: rnal 'byor mchog ces bya ba ni /
translated: The supreme yoga is

original: sems rtse gcig pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sems rtse gcig pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: the cause of the one-pointed mind.

original: kha dog rnam lnga zhes bya ba ni rlung lnga po de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i mdog can nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: kha dog rnam lnga zhes bya ba ni rlung lnga po de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i mdog can nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The five colors are the five winds, which are the colors of the five Tathagatas.

original: gsal ba che zhes bya ba ni 'bar ba'i rnam pas rnal 'byor pa'i shes pa lnga snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gsal ba che zhes bya ba ni 'bar ba'i rnam pas rnal 'byor pa'i shes pa lnga snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The great illumination is the illumination of the yogi's five cognitions by the form of the blazing.

original: sna rtser zhes bya ba ni kun rdzob kyi sna rtser ro //
analyzed: sna rtser zhes bya ba ni kun rdzob kyi sna rtser ro //
translated: At the tip of the nose means at the relative tip of the nose.

original: sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor zhes bya ba ni sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis so //
analyzed: sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor zhes bya ba ni sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis so //
translated: The yoga of union means by the illusion-like samadhi.

original: bsgom par bya zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pas dmigs par bya ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: bsgom par bya zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pas dmigs par bya ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: One should meditate means that the yogi should visualize it.

original: kun nas kyang ni 'di 'dra ba'i //
analyzed: kun nas kyang ni 'di 'dra ba'i //
translated: And all around,

original: aa yig sngags kyi mchog ces bya ba ni rnam pa thams cad kyi aa yig gi rnam pa'o //
analyzed: aa yig sngags kyi mchog ces bya ba ni rnam pa thams cad kyi aa yig gi rnam pa'o //
translated: The supreme mantra of the letter A means the form of the letter A in all aspects.

original: de dang phyi rol pa nyid kyis de med pa nyid kyi @141b phyir ro //
analyzed: de dang phyi rol pa nyid kyis de med pa nyid kyi @141b phyir ro //
translated: Because it is external to that, it does not exist.

original: bzlas par bya zhes bya ba ni rlung gi grangs nye bar thob pa la'o //
analyzed: bzlas par bya zhes bya ba ni rlung gi grangs nye bar thob pa la'o //
translated: One should recite means in the attainment of the number of winds.

original: rnal 'byor pa yis zhes bya ba ni rlung gi de kho na nyid sgom pa pos so //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa yis zhes bya ba ni rlung gi de kho na nyid sgom pa pos so //
translated: The yogi means the one who meditates on the reality of the winds.

original: de ltar 'od zer gyi thig le bsgom pa bshad nas /
analyzed: de ltar 'od zer gyi thig le bsgom pa bshad nas /
translated: Having explained the meditation on the drop of light rays,

original: thig le gsum bsgom pa'i phan yon brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: thig le gsum bsgom pa'i phan yon brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to express the benefits of the meditation on the three drops,🔽it says,

original: snga ma bzhin du zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du zhes bya ba ni /
translated: as before,

original: le'u drug par bstan pa'i thig le'i dbye ba'i phan yon byas pa'i cho gas so //
analyzed: le'u drug par bstan pa'i thig le'i dbye ba'i phan yon byas pa'i cho gas so //
translated: in the manner of the benefits of the divisions of the drops taught in chapter six.

original: ji skad du /🔽de las rkang mgyogs gser 'gyur dang ni dug las rgyal dang me yi nang du 'jug pa la sogs dang // mngon shes lnga yi go 'phang dang ni shin tu che ba'i ye shes rnams ni khyod kyis thob par 'gyur //🔽zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //🔽ye shes lnga zhes bya ba ni me long lta bu la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes lnga'o //
analyzed: ji skad du / de las rkang mgyogs gser 'gyur dang ni dug las rgyal dang me yi nang du 'jug pa la sogs dang // mngon shes lnga yi go 'phang dang ni shin tu che ba'i ye shes rnams ni khyod kyis thob par 'gyur // zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so // ye shes lnga zhes bya ba ni me long lta bu la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes lnga'o //
translated: As it is said:

original: mngon shes lnga yi mtshan nyid can //
analyzed: mngon shes lnga yi mtshan nyid can //
translated: From that, you will attain the state of the five superknowledges, the state of the five great wisdoms, the state of the five great wisdoms, the state of the five great wisdoms, the state of the five great wisdoms, the state of the five great wisdoms, the state of the five great wisdoms, the state of the five great wisdoms, the state of the five great wisdoms, the state of the five great wisdoms, the state of the five great wisdoms, the state of the five great wisdoms, the state of the five great wisdoms, the state of the five great wisdoms, the state of the five great wisdoms, the state of the five great wisdoms, the state of the five great wisdoms, the state of the five great wisdoms, the state of the five great wisdoms, the state of the five great wisdoms, the state of the five great wisdoms, the state of the five great wisdoms, the state of the five great wisdoms, the state of the five great wisdoms, the state of the five great wisdoms, the state of the five great wisdoms, the state of the five great wisdoms, the state of the five great wisdoms, the state of the five great wisdoms, the state of the five great wisdoms, the state of the five great wisdoms, the state of the five great wisdoms, the state of the five great wisdoms, the state of the five great wisdoms, the state of the five great wisdoms, the state of the five great wisdoms, the state of the five great wisdoms, the state of the five great wisdoms, the state of the five great wisdoms, the state of the five great wisdoms, the state of the five great wisdoms, the state of the five great wisdoms, the state of the five great wisdoms, the state of the five great wisdoms, the state of the five great wisdoms, the state of the five great wisdoms, the state of the five great wisdoms, the state

original: zhes bya ba ni lha'i mig la sogs pa'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni lha'i mig la sogs pa'i ngo bo'o //
translated: This is the nature of the divine eye, etc.

original: zhi ba la sogs de bzhin bsgrub //
analyzed: zhi ba la sogs de bzhin bsgrub //
translated: Peace, etc., are accomplished in the same way.

original: ces bya ba ni 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub rnams so //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub rnams so //
translated: This is the mundane powers.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:🔽In the maṇḍalas of fire, wind, earth,

original: me dang rlung dang dbang chen dang // chu ste so so'i dkyil 'khor du //
analyzed: me dang rlung dang dbang chen dang // chu ste so so'i dkyil 'khor du //
translated: and water,

original: thun ni phyed phyed dus su ni //
analyzed: thun ni phyed phyed dus su ni //
translated: in the periods of half a watch,

original: las ni gnyis gnyis gnas par 'gyur //🔽zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: las ni gnyis gnyis gnas par 'gyur // zhes gsungs so //
translated: the two actions are present.

original: thob par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni thig le gsum sgom pa po'i rnal 'byor pas so ;
analyzed: thob par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni thig le gsum sgom pa po'i rnal 'byor pas so ;
translated: One attains, the yogin who meditates on the three drops.

original: / rim pa'i mtshan nyid can zhes bya ba ni skas kyi gdang bu'i rim pa'i rigs pas 'grub pa'i phyir cig car ni ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //🔽de ltar don rnam pa bzhis thig le gsum gyi ngo bo bstan nas /🔽de nyid kyi rtsa gsum gyi ngo bo brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: / rim pa'i mtshan nyid can zhes bya ba ni skas kyi gdang bu'i rim pa'i rigs pas 'grub pa'i phyir cig car ni ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to // de ltar don rnam pa bzhis thig le gsum gyi ngo bo bstan nas / de nyid kyi rtsa gsum gyi ngo bo brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: By the method of the steps of a ladder, not all at once.🔽Thus, having taught the nature of the three drops by four topics,🔽in order to express their nature as the three nāḍīs,

original: de'i yan lag rang gi ngo bo bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i yan lag rang gi ngo bo bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: he teaches their nature as the three nāḍīs.

original: sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba yis //🔽zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba yis // zhes gsungs te /
translated: By the division of body, speech, and mind,

original: 'di ni zhes bya ba ni sngon du gsungs pa'i thig le gsum sku la sogs pa'i dbye bas la la n'a dang / ra sa n'a dang / aa ba dh'u t'i'i ngo bo gsungs so //
analyzed: 'di ni zhes bya ba ni sngon du gsungs pa'i thig le gsum sku la sogs pa'i dbye bas la la n'a dang / ra sa n'a dang / aa ba dh'u t'i'i ngo bo gsungs so //
translated: Here, this refers to the previously mentioned three bindus, which are said to be the essence of the lalanā, rasanā, and avadhūti, by the division of body and so on.

original: de la lus la sogs pa gnyis gang la yang 'brel par bya ste ;
analyzed: de la lus la sogs pa gnyis gang la yang 'brel par bya ste ;
translated: Here, they are to be connected to either the two, body and so on, or the three, body, speech, and mind.

original: de la lus kyi rtsa ni khrag 'bab pa'o //
analyzed: de la lus kyi rtsa ni khrag 'bab pa'o //
translated: The body's nāḍī is the one in which blood flows.

original: ngag gi rtsa ni khu ba 'bab pa'o /
analyzed: ngag gi rtsa ni khu ba 'bab pa'o /
translated: The speech nāḍī is the one in which semen flows.

original: sems kyi rtsa ni rnam par rtog pa thams cad za bar byed pas na sgra gcan 'bab pa'o //
analyzed: sems kyi rtsa ni rnam par rtog pa thams cad za bar byed pas na sgra gcan 'bab pa'o //
translated: The mind nāḍī is the one in which Rāhu flows, because it consumes all conceptuality.

original: yang na lus kyi thig le ni gti mug gi rigs can gyi rnal 'byor pa la ltos nas 'od zer gyi thig le'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: yang na lus kyi thig le ni gti mug gi rigs can gyi rnal 'byor pa la ltos nas 'od zer gyi thig le'i ngo bo'o //
translated: Alternatively, the body bindu is the essence of the light-ray bindu in dependence on a yogi who is of the family of ignorance.

original: @142a * // ngag gi thig le'i rdzas kyi thig le'i ngo bo 'dod chags kyi rigs can gyi rnal 'byor pa la ltos pas so //
analyzed: @142a * // ngag gi thig le'i rdzas kyi thig le'i ngo bo 'dod chags kyi rigs can gyi rnal 'byor pa la ltos pas so //
translated: The speech bindu is the essence of the substance bindu in dependence on a yogi who is of the family of desire.

original: sems kyi thig le sngags kyi thig le'i ngo bo zhe sdang gi rigs can gyi rnal 'byor pa la ltos pas so //
analyzed: sems kyi thig le sngags kyi thig le'i ngo bo zhe sdang gi rigs can gyi rnal 'byor pa la ltos pas so //
translated: The drop of the mind is the essence of the drop of mantra, in dependence on the yogī of the type of hatred.

original: bsdus nas zhes bya ba ni rtsa ma lus pa bsdus nas so ;
analyzed: bsdus nas zhes bya ba ni rtsa ma lus pa bsdus nas so ;
translated: Having gathered means having gathered all the channels.

original: / slar yang dbye ba ni slar yang dbye bas sna tshogs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis so //
analyzed: / slar yang dbye ba ni slar yang dbye bas sna tshogs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis so //
translated: Again divided means divided again, by the nature of variety.

original: 'gro zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: 'gro zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba'o //
translated: Going means going.

original: so sor zhes bya ba ni so so'i rtsa'i ngo bos so //
analyzed: so sor zhes bya ba ni so so'i rtsa'i ngo bos so //
translated: Individually means by the nature of each channel.

original: de yang phan tshun te /
analyzed: de yang phan tshun te /
translated: That also is mutually,

original: gcig la gcig gis zhes bya ba'i don to //🔽yang na slar yang dbye ba ni /
analyzed: gcig la gcig gis zhes bya ba'i don to // yang na slar yang dbye ba ni /
translated: the meaning of one another.

original: rtsa gsum gyi ngo bo nyid dang ; thig le gsum gyi ngo bo nyid kyis so //
analyzed: rtsa gsum gyi ngo bo nyid dang ; thig le gsum gyi ngo bo nyid kyis so //
translated: Or else, again divided means by the nature of the three channels and the nature of the three drops.

original: so so ma yin par khyab par zhes bya ba'i 'dod pas so //
analyzed: so so ma yin par khyab par zhes bya ba'i 'dod pas so //
translated: Not individually means pervading, by the desire.

original: phan tshun rtsa gsum la'am thig le gsum la'o //
analyzed: phan tshun rtsa gsum la'am thig le gsum la'o //
translated: Mutually is in the three channels or in the three drops.

original: so so ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni tha mi dad pas so //
analyzed: so so ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni tha mi dad pas so //
translated: Not individually means not different.

original: khyab pa ni khyab par byed pa nyid du 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: khyab pa ni khyab par byed pa nyid du 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: pervasion means that it is the pervader.

original: de ltar rtsa gsum gyi ngo bo bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar rtsa gsum gyi ngo bo bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having taught the nature of the three nāḍīs,

original: thig le gsum la phan tshun du thig le gsum gyi ngo bo nyid brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: thig le gsum la phan tshun du thig le gsum gyi ngo bo nyid brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to describe the nature of the three bindus in mutual dependence,

original: khongs su zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: khongs su zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: “within” is stated.

original: rdzas kyi thig le zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems kyi thig le'i ngo bo la'o //
analyzed: rdzas kyi thig le zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems kyi thig le'i ngo bo la'o //
translated: The “substantive bindu” is the nature of the bodhicitta bindu.

original: sngags dang rlung dag gi khongs su chud pa zhes bya ba dang 'brel to ;
analyzed: sngags dang rlung dag gi khongs su chud pa zhes bya ba dang 'brel to ;
translated: It is related to “within the mantra and vāyu.”

original: / sngags dang 'od zer gyi thig le dag khongs su chud pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: / sngags dang 'od zer gyi thig le dag khongs su chud pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of “within the mantra and light-ray bindus” is that.

original: rdzas kyi thig le la h'um yig gi rnam pa nyid kyi phyir rlung lnga'i bdag nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rdzas kyi thig le la h'um yig gi rnam pa nyid kyi phyir rlung lnga'i bdag nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The substantive bindu is the form of the letter hūṃ and the nature of the five vāyus.

original: sngags kyi thig le zhes bya ba ni snying gar gnas pa'i h'um yig la'o //
analyzed: sngags kyi thig le zhes bya ba ni snying gar gnas pa'i h'um yig la'o //
translated: The “mantra bindu” is the letter hūṃ located at the heart.

original: de nyid mchog ces bya ba ni sems kyi sa bon nyid kyi phyir mchog gi de kho na nyid kyi bdag nyid can no //
analyzed: de nyid mchog ces bya ba ni sems kyi sa bon nyid kyi phyir mchog gi de kho na nyid kyi bdag nyid can no //
translated: That is the supreme reality, because it is the seed of the mind, it is the nature of the supreme reality.

original: thig le gnyis ni rdzas dang 'od //
analyzed: thig le gnyis ni rdzas dang 'od //
translated: The two drops are the substance and the light.

original: ces bya ba ni khongs su bsdus pa zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni khongs su bsdus pa zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The inclusion is as before.

original: h'um yig rlung lnga'i bdag nyid kyi phyir dang / byang chub sems kyi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: h'um yig rlung lnga'i bdag nyid kyi phyir dang / byang chub sems kyi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The syllable hum is the nature of the five winds and the essence of the bodhicitta.

original: slar yang rlung gi thig le yang //
analyzed: slar yang rlung gi thig le yang //
translated: Again, the wind drop.

original: zhes bya ba ni 'od zer gyi thig le'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'od zer gyi thig le'o //
translated: The light drop.

original: sngags dang rdzas kyi bdag nyid can //
analyzed: sngags dang rdzas kyi bdag nyid can //
translated: The nature of mantra and substance.

original: zhes bya ba ni rdzas dang sngags kyi thig le dag nang du bsdus pa zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rdzas dang sngags kyi thig le dag nang du bsdus pa zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The inclusion of the substance and mantra drops is as before.

original: de la yang sngags dang rdzas phyi rol du ma byas pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de la yang sngags dang rdzas phyi rol du ma byas pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: There, the mantra and substance are not externalized.

original: yang dag shes zhes bya ba ni ji ltar gnas pa'i ngo bo shes @142b pa'o ;
analyzed: yang dag shes zhes bya ba ni ji ltar gnas pa'i ngo bo shes @142b pa'o ;
translated: Right knowledge is the knowledge of the nature of the abiding reality.

original: /'dir zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten 'dir ro //
analyzed: /'dir zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten 'dir ro //
translated: Here means in this world.

original: rnal 'byor pa yis zhes bya ba ni /🔽rlung gi de nyid sgom pa po //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa yis zhes bya ba ni / rlung gi de nyid sgom pa po //
translated: The yogi means

original: zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: the one who meditates on the reality of the winds.

original: de ltar thig le gsum phan tshun du thig le gsum gyi ngo bo nyid bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar thig le gsum phan tshun du thig le gsum gyi ngo bo nyid bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having taught the nature of the three bindus in terms of each other,

original: slar yang rtsa gsum gyi ngo bo rgyas par bstan pa brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: slar yang rtsa gsum gyi ngo bo rgyas par bstan pa brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to again extensively teach the nature of the three nāḍīs,

original: zla ba nyi ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zla ba nyi ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: [the Bhagavān] declares, “moon, sun, and fire,” and so on.

original: zla ba nyi ma me'i rtsa gsum po mi rgyu ba rnams la'o //
analyzed: zla ba nyi ma me'i rtsa gsum po mi rgyu ba rnams la'o //
translated: The three nāḍīs of moon, sun, and fire are the ones that do not move.

original: mtshan nyid do zhes bya ba ni thig le gsum gyi ngo bo nyid kyis mtshon pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: mtshan nyid do zhes bya ba ni thig le gsum gyi ngo bo nyid kyis mtshon pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: “Characteristic” means that they are characterized by the nature of the three bindus.

original: gsum zhes bya ba brjod de /
analyzed: gsum zhes bya ba brjod de /
translated: The three are stated.

original: de la mi shes pas gsum po de nyid gang yin snyam pa la ;
analyzed: de la mi shes pas gsum po de nyid gang yin snyam pa la ;
translated: Since they are not known, one might wonder, “What are those three?”

original: de'i phyir la la n'a zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //🔽ji skad du /
analyzed: de'i phyir la la n'a zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so // ji skad du /
translated: Therefore [the Bhagavān] declares, lalanā, and so on.

original: dgyes pa rdo rje'i rgyud las /
analyzed: dgyes pa rdo rje'i rgyud las /
translated: As it says in the Hevajra Tantra:

original: shes rab ngo bo la la n'a //
analyzed: shes rab ngo bo la la n'a //
translated: The essence of wisdom is lalanā.

original: ra sa n'a ni thabs kyis gnas //
analyzed: ra sa n'a ni thabs kyis gnas //
translated: Rasanā is the abode of method.

original: aa ba dh'u t'i dbus ma'i yul //🔽gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs //
analyzed: aa ba dh'u t'i dbus ma'i yul // gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs //
translated: In the middle of the avadhūtī,

original: zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes gsungs te /
translated: free from the duality of subject and object.🔽The nature of body, speech, and mind,🔽and that itself,🔽means that the three are just that,

original: sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin dang / de nyid du ni zhes bya ba ni gsum nyid ni de ma thag par gsungs pa'i rigs pas de ma thag par gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin dang / de nyid du ni zhes bya ba ni gsum nyid ni de ma thag par gsungs pa'i rigs pas de ma thag par gsungs pa'o //
translated: because of the reasoning just stated.

original: yongs su grags zhes bya ba ni brjod pa'o //
analyzed: yongs su grags zhes bya ba ni brjod pa'o //
translated: Well known means expressed.

original: steng dang 'og tu khyab pa nyid //
analyzed: steng dang 'og tu khyab pa nyid //
translated: Pervading above and below,

original: ces bya ba ni rtsa gsum gtso bor gyur pa de rnams ni gtso bo'i rtsa rnams so //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni rtsa gsum gtso bor gyur pa de rnams ni gtso bo'i rtsa rnams so //
translated: means that those principal nāḍīs are the principal nāḍīs.

original: so sor lu gu rgyud tshul zhes bya ba ni dbus su mdud pa brjod par 'dod pas steng dang 'og gi dbye bas tha dad pa'i phyir drug nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: so sor lu gu rgyud tshul zhes bya ba ni dbus su mdud pa brjod par 'dod pas steng dang 'og gi dbye bas tha dad pa'i phyir drug nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: The phrase “each in the form of a chain” means that since the knots in the center are described as being above and below, they are differentiated and become six.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it was said:

original: bshad gci zla ba nyi ma dang // sgra gcan dus me'i rtsa rnams ni //
analyzed: bshad gci zla ba nyi ma dang // sgra gcan dus me'i rtsa rnams ni //
translated: The nāḍīs of feces, urine, the moon, the sun,🔽Rāhu, and Kālāgni

original: drug ces bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: drug ces bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: are the six.

original: rtsa rnams kun la khyab nas ni //
analyzed: rtsa rnams kun la khyab nas ni //
translated: Pervading all the nāḍīs,

original: zhes bya ba ni de ma thag par gsungs pa'i gsungs pa de rnams nyid ni de las gzhan pa rnams la zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de ma thag par gsungs pa'i gsungs pa de rnams nyid ni de las gzhan pa rnams la zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: These very ones that were just mentioned are the others, is the meaning.

original: de med par de las gzhan pa rnams kyi ngo bo ma grub pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: de med par de las gzhan pa rnams kyi ngo bo ma grub pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: Because they are not established without that, because the nature of the others is not established, is the meaning.

original: yang dag rim par zhes bya ba ni bla ma'i gdams ngag la brten nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i gsung gi tshad mas so //
analyzed: yang dag rim par zhes bya ba ni bla ma'i gdams ngag la brten nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i gsung gi tshad mas so //
translated: In the correct sequence means in dependence on the guru's instructions, by the valid cognition of the speech of the Omniscient One.

original: gnas zhes bya ba ni rnam par gnas pa'o //
analyzed: gnas zhes bya ba ni rnam par gnas pa'o //
translated: Abiding means remaining.

original: de ltar slar yang rtsa gsum gyi ngo bo nyid kyis rgyas par bstan nas nye bar bsdu ba sngon du 'gro bas phan yon brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de ltar slar yang rtsa gsum gyi ngo bo nyid kyis rgyas par bstan nas nye bar bsdu ba sngon du 'gro bas phan yon brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: Thus, having extensively explained the nature of the three nāḍīs, in order to state the benefits, he begins with a summary:

original: de ltar rnal 'byor zhes bya ba gsungs te /🔽sngar gsungs pa'i thig le gsum gyi ngo bo 'am rtsa gsum @143a * //
analyzed: de ltar rnal 'byor zhes bya ba gsungs te / sngar gsungs pa'i thig le gsum gyi ngo bo 'am rtsa gsum @143a * //
translated: Thus, the yoga of the three nāḍīs🔽is the supreme cause of attaining

original: gyi ngo bo'o //
analyzed: gyi ngo bo'o //
translated: the supreme state.

original: mchog tu zhes bya ba ni mchog gi go 'phang thob par byed pa'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: mchog tu zhes bya ba ni mchog gi go 'phang thob par byed pa'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Thus, the yoga of the three nāḍīs is the supreme cause of attaining the supreme state because it is the cause of attaining the supreme state.

original: phra zhes bya ba ni sgom pa pos rig par bya ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: phra zhes bya ba ni sgom pa pos rig par bya ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Subtle means that it is to be known by the meditator.

original: shes dang shes bya rnam par spangs //
analyzed: shes dang shes bya rnam par spangs //
translated: Free from the knower and the known

original: zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu'i gnas skabs las gzung ba dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu'i gnas skabs las gzung ba dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: means that at the time of the result, the knower and the known are abandoned.🔽Alternatively, the knower is the essence of relative awakening mind,

original: yang na shes pa ni kun rdzob byang chub sems kyi ngo bo'o zhes bya ba ni 'od zer dang sngags kyi thig le'i ngo bo ste de spangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yang na shes pa ni kun rdzob byang chub sems kyi ngo bo'o zhes bya ba ni 'od zer dang sngags kyi thig le'i ngo bo ste de spangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: which is the essence of the light rays and the mantra drop.

original: dngos grub thams cad kyi ni gzhi //
analyzed: dngos grub thams cad kyi ni gzhi //
translated: The basis of all powers

original: zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub la brten nas so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub la brten nas so //
translated: means that it is based on mundane and supramundane powers.🔽Great yoga🔽means that it is superior due to the special samādhi.

original: rnal 'byor chen po zhes bya ba ni ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par 'phags pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rnal 'byor chen po zhes bya ba ni ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par 'phags pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Great wonder

original: rmad byung che zhes bya ba ni rtsa dang khams kyi ngo bo'i thabs la brten nas byang chub kyi ngo bo mngon du byed pas na /
analyzed: rmad byung che zhes bya ba ni rtsa dang khams kyi ngo bo'i thabs la brten nas byang chub kyi ngo bo mngon du byed pas na /
translated: means that it is the essence of the channels and elements, and it is the actualization of the essence of awakening based on the method.

original: ngo mtshar bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i don to //🔽de ltar don rnam pa bzhis de nyid kyi rtsa gsum gyi ngo bo nyid bstan nas bcos ma'i brtul zhugs la sogs pa yongs su dor nas /
analyzed: ngo mtshar bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i don to // de ltar don rnam pa bzhis de nyid kyi rtsa gsum gyi ngo bo nyid bstan nas bcos ma'i brtul zhugs la sogs pa yongs su dor nas /
translated: The meaning of the term “arising of wonder” is that.

original: de sgom pa po la brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de sgom pa po la brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: Thus, having taught the nature of the three nāḍīs through four topics, in order to describe the yogī who meditates on them, having abandoned artificial observances, etc.,

original: gso sbyong ma yin zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: gso sbyong ma yin zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: [the Bhagavān] declares, “not a purificatory fast,” etc.

original: thig le gsum sgom pa po'i rnal 'byor pa la gso sbyong la sogs pa'i ngo bo mi dgos te /
analyzed: thig le gsum sgom pa po'i rnal 'byor pa la gso sbyong la sogs pa'i ngo bo mi dgos te /
translated: For the yogī who meditates on the three bindus, there is no need for the nature of a purificatory fast, etc.,

original: mchog gi go 'phang thob pa'i phyir dang / sa dgu pa la nye bar gnas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mchog gi go 'phang thob pa'i phyir dang / sa dgu pa la nye bar gnas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because he has attained the supreme state and abides in the ninth stage.

original: bzlas pa min zhes bya ba ni dag gi bzlas pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: bzlas pa min zhes bya ba ni dag gi bzlas pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: “Not a mantra” refers to the mantra repetition, etc.

original: dbugs kyi 'khor lo nyid rang bzhin gyis grub pa nye bar mtshon pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dbugs kyi 'khor lo nyid rang bzhin gyis grub pa nye bar mtshon pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the wheel of the breath itself is naturally accomplished and is indicated.

original: phreng bas ma yin zhes bya ba ni mi rus kyi phreng ba la sogs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: phreng bas ma yin zhes bya ba ni mi rus kyi phreng ba la sogs pa ma yin no //
translated: “Not a rosary” means not a rosary of human bone, etc.
