original: srog rtsol la rang bzhin gyis grub pa la phreng ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: srog rtsol la rang bzhin gyis grub pa la phreng ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: In the case of prāṇāyāma, it is not a rosary because it is naturally accomplished.

original: 'dzin pa min zhes bya ba ni ras ris la sogs pa la sems 'dzin mi dgos te /
analyzed: 'dzin pa min zhes bya ba ni ras ris la sogs pa la sems 'dzin mi dgos te /
translated: It is not retention because it is not necessary to retain the mind in a painting, etc.

original: sna rtse rnam pa gsum thig le rnam pa gsum 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sna rtse rnam pa gsum thig le rnam pa gsum 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not retention because it is the retention of the three types of tip and the three types of drop.

original: grangs min zhes bya ba ni brgya rtsa brgyad dam stong la sogs pa'i ngo bo ma yin te /
analyzed: grangs min zhes bya ba ni brgya rtsa brgyad dam stong la sogs pa'i ngo bo ma yin te /
translated: It is not a number because it is not a number such as one hundred and eight or one thousand,

original: nyin zhag gcig la nyi khri chig stong drug brgya'i dbugs nyams su myong ba'i phyir ro //🔽cha min zhes bya ba ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi ngo bo bsgoms pas sam /
analyzed: nyin zhag gcig la nyi khri chig stong drug brgya'i dbugs nyams su myong ba'i phyir ro // cha min zhes bya ba ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi ngo bo bsgoms pas sam /
translated: because the experience of the breath is twenty-one thousand six hundred times in a single day.🔽It is not a part because it is not meditation on the nature of the moon mandala,

original: yi ge bsgoms pa'i ngo bo ma yin te /
analyzed: yi ge bsgoms pa'i ngo bo ma yin te /
translated: or the nature of the meditation on the syllable.

original: dus thams cad du cha dang bral ba'i rnam pa chos nyid la @143b dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dus thams cad du cha dang bral ba'i rnam pa chos nyid la @143b dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not a part because it is the observation of reality, which is always free from parts.🔽It is not a burnt offering because it is not a different division such as pacifying,

original: sbyin sreg min zhes bya ba ni zhi ba la sogs pa dang / dbye ba tha dad pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: sbyin sreg min zhes bya ba ni zhi ba la sogs pa dang / dbye ba tha dad pa ni ma yin te /
translated: and so on.

original: 'od gsal gyi mes rang bzhin gyi rnam par rtog pa sreg pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'od gsal gyi mes rang bzhin gyi rnam par rtog pa sreg pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the fire of clear light burns the conceptual thoughts of the nature.

original: 'byin byed ces bya ba ni phyi rol pa'i grub mtha'i dgongs pas 'byung ba'i rlung gi ngo bo ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'byin byed ces bya ba ni phyi rol pa'i grub mtha'i dgongs pas 'byung ba'i rlung gi ngo bo ni ma yin no //
translated: The ejaculation is not the nature of the exhalation wind by the intention of the non-Buddhist philosophical schools.

original: 'gengs byed kyis ni min zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyis 'jug pa'i rlung gi ngo bo dgos pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'gengs byed kyis ni min zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyis 'jug pa'i rlung gi ngo bo dgos pa ma yin te /
translated: The not by the filling is not the purpose of the nature of the inhalation wind by that [exhalation wind].

original: 'jug pa dang gnas pa dang ldang ba gsum spangs pa'i ma ning gi bzlas pa mtshon par byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: 'jug pa dang gnas pa dang ldang ba gsum spangs pa'i ma ning gi bzlas pa mtshon par byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the very indication of the neuter repetition that abandons the three [breaths] of inhalation, abiding, and exhalation.

original: gal te de ltar yin na 'o na ji ltar thob par 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: gal te de ltar yin na 'o na ji ltar thob par 'gyur zhe na /
translated: If that is so, then how is it attained?

original: de'i phyir gcig bus min zhes bya ba ni mchog gi gcig pus so //
analyzed: de'i phyir gcig bus min zhes bya ba ni mchog gi gcig pus so //
translated: Therefore, not by the one is by the supreme one.

original: rnal 'byor rang rig pas 'byung ba dang rngub pa rjes su dran pas /
analyzed: rnal 'byor rang rig pas 'byung ba dang rngub pa rjes su dran pas /
translated: The self-awareness is the yoga of the mindfulness of exhalation and inhalation.

original: sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la brten nas rang rig par bya'o //
analyzed: sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la brten nas rang rig par bya'o //
translated: It should be known as self-awareness based on the illusion-like concentration.

original: ye shes chen po'i go 'phang ni //
analyzed: ye shes chen po'i go 'phang ni //
translated: The state of great wisdom

original: zhes bya ba ni 'od gsal gyi ngo bo thig le gsum bsgom pa'i ngo bo'o ;
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'od gsal gyi ngo bo thig le gsum bsgom pa'i ngo bo'o ;
translated: This is the essence of the meditation on the three bindus, which are the nature of clear light.

original: / zhi zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi don la 'bad pa med par 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: / zhi zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi don la 'bad pa med par 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “ Peace” is because the benefit of others is accomplished without effort.

original: de ltar bcos ma'i brtul zhugs la sogs pa spangs pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar bcos ma'i brtul zhugs la sogs pa spangs pa bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the avoidance of artificial observances and so forth,

original: de'i phan yon brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i phan yon brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to state the benefits of that,

original: mngon par shes pa lnga dang ni //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa lnga dang ni //
translated: “the five superknowledges”

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: are stated.

original: lha'i mig la sogs pa'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: lha'i mig la sogs pa'i ngo bo'o //
translated: They are the nature of the divine eye and so forth.

original: de bzhin zhes bya ba ni mngon par shes pa thob pa'i shes pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin zhes bya ba ni mngon par shes pa thob pa'i shes pa'o //
translated: “ Likewise” refers to the consciousness that has attained the superknowledges.

original: ye shes lnga zhes bya ba ni me long la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: ye shes lnga zhes bya ba ni me long la sogs pa rnams so //
translated: “ The five gnoses” are the mirror-like and so forth.

original: thob ces bya ba ni rnyed pa'o //
analyzed: thob ces bya ba ni rnyed pa'o //
translated: “ Attained” means obtained.

original: mchog ces bya ba ni gcig pu'o //
analyzed: mchog ces bya ba ni gcig pu'o //
translated: “ Supreme” means singular.

original: sngar bshad pa'i rnal 'byor gyi che ba'i bdag nyid kyis zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sngar bshad pa'i rnal 'byor gyi che ba'i bdag nyid kyis zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that by the greatness of the yoga explained previously.

original: 'dis ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub gsungs so //
analyzed: 'dis ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub gsungs so //
translated: This teaches the supramundane powers.

original: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach the supramundane powers,🔽he says,

original: zhi sogs bya ba yang dag ni //
analyzed: zhi sogs bya ba yang dag ni //
translated: The perfect performance of pacifying and so forth,

original: zhes bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs so //
translated: and so on.

original: zhi ba la sogs pa'i las tshogs thams cad do //
analyzed: zhi ba la sogs pa'i las tshogs thams cad do //
translated: All the collections of rites of pacifying and so forth.

original: yang dag ces bya ba ni phyin ci ma log pa nyid kyis so //
analyzed: yang dag ces bya ba ni phyin ci ma log pa nyid kyis so //
translated: Perfect means unmistaken.

original: thig le gsum ni sgom pa po /
analyzed: thig le gsum ni sgom pa po /
translated: The meditator on the three seed-syllables,

original: zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa'i rlung gi sgom pa po'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa'i rlung gi sgom pa po'o //
translated: means the meditator on the wind just explained.

original: bsgrub ces bya ba ni rim pa lnga'i rjes su 'brangs nas zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bsgrub ces bya ba ni rim pa lnga'i rjes su 'brangs nas zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: To accomplish means following the five stages.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim pa las //🔽ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin dbugs //
analyzed: rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim pa las // ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin dbugs //
translated: In the stage of vajra repetition,

original: zhes gsungs pas so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs pas so //
translated: the breath has the nature of the five intuitions.

original: de bzhin du /🔽rdo rje'i bzlas pa 'di yis ni //
analyzed: de bzhin du / rdo rje'i bzlas pa 'di yis ni //
translated: And:🔽Having performed the service

original: cho ga ji bzhin bsnyen @144a * //
analyzed: cho ga ji bzhin bsnyen @144a * //
translated: with this vajra repetition, just as prescribed,

original: byas nas // zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: byas nas // zhes gsungs so //
translated: and so on.

original: 'di gcig bu sgrub par ma zad kyi ji srid du 'di yang zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: 'di gcig bu sgrub par ma zad kyi ji srid du 'di yang zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Not only this one, but also as long as this, he says.

original: rnal 'byor mchog gi zhes bya ba ni rjes thob kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi ngo bo'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor mchog gi zhes bya ba ni rjes thob kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi ngo bo'o //
translated: The “supreme yoga” is the essence of the meditative concentration of the post-meditation.

original: stong nyid ye shes mtshan nyid ni /
analyzed: stong nyid ye shes mtshan nyid ni /
translated: The “sign of the wisdom of emptiness”

original: ngag rnam par dben pa'i rang gi ngo bo zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ngag rnam par dben pa'i rang gi ngo bo zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: means the essence of the isolation of speech.

original: de ltar rnam pa gnyis kyis bcos ma'i brtul zhugs la sogs pa spangs pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar rnam pa gnyis kyis bcos ma'i brtul zhugs la sogs pa spangs pa bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the avoidance of artificial observances and so forth by means of the two aspects,

original: thig le gsum gyi rnam grangs brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: thig le gsum gyi rnam grangs brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to express the synonyms of the three drops,

original: ye shes sems dpa' zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: ye shes sems dpa' zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: he says “the wisdom being” and so forth.

original: thig le gsum yang dag par ming gi rnam grangs kyis ye shes sems dpa' zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig gis shes par zhes bya ba dang 'brel to //
analyzed: thig le gsum yang dag par ming gi rnam grangs kyis ye shes sems dpa' zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig gis shes par zhes bya ba dang 'brel to //
translated: The three drops are to be known by means of the synonyms of the names “wisdom being” and so forth.

original: de la ye shes sems dpa' ni ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin gyi 'od zer gyi thig le la'o //
analyzed: de la ye shes sems dpa' ni ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin gyi 'od zer gyi thig le la'o //
translated: The “wisdom being” is the drop of light rays that has the nature of the five wisdoms.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni rdzas kyi thig le'o //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni rdzas kyi thig le'o //
translated: “Vajrasattva” is the substantial drop.

original: 'di la sems dpa' yod pa snyam du bsams nas so //
analyzed: 'di la sems dpa' yod pa snyam du bsams nas so //
translated: Thinking that this has a being,

original: dam tshig sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni sngags kyi thig le'o //
analyzed: dam tshig sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni sngags kyi thig le'o //
translated: The so-called “pledge being” is the mantra drop.

original: dam tshig gi ngo bo mi bskyod pa la de'i rnam pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: dam tshig gi ngo bo mi bskyod pa la de'i rnam pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: It is Akṣhobhya by nature, because of its very form.

original: gnas dang grangs kyi dbye ba yis //
analyzed: gnas dang grangs kyi dbye ba yis //
translated: By the division of place and number,

original: zhes bya ba ni sna rtse rnam pa gsum mo //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sna rtse rnam pa gsum mo //
translated: the three-pointed nose.

original: grangs kyi dbye ba zhes bya ba ni phan tshun so so nas thig le gsum gyi ngo bo dang rtsa gsum gyi ngo bo nyid do //
analyzed: grangs kyi dbye ba zhes bya ba ni phan tshun so so nas thig le gsum gyi ngo bo dang rtsa gsum gyi ngo bo nyid do //
translated: The division of number is the nature of the three drops and the nature of the three channels, each one by one.

original: gnas dang grangs ni gnas dang grangs dag go //
analyzed: gnas dang grangs ni gnas dang grangs dag go //
translated: Place and number are place and number.

original: de'i dbye ba ni de'i rab tu dbye bas so //
analyzed: de'i dbye ba ni de'i rab tu dbye bas so //
translated: Their division is their classification.

original: shes par bya zhes bya ba ni rtogs par bya ba'o //
analyzed: shes par bya zhes bya ba ni rtogs par bya ba'o //
translated: One should know means one should understand.

original: bla ma'i zhal las zhes bya ba ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus su rdo rje slob dpon gyi zhal nas zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: bla ma'i zhal las zhes bya ba ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus su rdo rje slob dpon gyi zhal nas zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: From the guru’s mouth means from the mouth of the vajra master in the future.

original: rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i rgya cher 'grel pa /
analyzed: rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i rgya cher 'grel pa /
translated: The Great Yoga Tantra Shri Vajravali Tantra Commentary

original: pandi ta aa langka ka la shas mdzad pa zab mo'i don shin tu gsal bar byed pa las le'u nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'i rgya cher bshad pa'o /
analyzed: pandi ta aa langka ka la shas mdzad pa zab mo'i don shin tu gsal bar byed pa las le'u nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'i rgya cher bshad pa'o /
translated: This completes the extensive explanation of the twenty-first chapter of the Ornament of the Middle Way, the chapter on the three realities.

original: // / de ltar le'u nyi shu rtsa gcig pas thig le gsum gyi rnam par dbye ba'i yul dri ba'i lan brjod nas da ni yi ge gsum gyi yul la dri ba'i lan brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: // / de ltar le'u nyi shu rtsa gcig pas thig le gsum gyi rnam par dbye ba'i yul dri ba'i lan brjod nas da ni yi ge gsum gyi yul la dri ba'i lan brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: Thus, having explained the reply to the question on the three realities, the object of the twenty-first chapter, now, in order to explain the reply to the question on the object of the three syllables,

original: le'u nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa ston par byed cing /
analyzed: le'u nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa ston par byed cing /
translated: the twenty-second chapter is taught.

original: dang por re zhig de rtsom pa ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: dang por re zhig de rtsom pa ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: First, in order to compose that, “Then” and so on is stated.

original: le'u nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'i rjes la'o //
analyzed: le'u nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'i rjes la'o //
translated: After the twenty-first chapter.

original: gzhan yang zhes bya ba ni sngar la ltos pas tha dad pa byas pa ste /
analyzed: gzhan yang zhes bya ba ni sngar la ltos pas tha dad pa byas pa ste /
translated: “Also” is a different construction from the previous one.

original: yi ge gsum bshad par bya zhes bya ba @144b dang 'brel to //
analyzed: yi ge gsum bshad par bya zhes bya ba @144b dang 'brel to //
translated: It is connected with “the three syllables should be explained.”

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How?

original: de'i phyir de nyid ces bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir de nyid ces bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Therefore “that itself” is stated.

original: yi ge re re la rnam pa gsum dbye bar byas pas zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: yi ge re re la rnam pa gsum dbye bar byas pas zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that each syllable is divided into three aspects.

original: ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: de'i phyir go 'phang mchog ces bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir go 'phang mchog ces bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, it is said to be the supreme state.

original: mchog ni gsang ba gsum gyi rnam pa la 'dug pa'i gnas yin pa'i phyir ro ;
analyzed: mchog ni gsang ba gsum gyi rnam pa la 'dug pa'i gnas yin pa'i phyir ro ;
translated: The supreme is the state of abiding in the aspect of the three secrets.

original: / sku zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sku la sogs pa'i stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo gsum po rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa rnams kyi snying po ste /
analyzed: / sku zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sku la sogs pa'i stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo gsum po rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa rnams kyi snying po ste /
translated: The body, etc., are the essence of Vairochana, etc., whose nature is the emptiness of body, etc.

original: de rnams skyed par byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de rnams skyed par byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: That is because they are the producers of those.

original: dam tshig bdag nyid ni zhes bya ba ni khyad par du 'phags pa'i brda'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir dang / 'god par mi bya ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: dam tshig bdag nyid ni zhes bya ba ni khyad par du 'phags pa'i brda'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir dang / 'god par mi bya ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The nature of the commitments is the nature of the symbolic meaning of the special, and because they are not to be placed.

original: yi ge gsum ni zhes bya ba ni aom yig la sogs pa gsum mo //
analyzed: yi ge gsum ni zhes bya ba ni aom yig la sogs pa gsum mo //
translated: The three syllables are the three, the letter Om, etc.

original: sku gsung thugs kyi snying po zhes bya ba ni ma dag pa'i sku la sogs pa gsum bzlog nas /
analyzed: sku gsung thugs kyi snying po zhes bya ba ni ma dag pa'i sku la sogs pa gsum bzlog nas /
translated: The essence of body, speech, and mind is the reversal of the three impure bodies, etc.

original: rnam par dag pa'i lus la sogs pa rnams la rgyud nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par dag pa'i lus la sogs pa rnams la rgyud nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because of the continuum of the pure body, etc.

original: ji lta ba bzhin bshad ces bya ba ni ji ltar grags pa'i rgyud sde rnam pa lnga la'o //
analyzed: ji lta ba bzhin bshad ces bya ba ni ji ltar grags pa'i rgyud sde rnam pa lnga la'o //
translated: As it is means in the five classes of tantras as they are known.

original: de nyid nyon cig ces bya ba ni phyag na rdo rje thos pa la sbyar ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid nyon cig ces bya ba ni phyag na rdo rje thos pa la sbyar ba'o //
translated: Listen to that itself means that Vajrapani is urged to listen.

original: rnam phye zhes bya ba ni dbye bas so //
analyzed: rnam phye zhes bya ba ni dbye bas so //
translated: Explained means by divisions.

original: ji lta ba bzhin zhes bya ba ni phyin ci ma log pa'i ngo bos so //
analyzed: ji lta ba bzhin zhes bya ba ni phyin ci ma log pa'i ngo bos so //
translated: As it is means by the nature of non-error.

original: bshad ces bya ba ni brjod par bya ba'o //
analyzed: bshad ces bya ba ni brjod par bya ba'o //
translated: Explained means to be expressed.

original: da ni zhes bya ba ni da lta nyid du zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: da ni zhes bya ba ni da lta nyid du zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Now means at this very time.

original: de ltar de rtsom pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar de rtsom pa bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the composition,

original: dngos su bshad pa brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: dngos su bshad pa brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to state the actual explanation,

original: de'i yan lag mdor bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de'i yan lag mdor bstan pa ni /
translated: the summary of its branches is:

original: aom yig ces bya ba ni don gyis stong pa'i yid kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: aom yig ces bya ba ni don gyis stong pa'i yid kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: The syllable Oṃ is the nature of the mind empty of meaning.

original: sku rdo rje'i zhes bya ba ni sku stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo rnam par snang mdzad kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: sku rdo rje'i zhes bya ba ni sku stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo rnam par snang mdzad kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: The body vajra is the nature of Vairocana, the essence of the emptiness of the body.

original: snying po nyid du yang dag bshad //
analyzed: snying po nyid du yang dag bshad //
translated: is explained as the essence.

original: ces bya ba ni sa bon gyi ngo bor gsungs so zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni sa bon gyi ngo bor gsungs so zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This means that it is taught to be the nature of the seed.

original: de ltar mdor bstan pa bshad nas /
analyzed: de ltar mdor bstan pa bshad nas /
translated: Having explained the brief explanation in that way,

original: de nyid la rab tu dbye ba'i sgo nas rgyas par bstan pa brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de nyid la rab tu dbye ba'i sgo nas rgyas par bstan pa brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to express the extensive explanation by way of its divisions,

original: yi ge aa ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: yi ge aa ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: [the Bhagavān] declares, “The letter A,” and so on.

original: mdo ji lta ba bzhin no //
analyzed: mdo ji lta ba bzhin no //
translated: [It is] just as in the sūtra.

original: yi ge aom ni yi ge gsum gyi ngo bo zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: yi ge aom ni yi ge gsum gyi ngo bo zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The letter Oṃ is the nature of the three letters.

original: de ltar rab tu dbye ba'i sgo nas rgyas par bshad pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar rab tu dbye ba'i sgo nas rgyas par bshad pa bstan nas /
translated: Having taught the extensive explanation by way of the divisions in that way,

original: so sor rgyas par bshad pa'i yan lag aa yig la gnas brjod pa sngon du 'gro bas de'i che ba'i bdag nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: so sor rgyas par bshad pa'i yan lag aa yig la gnas brjod pa sngon du 'gro bas de'i che ba'i bdag nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to teach the greatness of that [A] by way of the branch of the individual extensive explanations, the statement of the abode of the letter A preceding it,

original: aa ni chos kyi 'khor lo padma zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: aa ni chos kyi 'khor lo padma zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: [the Bhagavān] declares, “A is the lotus of the dharmacakra,” and so on.

original: aa yig ni srog gi @145a * //
analyzed: aa yig ni srog gi @145a * //
translated: The letter A is the form of the life-

original: rlung gi rnam pa'o //
analyzed: rlung gi rnam pa'o //
translated: vāyu.

original: chos kyi 'khor lo'i chu skyes ni padma'o //
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo'i chu skyes ni padma'o //
translated: The lotus of the dharmacakra is the navel.

original: de la brten nas rlung gi 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni smin ma'i dbus su gnas pa'i rtsibs drug pa la'o //
analyzed: de la brten nas rlung gi 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni smin ma'i dbus su gnas pa'i rtsibs drug pa la'o //
translated: The so-called wind-wheel is the six-spoked [wheel] located in the middle of the eyebrows.

original: khyab ces bya ba ni de'i mthar thug par khyab nas gnas pa'o //
analyzed: khyab ces bya ba ni de'i mthar thug par khyab nas gnas pa'o //
translated: The so-called pervading is the pervading up to its end.

original: aa yig gi rnam pa ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: aa yig gi rnam pa ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is the form of the letter A?

original: de'i phyir sgrib med ces bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir sgrib med ces bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, it is said unobstructed.

original: mi mthun pa'i phyogs rnams kyi zil gyis mi non pa'i phyir dri ma med pa'o //
analyzed: mi mthun pa'i phyogs rnams kyi zil gyis mi non pa'i phyir dri ma med pa'o //
translated: It is stainless because it is not overcome by the opposing factors.

original: rlung chen po zhes bya ba ni nang gi bdag nyid can gyi rnam par shes pa'i bzhon pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rlung chen po zhes bya ba ni nang gi bdag nyid can gyi rnam par shes pa'i bzhon pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The so-called great wind is because it is the mount of consciousness with an inner nature.

original: srog ces bya ba ni srog gi ming can no //
analyzed: srog ces bya ba ni srog gi ming can no //
translated: The so-called life is the one with the name of life.

original: thams cad bsdus zhes bya ba ni rlung thams cad sdud par byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: thams cad bsdus zhes bya ba ni rlung thams cad sdud par byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The so-called collecting all is because it collects all winds.

original: cha med ces bya ba ni zad pa dang 'phel ba'i bdag nyid can gyi cha dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: cha med ces bya ba ni zad pa dang 'phel ba'i bdag nyid can gyi cha dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The so-called partless is because it is free from parts with the nature of decrease and increase.

original: cha dang bral ba zhes bya ba ni rtogs par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //🔽dngos dang dngos med mtha' spangs pa //
analyzed: cha dang bral ba zhes bya ba ni rtogs par mi nus pa'i phyir ro // dngos dang dngos med mtha' spangs pa //
translated: The partless is because it cannot be realized.

original: zhes bya ba ni don dam par rang bzhin med pa nyid kyi phyir dang / kun rdzob tu yang rang rig par bya ba nyid kyi phyir mtha' gnyis spangs pa ni bral ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni don dam par rang bzhin med pa nyid kyi phyir dang / kun rdzob tu yang rang rig par bya ba nyid kyi phyir mtha' gnyis spangs pa ni bral ba'o //
translated: The extreme of existence and non-existence is because of the absence of intrinsic reality in the ultimate, and because of the absence of the two extremes in the conventional, since it is to be known by oneself.

original: gzhan yang ji lta bu zhe na /🔽de'i phyir / thig le 'khor lo cha la khyab //
analyzed: gzhan yang ji lta bu zhe na / de'i phyir / thig le 'khor lo cha la khyab //
translated: Moreover, how is it?🔽 Therefore, it is said:

original: ces bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: ces bya ba gsungs te /
translated: The sphere pervades the part of the wheel.

original: bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo'i cha ni ha yig gi rnam pa la brten nas gnas pa'i phyir de la khyab pa'o //
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo'i cha ni ha yig gi rnam pa la brten nas gnas pa'i phyir de la khyab pa'o //
translated: The part of the wheel of great bliss is pervaded by it, because it abides in dependence on the form of the syllable ha.

original: nam mkha'i khams ni zhes bya ba ni stong pa'i dbus su gnas pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams ni zhes bya ba ni stong pa'i dbus su gnas pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The element of space is because it abides in the middle of emptiness.

original: yi ge mchog ces bya ba ni don dam par yi ge'i dbyibs las phyi rol du gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yi ge mchog ces bya ba ni don dam par yi ge'i dbyibs las phyi rol du gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The supreme syllable is because it is external to the shape of the syllable in the ultimate.

original: sngags rnams thams cad rab sad byed //
analyzed: sngags rnams thams cad rab sad byed //
translated: It awakens all mantras.

original: ces bya ba ni sngags thams cad ni sbrul la sogs pa dang / snying po dang nye ba'i snying po la sogs pa rnams dang de'i don ni brjod par bya bas bsdus pa'i gzhi ni rten gyi ngo bo'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni sngags thams cad ni sbrul la sogs pa dang / snying po dang nye ba'i snying po la sogs pa rnams dang de'i don ni brjod par bya bas bsdus pa'i gzhi ni rten gyi ngo bo'o //
translated: All mantras are the snake and so forth, the essence, the near essence, and so on. Their meaning is the basis included in the expressible, the nature of the support.

original: aa'i yi ge nyid la brten nas ma lus pa'i brjod par bya ba dang rjod par byed pa 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: aa'i yi ge nyid la brten nas ma lus pa'i brjod par bya ba dang rjod par byed pa 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the expressible and the expression are engaged in the very letter A.

original: rab sad byed ces bya ba ni de ma thag par gsungs pa'i gdod ma nas ma skyes pa'i chos nyid kyis so //
analyzed: rab sad byed ces bya ba ni de ma thag par gsungs pa'i gdod ma nas ma skyes pa'i chos nyid kyis so //
translated: The awakener is by the intrinsic reality of non-production just mentioned.

original: sad par byed pa ni rtogs par byed pa'o //
analyzed: sad par byed pa ni rtogs par byed pa'o //
translated: Awakening is the realization.

original: sngags thams cad gso bya byed ces bya ba ni byin gyis rlob par byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: sngags thams cad gso bya byed ces bya ba ni byin gyis rlob par byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: All mantras are healed, because of the consecration.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: de nyid phyir na mi dad de //
analyzed: de nyid phyir na mi dad de //
translated: Therefore, it is not faith,

original: sngags kyi ngo bo'i yig 'bru rnams //
analyzed: sngags kyi ngo bo'i yig 'bru rnams //
translated: The letters of the nature of mantra

original: rtsal yang ni mi nus te //🔽rgyu bar byed pa rtsom pa la //
analyzed: rtsal yang ni mi nus te // rgyu bar byed pa rtsom pa la //
translated: Are also not able to be powerful,

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: In the beginning of the activity.

original: ngag gi 'khor lo rab sad byed //
analyzed: ngag gi 'khor lo rab sad byed //
translated: The wheel of speech is fully awakened.

original: ces bya ba ni rang gi lus la gnas pa'i dag gi 'khor lo ni longs spyod kyi 'khor lo'i bdag nyid dang / ngag gi rnam par 'gyur ba ma lus @145b pa mtha' yas pa'i chos kyi phung po'i tshogs kyi mtshan nyid can la rab tu sad par byed pa ni /
analyzed: ces bya ba ni rang gi lus la gnas pa'i dag gi 'khor lo ni longs spyod kyi 'khor lo'i bdag nyid dang / ngag gi rnam par 'gyur ba ma lus @145b pa mtha' yas pa'i chos kyi phung po'i tshogs kyi mtshan nyid can la rab tu sad par byed pa ni /
translated: The wheel of speech located in one's body is the nature of the wheel of enjoyment, and it fully awakens the nature of the aggregate of the infinite Dharma collection of all the transformations of speech.

original: rtog pa skyed par byed pa dang / spro ba dang sdud par byed pa'o //
analyzed: rtog pa skyed par byed pa dang / spro ba dang sdud par byed pa'o //
translated: It generates concepts, and it expands and contracts.

original: dngos su lan gsum gyi ni gzhi //🔽zhes bya ba ni lan gsum gyi bar du gcod pa'i rtsa gsum gyi gzhi rten du gyur pa'o //
analyzed: dngos su lan gsum gyi ni gzhi // zhes bya ba ni lan gsum gyi bar du gcod pa'i rtsa gsum gyi gzhi rten du gyur pa'o //
translated: The basis of the three is direct.🔽The basis of the three is the support of the three nāḍīs that interrupt the three.

original: lan gsum gyi gzhi zhes bya ba ni byas nas so ;
analyzed: lan gsum gyi gzhi zhes bya ba ni byas nas so ;
translated: The basis of the three is the basis of the three.

original: / dngos su zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa'i mngon sum gyi rtogs pas so //
analyzed: / dngos su zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa'i mngon sum gyi rtogs pas so //
translated: Direct means the realization of the direct perception of the yogi.

original: 'byung ba thams cad dbang du byed //
analyzed: 'byung ba thams cad dbang du byed //
translated: It controls all the elements.

original: ces bya ba ni 'byung ba thams cad ni rang gi lus su gtogs pa'i khams kyi dkyil 'khor rnams la dbang du byed pa rnams kyi de bzhin no //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni 'byung ba thams cad ni rang gi lus su gtogs pa'i khams kyi dkyil 'khor rnams la dbang du byed pa rnams kyi de bzhin no //
translated: Thus, all the elements are the mandala of the constituents belonging to one's own body, and they are controlled.

original: zad med ces bya ba ni aa yig de nyid mi zad pa zhes bya bar brjod de /
analyzed: zad med ces bya ba ni aa yig de nyid mi zad pa zhes bya bar brjod de /
translated: The inexhaustible is that very syllable a which is called inexhaustible.

original: mi zad pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: mi zad pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because of its inexhaustibility.

original: 'pho ba med pa'i gnas zhes bya ba ni 'jig pa dang bral ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: 'pho ba med pa'i gnas zhes bya ba ni 'jig pa dang bral ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The place of non-transmigration is because of its freedom from destruction.

original: byang chub sa bon zhes bya ba ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi mtshan nyid ni byang chub kyi rgyur gyur pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: byang chub sa bon zhes bya ba ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi mtshan nyid ni byang chub kyi rgyur gyur pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The seed of enlightenment is the characteristic of non-dual wisdom, because it becomes the cause of enlightenment.

original: de nyid kyi phyir bde ba che zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir bde ba che zhes bya ba ste /
translated: For that very reason, it is called great bliss,

original: de'i dus na sdug bsngal thams cad nye bar zhi ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i dus na sdug bsngal thams cad nye bar zhi ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because at that time all suffering is completely pacified.

original: gzugs med khams su yang dag bshad //
analyzed: gzugs med khams su yang dag bshad //
translated: It is explained as the formless realm.

original: ces bya ba ni aa yig gi dbang gis snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni aa yig gi dbang gis snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is because of the syllable a that the four meditative absorptions are fully accomplished.

original: 'khor lo bzhi yi don bsdus pa //
analyzed: 'khor lo bzhi yi don bsdus pa //
translated: The meaning of the four wheels is summarized.

original: zhes bya ba ni sprul pa la sogs pa'i 'khor lo bzhi'i don ni don dam pa'i rnam pa'i ngo bos bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sprul pa la sogs pa'i 'khor lo bzhi'i don ni don dam pa'i rnam pa'i ngo bos bsdus pa'o //
translated: The meaning of the four wheels, such as the emanation wheel, is summarized by the nature of the ultimate aspect.

original: yang na gzugs med khams kyi bye brag 'dis brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: yang na gzugs med khams kyi bye brag 'dis brjod par bya ste /
translated: Or else, this distinction of the formless realm should be expressed.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi po 'khor lo bzhis bsdus pa'i phyir ro //🔽de ltar aa yig gi gnas brjod pa sngon du 'gro bas che ba'i bdag nyid brjod nas /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi po 'khor lo bzhis bsdus pa'i phyir ro // de ltar aa yig gi gnas brjod pa sngon du 'gro bas che ba'i bdag nyid brjod nas /
translated: Because the four formless meditative absorptions are included in the four wheels.🔽Thus, having expressed the greatness preceded by the expression of the location of the letter A,

original: au yig la yang de brjod pa sngon du 'gro bas che ba'i bdag nyid brjod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: au yig la yang de brjod pa sngon du 'gro bas che ba'i bdag nyid brjod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: in order to express the greatness preceded by the expression of the letter U.

original: au yig longs spyod 'khor lor gnas //
analyzed: au yig longs spyod 'khor lor gnas //
translated: The letter U is located in the enjoyment wheel.

original: zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes gsungs te /
translated: It is said.

original: au yig ni sum skor gyi rtsa rjod par byed pa la cha nyid kyi phyir ro //🔽me dang nyi ma dang 'dra ba'i //
analyzed: au yig ni sum skor gyi rtsa rjod par byed pa la cha nyid kyi phyir ro // me dang nyi ma dang 'dra ba'i //
translated: The letter U is the expression of the channel of the triple coil because of the nature of the part.🔽Like fire and the sun.

original: zhes bya ba ni me dang nyi ma ltar 'od gsal gyi rnam pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni me dang nyi ma ltar 'od gsal gyi rnam pa'o //
translated: The nature of the clear light is like fire and the sun.

original: me yang yin la nyi ma yang yin pa sna me dang nyi ma dag go //
analyzed: me yang yin la nyi ma yang yin pa sna me dang nyi ma dag go //
translated: The fire is also the sun, so they are the nose, fire, and sun.

original: de dang 'dra ba 'am mtshungs pa gal yod pa de la de skad ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: de dang 'dra ba 'am mtshungs pa gal yod pa de la de skad ces bya ba'o //
translated: That which is similar to or equal with that is so called.

original: mgrin pa'i mtha' nas zhes bya ba ni mgrin pa'i mtha' ma nas so //
analyzed: mgrin pa'i mtha' nas zhes bya ba ni mgrin pa'i mtha' ma nas so //
translated: From the end of the throat means from the end of the throat.

original: spyi gtsug mtha' zhes bya ba ni bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo'i mtha'i bar du zhes bya ba'i tha chig go //
analyzed: spyi gtsug mtha' zhes bya ba ni bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo'i mtha'i bar du zhes bya ba'i tha chig go //
translated: Up to the end of the crown means up to the end of the wheel of great bliss.

original: khyab pa'i zhes bya ba ni de nas brtsams nas bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo'i mtha'i bar du gnas @146a * //
analyzed: khyab pa'i zhes bya ba ni de nas brtsams nas bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo'i mtha'i bar du gnas @146a * //
translated: It pervades means it abides from there up to the end of the wheel of great bliss.

original: pa'o ; / ci'i phyir zhe na khyad par gyi sgo nas gtan tshigs gsungs pa ni /
analyzed: pa'o ; / ci'i phyir zhe na khyad par gyi sgo nas gtan tshigs gsungs pa ni /
translated: Why is that? The reason is stated from the perspective of a distinction.

original: gzi brjid kyi ni lus zhes bya ba ni 'bar ba'i rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: gzi brjid kyi ni lus zhes bya ba ni 'bar ba'i rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The body of splendor means it has the nature of blazing.

original: gzugs kyi khams zhes bya ba ni ro drug gi longs spyod la lha'i rnam pa bsgoms pas rang bzhin med par shes pas 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang bral nas gzugs kyi khams zhes bya bar brjod pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs kyi khams zhes bya ba ni ro drug gi longs spyod la lha'i rnam pa bsgoms pas rang bzhin med par shes pas 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang bral nas gzugs kyi khams zhes bya bar brjod pa'o //
translated: The so-called form realm is the realm of the six flavors. By meditating on the form of the gods, one becomes free from the passion of desire and is said to be in the form realm, because one knows that it is devoid of intrinsic nature.

original: gnas ris bcu bdun bdag nyid can //
analyzed: gnas ris bcu bdun bdag nyid can //
translated: It has the nature of seventeen abodes.

original: zhes bya ba ni bsam gtan bzhi la so sor lha'i gnas kyis bsdus pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bsam gtan bzhi la so sor lha'i gnas kyis bsdus pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: This is because each of the four meditative concentrations is included in a separate abode of the gods.

original: de ltar au yig la yang che ba'i bdag nyid bstan nas ma yig la yang de brjod pa sngon du 'gro bas che ba'i bdag nyid ston zhing gsungs pa ni /
analyzed: de ltar au yig la yang che ba'i bdag nyid bstan nas ma yig la yang de brjod pa sngon du 'gro bas che ba'i bdag nyid ston zhing gsungs pa ni /
translated: Having thus taught the greatness of the letter o, he now teaches and explains the greatness of the letter m, preceded by a statement of the greatness of the letter m.

original: bde chen 'khor lo zhes byar gnas //
analyzed: bde chen 'khor lo zhes byar gnas //
translated: It is located in the wheel of great bliss.

original: yi ge ma ni zhes bya ba ni bde ba chen po'i sa bon nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: yi ge ma ni zhes bya ba ni bde ba chen po'i sa bon nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The letter m is so called because it is the seed of the stage of great bliss.

original: thig le tsam zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems kyi thig le tsam gyi ngo bo'o //
analyzed: thig le tsam zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems kyi thig le tsam gyi ngo bo'o //
translated: It is the mere drop, because it is the essence of the mere drop of bodhicitta.

original: mtho gang tshad ni sor bcu gnyis //
analyzed: mtho gang tshad ni sor bcu gnyis //
translated: It is the size of a span, twelve finger-widths.

original: mtha' ni sor bzhi'i tshad tsam rgal //
analyzed: mtha' ni sor bzhi'i tshad tsam rgal //
translated: The end is four finger-breadths beyond.

original: zhes bya ba ni ngag ste de las mtho gang tsam ni sor bcu gnyis so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ngag ste de las mtho gang tsam ni sor bcu gnyis so //
translated: This is the speech. Beyond that, a span is twelve finger-breadths.

original: rgal bar ni 'da' bar byas nas so //
analyzed: rgal bar ni 'da' bar byas nas so //
translated: Beyond is beyond that.

original: steng du gnas zhes bya ba ni sor bcu gnyis kyi tshad tsam la brten nas gnas pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: steng du gnas zhes bya ba ni sor bcu gnyis kyi tshad tsam la brten nas gnas pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Above is the meaning of “abiding at twelve finger-breadths.”

original: zla ba'i gzugs dang 'dra ba yi //
analyzed: zla ba'i gzugs dang 'dra ba yi //
translated: Like the form of the moon,

original: zhes bya ba ni 'od gsal ba nyid kyis yongs su gang bas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang 'dra ba'o//
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'od gsal ba nyid kyis yongs su gang bas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang 'dra ba'o//
translated: it is like the orb of the moon, completely filled with clear light.

original: bde ba chen po'i go 'phang ni //
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i go 'phang ni //
translated: The state of great bliss

original: zhes bya ba ni don dam pa'i rang bzhin gyi bde ba chen po shin tu gsal bar byed pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni don dam pa'i rang bzhin gyi bde ba chen po shin tu gsal bar byed pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: is the cause of the clear manifestation of the ultimate nature of great bliss.

original: zhi zhes bya ba ni ma lus pa'i lus gso bar byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: zhi zhes bya ba ni ma lus pa'i lus gso bar byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Peace is the meaning of “healing the entire body.”

original: rtsa rnams kun la khyab pa po //
analyzed: rtsa rnams kun la khyab pa po //
translated: Pervading all the channels

original: zhes bya ba ni lus su gtogs pa'i rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis la khyab pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni lus su gtogs pa'i rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis la khyab pa'o //
translated: means pervading the thirty-two channels that are part of the body.

original: mi phyed lus kyi go 'phang ni //
analyzed: mi phyed lus kyi go 'phang ni //
translated: The state of the body is indivisible.

original: zhes bya ba ni don dam par mi phyed pa'i ye shes las phyi rol du gyur pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni don dam par mi phyed pa'i ye shes las phyi rol du gyur pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because, ultimately, there is nothing external to the indivisible intuition.

original: mi phyed go 'phang ni lus te /🔽de gang la yod pa zhes bya bar byas nas so //
analyzed: mi phyed go 'phang ni lus te / de gang la yod pa zhes bya bar byas nas so //
translated: The state of the body is indivisible.🔽This is because it is made of the indivisible atoms of the four great elements.

original: 'dod pa'i khams zhes bshad pa yin //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i khams zhes bshad pa yin //
translated: The realm of desire is explained.

original: zhes bya ba ni rkang me dang rkang gnyis la sogs pa sgo nga las skyes pa'i dbye bas tha dad pa rnams la byang chub kyi sems nyid las skyes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rkang me dang rkang gnyis la sogs pa sgo nga las skyes pa'i dbye bas tha dad pa rnams la byang chub kyi sems nyid las skyes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because the twenty different kinds of beings, such as the egg-born, the footless, the two-footed, etc., are born from the bodhisattva himself.

original: gnas rigs nyi shus bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: gnas rigs nyi shus bsdus pa'o //
translated: The realm of desire is included in the twenty different kinds of beings.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: dmyal ba yi dags dud 'gro dang // mi dang lha gnas drug po ni //
analyzed: dmyal ba yi dags dud 'gro dang // mi dang lha gnas drug po ni //
translated: The six abodes of hell-beings, hungry ghosts, animals, humans, and gods,

original: 'dod pa'i khams zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i khams zhes bya ba'o //
translated: are called the realm of desire.

original: de ltar aa yig la yang de brjod pa sngon du 'gro bas che ba'i bdag nyid bstan nas yi ge gsum bsdus nas rnam @146b par dag pa sngon du 'gro bar bya ba brjod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ltar aa yig la yang de brjod pa sngon du 'gro bas che ba'i bdag nyid bstan nas yi ge gsum bsdus nas rnam @146b par dag pa sngon du 'gro bar bya ba brjod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Thus, having taught the greatness of the letter A, preceded by the statement, “In the same way,” he condenses the three letters and states the purification that precedes them.

original: de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te sngon du bshad pa'i rigs pas so //
analyzed: de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te sngon du bshad pa'i rigs pas so //
translated: “ In the same way” and so on. By the reasoning explained previously.

original: rlung ni srog la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rlung ni srog la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: “ Wind” is the nature of the life-force and so on.

original: khams gsum gyi zhes bya ba ni gzugs med pa la sogs pa'i dbye bas so //
analyzed: khams gsum gyi zhes bya ba ni gzugs med pa la sogs pa'i dbye bas so //
translated: “ The three realms” is the division of the formless and so on.

original: rtsa gsum ni gnas su 'dus zhes bya ba ni rtsa gsum ni la la n'a la sogs pa'i tshig gis bsdus pa ste de rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: rtsa gsum ni gnas su 'dus zhes bya ba ni rtsa gsum ni la la n'a la sogs pa'i tshig gis bsdus pa ste de rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo'o //
translated: “ The three nāḍīs are gathered in the place” is the three nāḍīs included in the words lalanā and so on, which are the nature of their purification.

original: rlung dang khams la sogs pa rnams dang rtsa gsum dang rlung dang khams la sogs pa'i rtsa gsum ste bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: rlung dang khams la sogs pa rnams dang rtsa gsum dang rlung dang khams la sogs pa'i rtsa gsum ste bsdus pa'o //
translated: The three nāḍīs, the three winds and elements, and so on, and the three nāḍīs of the winds and elements, and so on, are included.

original: aom yig ni brda zhes bya ba ni aom yig gi rnam pa'i yi ge zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: aom yig ni brda zhes bya ba ni aom yig gi rnam pa'i yi ge zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: “ The syllable oṃ is the sign” means the syllable oṃ is the form of the letter.

original: brda shes bya zhes bya ba ni shes pa'o //🔽khams gsum rnam par sad par byed //
analyzed: brda shes bya zhes bya ba ni shes pa'o // khams gsum rnam par sad par byed //
translated: The object of knowledge is consciousness.

original: ces bya ba ni 'dod pa la sogs pa'i khams gsum sad par byed pa'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni 'dod pa la sogs pa'i khams gsum sad par byed pa'o //
translated: Awakening the three realms means awakening the three realms of desire and so forth.

original: rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba ni de skyed pa'i rgyu nyid du gyur pa'i phyir ro //🔽'gro gzugs rnam pa'i spro bdag nyid //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba ni de skyed pa'i rgyu nyid du gyur pa'i phyir ro // 'gro gzugs rnam pa'i spro bdag nyid //
translated: Vairocana means that he is the cause for their generation.

original: ces bya ba ni 'gro ba ni khams gsum ste /
analyzed: ces bya ba ni 'gro ba ni khams gsum ste /
translated: The nature of the emanation of the forms of beings means that beings are the three realms.

original: gzugs kyi rnam pa ni gzugs kyi phung po'i rnam pas so //
analyzed: gzugs kyi rnam pa ni gzugs kyi phung po'i rnam pas so //
translated: The forms are the forms of the form aggregate.

original: spro ba'i bdag nyid ni de'i rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: spro ba'i bdag nyid ni de'i rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The nature of the emanation is the purity of those.

original: khams gsum gyi ngo bo ni don dam par ni stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: khams gsum gyi ngo bo ni don dam par ni stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The nature of the three realms is ultimately emptiness.

original: bya ba ci zhig byed ce na /
analyzed: bya ba ci zhig byed ce na /
translated: What is the function?🔽 Therefore, it is said:

original: de'i phyir / rnam par rtog pa'i rlung gnyis ni //
analyzed: de'i phyir / rnam par rtog pa'i rlung gnyis ni //
translated: The two conceptual winds

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te srog dang thur sel gyi bdag nyid do //
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te srog dang thur sel gyi bdag nyid do //
translated: are the nature of life and downward-voiding.

original: rnam par rtog pa'i rang bzhin gyi rlung gnyis so //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa'i rang bzhin gyi rlung gnyis so //
translated: The two winds have the nature of conceptualization.

original: sna'i bu gnas zhes bya ba ni kun rdzob kyi sna rtse'i bu ga gnyis nas so //
analyzed: sna'i bu gnas zhes bya ba ni kun rdzob kyi sna rtse'i bu ga gnyis nas so //
translated: The nostrils are called the “mouths of the nose.”

original: yang dag spro zhes bya ba ni so so'i skye bo rnams kyis kyang dbugs dbyung ba dang 'jug pa shin tu gsal ba nyid kyis nyams su myong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yang dag spro zhes bya ba ni so so'i skye bo rnams kyis kyang dbugs dbyung ba dang 'jug pa shin tu gsal ba nyid kyis nyams su myong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: “Properly exhaled” means that even ordinary people experience the exhalation and inhalation of the breath because of its clarity.

original: nyi ma zla ba gnyis zhes bya ba ni lus kyi 'og tu khrag dang khu ba dag yongs su dag par 'byung zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: nyi ma zla ba gnyis zhes bya ba ni lus kyi 'og tu khrag dang khu ba dag yongs su dag par 'byung zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The “two, the sun and moon,” means that blood and semen are produced in a pure form in the lower part of the body.

original: gnyis zhes bya ba la gnyi ga zhes bya ba ni gnyis so //
analyzed: gnyis zhes bya ba la gnyi ga zhes bya ba ni gnyis so //
translated: “Two” means both.

original: yang dag ces bya ba ni phyin ci ma log pa nyid kyis so //
analyzed: yang dag ces bya ba ni phyin ci ma log pa nyid kyis so //
translated: “Properly” means without error.

original: gyen du rgyu ba'i rlung gnyis po dang / 'og tu rgyu ba'i zla ba dang / nyi ma dag la nang du rgyu ba zhes bya ba ni nang du rgyu ba'o //
analyzed: gyen du rgyu ba'i rlung gnyis po dang / 'og tu rgyu ba'i zla ba dang / nyi ma dag la nang du rgyu ba zhes bya ba ni nang du rgyu ba'o //
translated: The two upward-moving winds and the downward-moving sun and moon are called “internal movements.”

original: yang dag sbas pa zhes bya ba ni ji lta ba bzhin du sbas pa'i ngo bo la brten nas gnas pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag sbas pa zhes bya ba ni ji lta ba bzhin du sbas pa'i ngo bo la brten nas gnas pa'o //
translated: “Properly hidden” means that they are present based on a hidden essence.

original: me ni 'bar byed ces bya ba ni longs spyod kyi 'khor lo na gnas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: me ni 'bar byed ces bya ba ni longs spyod kyi 'khor lo na gnas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Fire is the igniter, because it is located in the enjoyment wheel.

original: rtse mo la ni smin ma'i dbus //
analyzed: rtse mo la ni smin ma'i dbus //
translated: The peak is in the middle of the eyebrows.

original: zhes bya ba ni bde ba chen po dang rlung gi 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bde ba chen po dang rlung gi 'khor lo'o //
translated: This is the great-bliss and wind wheels.

original: srog ni rlung zhes bya ba ni srog gi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: srog ni rlung zhes bya ba ni srog gi rang bzhin no //
translated: Life is the wind, because it is the nature of life.

original: de ltar zhes bya ba ni sngar gsungs pa'i rigs pas so //
analyzed: de ltar zhes bya ba ni sngar gsungs pa'i rigs pas so //
translated: Thus, by the reasoning stated above.

original: gcig @147a * //
analyzed: gcig @147a * //
translated: The one

original: pu 'ang zhes bya ba ni aom yig gi bdag nyid do //
analyzed: pu 'ang zhes bya ba ni aom yig gi bdag nyid do //
translated: is the nature of the letter Om.

original: gsum du bshad ces bya ba ni aa yig dang ma yig gi ngo bo nyid kyis de ma thag par bshad pa'i cho gas so //
analyzed: gsum du bshad ces bya ba ni aa yig dang ma yig gi ngo bo nyid kyis de ma thag par bshad pa'i cho gas so //
translated: The three are explained, by the nature of the letters A and Ma, by the rite just explained.

original: so sor sku la sogs pa de kho na nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid do //
analyzed: so sor sku la sogs pa de kho na nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid do //
translated: Each is the nature of the three realities of body and so on.

original: khams gsum la khyab pa zhes bya ba ni srog gi rlung gi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: khams gsum la khyab pa zhes bya ba ni srog gi rlung gi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: It pervades the three realms, because it is the nature of the life wind.

original: zhi ba zhes bya ba ni zhi ba la sogs pa'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: zhi ba zhes bya ba ni zhi ba la sogs pa'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: It is peace, because it is the cause of peace and so on.

original: sa bon don kun bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: sa bon don kun bsdus pa'o //
translated: The seed includes all meanings.

original: zhes bya ba ni ma lus pa'i sngags kyi yi ge gtso bor gyur pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ma lus pa'i sngags kyi yi ge gtso bor gyur pa'o //
translated: Thus, the seed syllables of the mantra are the principal ones.

original: yang na skyed pa'i sa bon don rgyas pa'o zhes kha cig las byung ngo //
analyzed: yang na skyed pa'i sa bon don rgyas pa'o zhes kha cig las byung ngo //
translated: Or, the seed syllables are the cause of generation, and the meaning is the expansion, according to some.

original: de'i phyogs la skyed pa'i sa bon sems skyed par byed pa byang chub kyi sems kyi khams so //
analyzed: de'i phyogs la skyed pa'i sa bon sems skyed par byed pa byang chub kyi sems kyi khams so //
translated: In that case, the seed syllables are the cause of generation, and the generation of the mind is the element of the thought of enlightenment.

original: rgyas pa'o zhes bya ba ni khams sum cu rtsa gnyis la khyab par byed pa'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rgyas pa'o zhes bya ba ni khams sum cu rtsa gnyis la khyab par byed pa'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The expansion is the pervasion of the thirty-two elements, is the meaning.

original: de ltar don rnam pa bzhis so sor rgyas par bstan pa gsungs so //🔽'dis ni lus kyi sa bon brjod pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi don bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar don rnam pa bzhis so sor rgyas par bstan pa gsungs so // 'dis ni lus kyi sa bon brjod pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi don bstan nas /
translated: Thus, he has taught the individual expansion by way of the four kinds of meaning.🔽Having taught the meaning characterized by the expression of the seed syllables of the body,

original: ngag gi sa bon brjod pa'i dang por mdor bstan pa ni /
analyzed: ngag gi sa bon brjod pa'i dang por mdor bstan pa ni /
translated: he teaches the meaning characterized by the expression of the seed syllables of speech.

original: yi ge aa ni ye shes mchog / ces bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: yi ge aa ni ye shes mchog / ces bya ba gsungs te /
translated: The syllable A is the supreme intuition,

original: ngag rnam par dag pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: ngag rnam par dag pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because of the purity of speech.

original: gsung gi rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya ba ni snang ba mtha' yas kyi snying po nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: gsung gi rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya ba ni snang ba mtha' yas kyi snying po nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The essence of the Vajra Speech is the essence of Amitabha.

original: mchog ces bya ba ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bos mchog nyid do //
analyzed: mchog ces bya ba ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bos mchog nyid do //
translated: The supreme is the supreme nature of the wisdom of discernment.

original: de ltar mdor bstan pa bshad nas /
analyzed: de ltar mdor bstan pa bshad nas /
translated: Having explained the brief explanation,

original: de nyid kyi rab tu dbye ba'i sgo nas rgyas par bshad pa brjod pa'i phyir /🔽aa gnyis dang ni yi ge ha //
analyzed: de nyid kyi rab tu dbye ba'i sgo nas rgyas par bshad pa brjod pa'i phyir / aa gnyis dang ni yi ge ha //
translated: in order to explain the extensive explanation by way of its divisions,🔽he says,

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: the two a's and the syllable ha.

original: tshigs su bcad pa ji lta ba bzhin no //
analyzed: tshigs su bcad pa ji lta ba bzhin no //
translated: As in the verse.

original: ring por byas te zhes bya ba ni mnyam pa ni yi ge 'dra ba dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas gong ma'i aa ring por byas te /
analyzed: ring por byas te zhes bya ba ni mnyam pa ni yi ge 'dra ba dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas gong ma'i aa ring por byas te /
translated: Having made it long means that the equal a is made long by the equal a above it, and so on.

original: aa 'og ma phyis pas a'a ha zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: aa 'og ma phyis pas a'a ha zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The lower a is erased, and so it becomes a ha.

original: de ltar na de nyid rnam pa gsum mo //🔽de ltar rgyas par bshad pa bstan nas /🔽so sor rgyas par bshad pa brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de ltar na de nyid rnam pa gsum mo // de ltar rgyas par bshad pa bstan nas / so sor rgyas par bshad pa brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: Thus, it is threefold.🔽Having explained the extensive explanation in that way,

original: aa yig dang po brjod pa sngon du 'gro bas /
analyzed: aa yig dang po brjod pa sngon du 'gro bas /
translated: in order to explain the individual extensive explanations,🔽he says,

original: de yi che ba'i bdag nyid ni //
analyzed: de yi che ba'i bdag nyid ni //
translated: the greatness of that

original: yi ge aa ni sngar bshad zin //
analyzed: yi ge aa ni sngar bshad zin //
translated: is the syllable a, which was explained previously.

original: zhes bya ba ni aom gyi yi ge bshad pa'i dus na ji skad du /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni aom gyi yi ge bshad pa'i dus na ji skad du /
translated: This is as stated in the explanation of the syllable OṀ:

original: aa yig chos kyi 'khor padma //
analyzed: aa yig chos kyi 'khor padma //
translated: The letter A is the lotus of the Dharma wheel,

original: rlung gi 'khor lo la ni khyab //🔽ces gsungs so //
analyzed: rlung gi 'khor lo la ni khyab // ces gsungs so //
translated: pervading the wind wheel.

original: chos kyi dbyings kyi don bsdus pa //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyi don bsdus pa //
translated: The meaning of the dharmadhātu is summarized

original: zhes bya ba ni chos kyi dbyings thog ma tha ma med pa'i rigs kyi don ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni chos kyi dbyings thog ma tha ma med pa'i rigs kyi don ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i bdag nyid do //
translated: means the meaning of the dharmadhātu, the lineage without beginning or end, is the nature of natural purity.

original: de bsdus pa ni de'i khongs su gtogs zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de bsdus pa ni de'i khongs su gtogs zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Summarized means included in that.🔽The life-force wind

original: @147b srog gi rlung ni zhes bya ba ni srog gi rnam pa nyid do //
analyzed: @147b srog gi rlung ni zhes bya ba ni srog gi rnam pa nyid do //
translated: means the aspect of life itself.

original: mchog yin no zhes bya ba ni bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis rnam par dag par sbyang ba'i phyir mchog go //
analyzed: mchog yin no zhes bya ba ni bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis rnam par dag par sbyang ba'i phyir mchog go //
translated: Supreme means supreme because it is purified by the power of meditation.

original: stong nyid ye shes ming can de //
analyzed: stong nyid ye shes ming can de //
translated: That is called the wisdom of emptiness

original: zhes bya ba ni rnam grangs kyis so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rnam grangs kyis so //
translated: means by way of synonym.

original: srog dang rtsol ba gnyis su rigs //
analyzed: srog dang rtsol ba gnyis su rigs //
translated: The two, life and exertion, are known as

original: zhes bya ba ni rlung gnyis so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rlung gnyis so //
translated: means the two winds.

original: de bsdus zhes bya ba ni rigs pa ste /
analyzed: de bsdus zhes bya ba ni rigs pa ste /
translated: Summarized means included in the lineage.

original: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa dngos po'i mtshan nyid can gyis so //🔽yul dang dbang po bsdus pa yi //
analyzed: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa dngos po'i mtshan nyid can gyis so // yul dang dbang po bsdus pa yi //
translated: By the characteristics of the entities of the apprehended object and the apprehending subject.🔽The summary of the objects and the faculties

original: zhes bya ba ni yul dang dbang po bsdus pas yul dang dbang po bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni yul dang dbang po bsdus pas yul dang dbang po bsdus pa'o //
translated: is the summary of the objects and the faculties.

original: 'o na ji ltar yul dang dbang po bsdus shi na /🔽kun gzhi dang ni nyon mongs yid //
analyzed: 'o na ji ltar yul dang dbang po bsdus shi na / kun gzhi dang ni nyon mongs yid //
translated: If that is so, how are the objects and the faculties summarized?🔽The alaya and the afflicted mind

original: ces gsungs te /
analyzed: ces gsungs te /
translated: are the objects and the faculties.

original: phyi rol gyi don med pa la kun gzhi rnam par shes pa nyid de dang de'i bag chags kyi stobs kyis sngon po la sogs pa'i dbye bas snang ba nyid de gzung ba'i rnam pas so //
analyzed: phyi rol gyi don med pa la kun gzhi rnam par shes pa nyid de dang de'i bag chags kyi stobs kyis sngon po la sogs pa'i dbye bas snang ba nyid de gzung ba'i rnam pas so //
translated: In the absence of external objects, the alaya consciousness itself, by the power of its latent tendencies, appears as blue and so on. It is the aspect of the apprehended object.

original: nyon mongs pa can gyi yid dang / dbang po rnams la de'i snang ba'i rnam pa la brten nas 'dzin pa'i rnam pa snang ba'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa can gyi yid dang / dbang po rnams la de'i snang ba'i rnam pa la brten nas 'dzin pa'i rnam pa snang ba'o //
translated: The afflicted mind and the faculties appear as the aspect of the apprehender in dependence on the aspect of the appearance of that.

original: de la brten pa ni srog rtsol gyi lam gnyis so //
analyzed: de la brten pa ni srog rtsol gyi lam gnyis so //
translated: The two paths of life-force and exertion are based on that.

original: de nyid kyi phyir /🔽gzung dang 'dzin pa'i ngo bo nyid //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir / gzung dang 'dzin pa'i ngo bo nyid //
translated: For that very reason,

original: ces gsungs so //
analyzed: ces gsungs so //
translated: it is said:🔽The essence of the apprehended object and the apprehending subject.

original: rnam par shes pa gcig nyid la gzung ba dang 'dzin pa dag dmigs nas rlung gnyis kyi ngo bos rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa gcig nyid la gzung ba dang 'dzin pa dag dmigs nas rlung gnyis kyi ngo bos rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: In a single consciousness, having observed the object and subject, the meaning is that the two winds appear in the nature of the two syllables.

original: ngo bo gcig tu gyur nas ni //
analyzed: ngo bo gcig tu gyur nas ni //
translated: Having become one entity

original: zhes bya ba ni rlung gnyis srog dang rtsol ba'i mtshan nyid can gcig tu brtags nas so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rlung gnyis srog dang rtsol ba'i mtshan nyid can gcig tu brtags nas so //
translated: means that the two winds, characterized as life and exertion, are imagined as one.

original: gsung gi rdo rje zhes bya ba ni snang ba mtha' yas kyi sa bon no //
analyzed: gsung gi rdo rje zhes bya ba ni snang ba mtha' yas kyi sa bon no //
translated: Vāgvajra means the seed of Amitābha.

original: brjod pa'i tshig ces bya ba ni bskul ba'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: brjod pa'i tshig ces bya ba ni bskul ba'i bdag nyid do //
translated: The words of expression means the nature of the invocation.

original: de ltar aa yig dang po brjod pa sngon du 'gro bas de'i che ba'i bdag nyid brjod nas /
analyzed: de ltar aa yig dang po brjod pa sngon du 'gro bas de'i che ba'i bdag nyid brjod nas /
translated: Having thus stated the greatness of the first a syllable,

original: aa yi ga gnyis pa'i che ba ston cing gsungs pa ni /
analyzed: aa yi ga gnyis pa'i che ba ston cing gsungs pa ni /
translated: the second a syllable is taught, showing its greatness.

original: aa yig chos 'khor padma las //
analyzed: aa yig chos 'khor padma las //
translated: The a syllable from the dharmacakra lotus

original: zhes bya ba ni snying gar rtogs pa'i rlung gi rnam pa las so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni snying gar rtogs pa'i rlung gi rnam pa las so //
translated: means from the form of the wind of realization at the heart.

original: mgrin par zhes bya ba ni longs spyod kyi 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: mgrin par zhes bya ba ni longs spyod kyi 'khor lo'o //
translated: At the throat means at the enjoyment cakra.

original: yi ge aa nyid 'gyur zhes bya ba ni de nas de'i bar du khyab pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: yi ge aa nyid 'gyur zhes bya ba ni de nas de'i bar du khyab pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The letter A itself is transformed means that it pervades up to that point.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa //
translated: Therefore it is said:

original: yi ge aa nyid 'gyur zhes bya ba ste ring po nyid thob pa'o //🔽de ltar aa yig gnyis pa'i che ba'i bdag nyid bstan nas /
analyzed: yi ge aa nyid 'gyur zhes bya ba ste ring po nyid thob pa'o // de ltar aa yig gnyis pa'i che ba'i bdag nyid bstan nas /
translated: The letter A itself is transformed, that is, it attains length.

original: ha yig gsum pa'i che ba'i bdag nyid brjod pa'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: ha yig gsum pa'i che ba'i bdag nyid brjod pa'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: Thus, having taught the greatness of the second letter A, in order to express the greatness of the third letter H, it is said:

original: srog nyid dang ni zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: srog nyid dang ni zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Life itself,

original: spel ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: spel ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: that is, the meaning of “increase.”

original: thur sel zhes bya ba ni thul sel gyi rlung ngo //
analyzed: thur sel zhes bya ba ni thul sel gyi rlung ngo //
translated: Apana means the apana wind.

original: yi ge ha yig ces bya ba ni dbyangs yig med pas so //🔽kun nas ni zhes bya ba ni rnam @148a * //
analyzed: yi ge ha yig ces bya ba ni dbyangs yig med pas so // kun nas ni zhes bya ba ni rnam @148a * //
translated: The letter H means without a vowel.🔽All around means

original: pa thams cad kyis zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: pa thams cad kyis zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: in every way.

original: de ltar ha yig gsum pa'i che ba'i bdag nyid brjod nas yi ge gsum bsdu par byas nas de nyid la rnam par dag pa sngon du 'gro ba'i bya ba bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de ltar ha yig gsum pa'i che ba'i bdag nyid brjod nas yi ge gsum bsdu par byas nas de nyid la rnam par dag pa sngon du 'gro ba'i bya ba bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Thus, having expressed the greatness of the third letter H, in order to teach the purification that precedes the unification of the three letters, it is said:🔽The three letters are the three vajras.

original: mgrin pa'i dbus na gnas pa bcings //🔽zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: mgrin pa'i dbus na gnas pa bcings // zhes gsungs te /
translated: It is located in the middle of the throat, bound.

original: mgrin pa'i gnas zhes bya ba ni longs spyod kyi 'khor lor ro //
analyzed: mgrin pa'i gnas zhes bya ba ni longs spyod kyi 'khor lor ro //
translated: The “location of the throat” is the enjoyment cakra.

original: bcings zhes bya ba ni yi ge gsum gyi dbyibs srog dang thur sel gyi ngo bor byas nas zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bcings zhes bya ba ni yi ge gsum gyi dbyibs srog dang thur sel gyi ngo bor byas nas zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: “Bound” means that the shape of the three syllables is made into the nature of the life and downward-voiding [vāyus].

original: de ltar na aa ha zhes bya ba ni rlung gi sa bon no //
analyzed: de ltar na aa ha zhes bya ba ni rlung gi sa bon no //
translated: Thus, “a ha” is the seed of the vāyu.

original: kha nas gsal bar brjod ces bya ba ni mgrin pa'i gnas nas kha'i lam la nye bar gyur pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: kha nas gsal bar brjod ces bya ba ni mgrin pa'i gnas nas kha'i lam la nye bar gyur pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: “Clearly pronounced from the mouth” means that it is close to the path of the mouth from the location of the throat.

original: ro 'bab pa dang zhes bya ba ni ro drug 'bab pa'o //
analyzed: ro 'bab pa dang zhes bya ba ni ro drug 'bab pa'o //
translated: “The flow of taste” is the flow of the six tastes.

original: khrung khrung zhes bya ba ni gya gyu'i dbyibs can nyid kyi chu skyar gyi rnam pa'o //
analyzed: khrung khrung zhes bya ba ni gya gyu'i dbyibs can nyid kyi chu skyar gyi rnam pa'o //
translated: “Crane” means the shape of a crane, which is crooked.

original: ro skyur ba zhes bya ba ni ro la dga' ba nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya ba na de ltar zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: ro skyur ba zhes bya ba ni ro la dga' ba nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya ba na de ltar zhes bya ba ste /
translated: “Taste” means that because of delighting in taste, it is like that.

original: le'u bcu bdun par gsungs pa'i rtsa gsum gyi dbye bas so //
analyzed: le'u bcu bdun par gsungs pa'i rtsa gsum gyi dbye bas so //
translated: “Thus” refers to the three nāḍīs described in chapter 17.

original: de zhes bya ba ni aa yig go //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni aa yig go //
translated: The that is the letter A.

original: rab tu dbye bas yi ge gsum gyi ngo bo'o //
analyzed: rab tu dbye bas yi ge gsum gyi ngo bo'o //
translated: By the division, it is the nature of the three letters.

original: bkug nas rtag tu khyab par byed //
analyzed: bkug nas rtag tu khyab par byed //
translated: Having drawn in, always pervading.

original: ces bya ba ni bkug nas zhes bya ba ni de ma thag par gsungs pa'i rtsa gsum po'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni bkug nas zhes bya ba ni de ma thag par gsungs pa'i rtsa gsum po'o //
translated: Having drawn in means the three nāḍīs that were just mentioned.

original: khyab par byed ces bya ba ni rtsa de rnams la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: khyab par byed ces bya ba ni rtsa de rnams la gnas pa'o //
translated: Pervading means abiding in those nāḍīs.

original: rtag tu zhes bya ba ni dus thams cad du'o //
analyzed: rtag tu zhes bya ba ni dus thams cad du'o //
translated: Always means at all times.

original: gzugs kyi khams ni zhes bya ba ni de rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: gzugs kyi khams ni zhes bya ba ni de rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo'o //
translated: The form realm is the nature of their purification.

original: dmar chen po zhes bya ba ni snang ba mtha' yas kyi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir dmar po'i mdog can zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dmar chen po zhes bya ba ni snang ba mtha' yas kyi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir dmar po'i mdog can zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Great red means the color red because it is the nature of Amitābha.

original: de ltar don rnam pa bzhis so sor rgyas par bshad pa gsungs so //
analyzed: de ltar don rnam pa bzhis so sor rgyas par bshad pa gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is explained in detail by way of four topics.

original: de ltar don gsum gyi ngag gi sa bon gyi mtshan nyid kyi don bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar don gsum gyi ngag gi sa bon gyi mtshan nyid kyi don bstan nas /
translated: Having explained the meaning of the characteristics of the seed syllables of the three topics,

original: sems kyi sa bon brjod pa'i don du de'i yan lag mdor bstan pa ni /
analyzed: sems kyi sa bon brjod pa'i don du de'i yan lag mdor bstan pa ni /
translated: in order to explain the meaning of the expression of the seed syllable of the mind, the ancillary topic is presented.

original: h'um gi yi ge ye shes mchog / ces gsungs te /
analyzed: h'um gi yi ge ye shes mchog / ces gsungs te /
translated: The syllable HUM is the supreme intuition.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the very essence of the extremely pure reality realm.

original: thugs sa bon zhes bya ba ni thugs kyi sa bon no //
analyzed: thugs sa bon zhes bya ba ni thugs kyi sa bon no //
translated: The seed of mind means the seed of mind.

original: mi bskyod pa'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: mi bskyod pa'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the cause of Akshobhya.

original: mchog ces bya ba ni gtso bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: mchog ces bya ba ni gtso bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Supreme means the principal one.

original: de ltar mdor bstan pa bshad nas /
analyzed: de ltar mdor bstan pa bshad nas /
translated: Having thus explained the brief presentation,

original: de nyid la rab tu dbye ba'i sgo nas rgyas par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de nyid la rab tu dbye ba'i sgo nas rgyas par bstan pa ni /
translated: the extensive presentation by way of its divisions is as follows.

original: ha dang de bzhin yi ge au //
analyzed: ha dang de bzhin yi ge au //
translated: The syllable HA and likewise the syllable O

original: de ni yi ge ma dang gsum //
analyzed: de ni yi ge ma dang gsum //
translated: are the three syllables A and MA.

original: zhes bya ba ni tshigs su bcad pa ji lta ba bzhin du'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni tshigs su bcad pa ji lta ba bzhin du'o //
translated: This is according to the verse.

original: de ni gsum zhes bya ba ni h'um yig go //
analyzed: de ni gsum zhes bya ba ni h'um yig go //
translated: The three is the syllable HUM.

original: ji lta bu zhe na /🔽de'i phyir / rkang pa nas ni mgo bo'i bar //
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na / de'i phyir / rkang pa nas ni mgo bo'i bar //
translated: What is it like?🔽Therefore it is said:

original: zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes gsungs te /
translated: From the feet up to the head.

original: rkang pa @148b nas brtsams te mgo bo'i mthar thug par ro //
analyzed: rkang pa @148b nas brtsams te mgo bo'i mthar thug par ro //
translated: Beginning from the feet up to the end of the head.

original: 'khor lo bzhi ni don bsdus pa //
analyzed: 'khor lo bzhi ni don bsdus pa //
translated: The four wheels are the summary meaning.

original: zhes bya ni sprul pa la sogs pa'i 'khor lo bzhi po bsdus pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ni sprul pa la sogs pa'i 'khor lo bzhi po bsdus pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: This is the nature of the collection of the four wheels, such as the emanation wheel.

original: sems las ma gtogs pa'i phyi rol gyi 'khor lo bzhi po rnams ma grub pa'i phyir ro //🔽de ltar de nyid kyi rab tu dbye ba'i sgo nas rgyas par bshad pa bstan nas /
analyzed: sems las ma gtogs pa'i phyi rol gyi 'khor lo bzhi po rnams ma grub pa'i phyir ro // de ltar de nyid kyi rab tu dbye ba'i sgo nas rgyas par bshad pa bstan nas /
translated: Because the four external wheels, which are not included in the mind, are not established.🔽Thus, having taught the extensive explanation by way of its divisions,

original: so sor rgyas par bshad pa brjod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: so sor rgyas par bshad pa brjod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: in order to explain the individual extensive explanations,

original: de'i yan lag ha yig gi gnas brjod pa sngon du 'gro bas /
analyzed: de'i yan lag ha yig gi gnas brjod pa sngon du 'gro bas /
translated: the location of its branch, the letter ha, is stated first.

original: de'i che ba'i bdag nyid ni /
analyzed: de'i che ba'i bdag nyid ni /
translated: Its greatness is:

original: ha ni thur sel ming can rlung //
analyzed: ha ni thur sel ming can rlung //
translated: Ha is the wind called “downward-voiding.”

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: This is stated.

original: thur sel gyi rlung gi ngo bo yi ge'i dbyibs kyi mtshan nyid yin no //
analyzed: thur sel gyi rlung gi ngo bo yi ge'i dbyibs kyi mtshan nyid yin no //
translated: It is the nature of the downward-voiding wind, characterized by the shape of the letter.

original: bshad sgo gsang ba'i dbus na gnas //
analyzed: bshad sgo gsang ba'i dbus na gnas //
translated: The door of explanation is located in the middle of the secret.

original: zhes bya ba ni de skyes pa'i rta nyid la brten pa nyid kyi phyir dang / bshad sgo gsang ba'i bar la gnas pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de skyes pa'i rta nyid la brten pa nyid kyi phyir dang / bshad sgo gsang ba'i bar la gnas pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: This is because it is based on the horse of its arising and because it is located in the middle of the secret door of explanation.

original: de ltar ha yig gi gnas brjod pa sngon du 'gro bas de'i che ba'i bdag nyid bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar ha yig gi gnas brjod pa sngon du 'gro bas de'i che ba'i bdag nyid bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having taught the greatness of the letter ha by way of stating its location,

original: au yig gnas sngon du 'gro bas de'i che ba'i bdag nyid brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: au yig gnas sngon du 'gro bas de'i che ba'i bdag nyid brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to state the greatness of the letter u by way of stating its location,🔽[the Bhagavān] declares, the letter u is the upward-moving,

original: yi ge au ni gyen du rgyu ba'i zhes bya ba ni rgyu ba'i rlung gi ngo bor 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yi ge au ni gyen du rgyu ba'i zhes bya ba ni rgyu ba'i rlung gi ngo bor 'gyur ro //
translated: which is to say, it is of the nature of the moving wind.

original: mgrin pa'i padma'i dbus na gnas //
analyzed: mgrin pa'i padma'i dbus na gnas //
translated: It is located in the middle of the throat lotus.

original: zhes bya ba ni longs spyod kyi 'khor lo'i steng du gnas zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni longs spyod kyi 'khor lo'i steng du gnas zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is to say, it is located above the enjoyment wheel.

original: de ltar au yig gi gnas brjod pa sngon du 'gro bas /
analyzed: de ltar au yig gi gnas brjod pa sngon du 'gro bas /
translated: Thus, having stated the location of the letter u,

original: de'i che ba'i bdag nyid gsungs so //🔽ma yig gi gnas brjod pa sngon du 'gro bas /
