analyzed: bde sdug la sogs pa'i rnam pa can gyi mtshan nyid can gyi tshor ba la sogs pa'i stong pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of realizing the equality of the nature of emptiness of feeling and so on, which have the aspect of pleasure, pain, and so on.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa spros pa bdag nyid //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa spros pa bdag nyid //
translated: The Tathāgata is the nature of conceptualization.

original: ces bya ba ni rang gi rigs can gyi lhan cig spyod ma dang rjes su spyod ma'i bdag nyid can no //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni rang gi rigs can gyi lhan cig spyod ma dang rjes su spyod ma'i bdag nyid can no //
translated: Thus, it is the nature of the companions and followers of one's own type.

original: de ltar tshor ba'i phung po'i rnam par dag pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar tshor ba'i phung po'i rnam par dag pa bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the purity of the aggregate of feeling,

original: 'du shes kyi phung po rnam par dag pa bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'du shes kyi phung po rnam par dag pa bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to teach the purity of the aggregate of perception,

original: glang po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /🔽glang po zhes bya ba ni glang po che'o //
analyzed: glang po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te / glang po zhes bya ba ni glang po che'o //
translated: he says elephant, etc.🔽Elephant means an elephant.

original: bong bu zhes bya ba ni bong bu'o //
analyzed: bong bu zhes bya ba ni bong bu'o //
translated: Donkey means a donkey.

original: go ma yu zhes bya ba ni ce sbyang ngo //
analyzed: go ma yu zhes bya ba ni ce sbyang ngo //
translated: Gomyū means a hyena.

original: stag dang zhes bya ba ni sha rtu la'o //
analyzed: stag dang zhes bya ba ni sha rtu la'o //
translated: Tiger means a tiger.

original: ri dags zhes bya ba ni ae na ya la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: ri dags zhes bya ba ni ae na ya la sogs pa'o //
translated: Deer means an enaya, etc.

original: phag ces bya ba ni phag la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: phag ces bya ba ni phag la sogs pa'o //
translated: Pig means a pig, etc.

original: pha dang zhes bya ba ni skyed pa po'o //
analyzed: pha dang zhes bya ba ni skyed pa po'o //
translated: Father means the progenitor.

original: ma dang zhes bya ba ni skyed byed ma'o //🔽pha yi spun zla la sogs pa //
analyzed: ma dang zhes bya ba ni skyed byed ma'o // pha yi spun zla la sogs pa //
translated: Mother means the producer.🔽The brother of one's father, etc.

original: zhes bya ba ni de'i mched zla la sog pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de'i mched zla la sog pa'o //
translated: means his relatives, etc.

original: mdza' bo zhes bya ba ni dga' ba'o //
analyzed: mdza' bo zhes bya ba ni dga' ba'o //
translated: Friend means one who is dear.

original: snag gi gnyen mtshams zhes bye ba ni nye 'brel la sogs pa'o //🔽gang gis yang dag shes pa ni //
analyzed: snag gi gnyen mtshams zhes bye ba ni nye 'brel la sogs pa'o // gang gis yang dag shes pa ni //
translated: “Blood relatives” are close relatives and so on.

original: zhes bya ba ni rang dang 'os pa'i mtshan ma 'dzin pa'i rnam pa'i shes pas so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rang dang 'os pa'i mtshan ma 'dzin pa'i rnam pa'i shes pas so //
translated: “By whom” refers to the consciousness that apprehends the signs of self and others.

original: de zhes bya ba ni mtshan ma 'dzin pa'i rnam pa'o //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni mtshan ma 'dzin pa'i rnam pa'o //
translated: “That” refers to the apprehension of signs.

original: yang dag ces bya ba ni phyin ci ma log pa nyid kyis so //
analyzed: yang dag ces bya ba ni phyin ci ma log pa nyid kyis so //
translated: “Correctly” means without error.

original: 'du shes phung po'i mtshan nyid ni //
analyzed: 'du shes phung po'i mtshan nyid ni //
translated: The definition of the aggregate of perception

original: zhes bya ba ni thun mong ma yin pa'i de kho na nyid 'jug pa po zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni thun mong ma yin pa'i de kho na nyid 'jug pa po zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: is the one who engages in the uncommon suchness.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni de bzhin nyid du gshegs pa la'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni de bzhin nyid du gshegs pa la'o //
translated: “Tathāgata” refers to one who has gone to suchness.

original: 'od dpag med ces bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba mtha' yas kyi rnam @154b pa la'o //
analyzed: 'od dpag med ces bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba mtha' yas kyi rnam @154b pa la'o //
translated: “Amitābha” refers to the form of the tathāgata Amitābha.

original: de ni yang dag ces bya ba ni phyin ci ma log pa'i ngo bos spro bar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de ni yang dag ces bya ba ni phyin ci ma log pa'i ngo bos spro bar shes par bya'o //
translated: “That” refers to the correct form without error.

original: kun las zhes bya ba ni kun nas so //
analyzed: kun las zhes bya ba ni kun nas so //
translated: “In all” means completely.

original: gsal zhes bya ba ni snang ba mtha' yas kyi rigs can rnams spro ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gsal zhes bya ba ni snang ba mtha' yas kyi rigs can rnams spro ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The phrase clear is to inspire those who belong to the family of Amitābha.

original: 'gro la khyab par zhes bya ba ni khams gsum po la mtshan mar 'dzin pa la rang bzhin med pa nyid du so sor rtog pa'i phyir ro //🔽rmad 'byung che zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'gro la khyab par zhes bya ba ni khams gsum po la mtshan mar 'dzin pa la rang bzhin med pa nyid du so sor rtog pa'i phyir ro // rmad 'byung che zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The phrase pervading the world is because of discerning the absence of intrinsic reality in the apprehension of signs in the three realms.🔽The phrase great wonder is because of the reversal of discriminations through the power of analysis.

original: dpyod pa'i stobs kyis 'du shes kyi rnam par rtog pa bzlog pas ngo mtshar ba dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: dpyod pa'i stobs kyis 'du shes kyi rnam par rtog pa bzlog pas ngo mtshar ba dang bcas pa'o //
translated: The phrase the great wonder is because of the reversal of discriminations through the power of analysis.

original: de ltar 'du shes phung po'i rnam par dag bstan nas //
analyzed: de ltar 'du shes phung po'i rnam par dag bstan nas //
translated: Having thus taught the purity of the aggregate of discriminations,

original: 'du byed kyi phung po'i rnam par dag pa brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'du byed kyi phung po'i rnam par dag pa brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to express the purity of the aggregate of compositional factors,

original: dge dang mi dge ba'i las kyi 'bras bu zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: dge dang mi dge ba'i las kyi 'bras bu zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: he says, the result of virtuous and non-virtuous actions.

original: dge dang mi de ba'i las kyi 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: dge dang mi de ba'i las kyi 'bras bu'o //
translated: The result of virtuous and non-virtuous actions.

original: las zhes bya ba ni dge ba dang mi dge ba'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: las zhes bya ba ni dge ba dang mi dge ba'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The phrase actions refers to the nature of virtue and non-virtue.

original: gzhan yang lung ma bstan ming zhes bya ba ni lung ma bstan pa'i rang bzhin te /
analyzed: gzhan yang lung ma bstan ming zhes bya ba ni lung ma bstan pa'i rang bzhin te /
translated: Moreover, the phrase neutral name refers to the nature of the neutral.

original: gzugs dang gzugs med la sogs pa bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzugs dang gzugs med la sogs pa bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it generates the form realm, the formless realm, and so on.

original: de ni 'du byed du ni bshad //
analyzed: de ni 'du byed du ni bshad //
translated: It is explained as the formation aggregate.

original: ces bya ba ni mtshungs par ldan pa dang mtshungs par mi ldan pa la sogs pa'i dbye bas tha dad pa rnams so //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni mtshungs par ldan pa dang mtshungs par mi ldan pa la sogs pa'i dbye bas tha dad pa rnams so //
translated: The formation aggregate is differentiated by the categories of the associated and the dissociated, and so on.

original: bshad ces bya ba ni brjod pa'o //
analyzed: bshad ces bya ba ni brjod pa'o //
translated: Explained means described.

original: don yod spro ba'i rang bzhin can //🔽zhes bya ba ni bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin can te /
analyzed: don yod spro ba'i rang bzhin can // zhes bya ba ni bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin can te /
translated: It has the nature of purposeful striving.

original: nyon mongs pa'i stobs kyis dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las las ldog par byas nas gcig tu sems can rnams kyi bya ba bsgrub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i stobs kyis dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las las ldog par byas nas gcig tu sems can rnams kyi bya ba bsgrub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It has the nature of the gnosis of successful activities, because it causes sentient beings to turn away from virtuous and nonvirtuous karma through the power of the afflictions and to accomplish their goals.

original: de nyid kyi phyir don yod grub pa 'khor dang bcas pa la spro ba'i rang bzhin can no //🔽de ltar 'du shes byed kyi phung po rnam par dag pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir don yod grub pa 'khor dang bcas pa la spro ba'i rang bzhin can no // de ltar 'du shes byed kyi phung po rnam par dag pa bstan nas /
translated: For that very reason, it has the nature of purposeful striving for Amoghasiddhi and his retinue.🔽Thus, having taught the purity of the aggregate of perception,

original: rnam par shes pa'i phung po rnam par dag pa bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i phung po rnam par dag pa bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to teach the purity of the aggregate of consciousness,🔽it is said:

original: dngos dang dngos med la sogs zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: dngos dang dngos med la sogs zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: “Things and non-things, etc.”

original: dngos po ni don byed nus pa'i bdag nyid can no //
analyzed: dngos po ni don byed nus pa'i bdag nyid can no //
translated: Things are those that have the nature of being able to perform a function.

original: dngos med ni de las bzlog pa'o //
analyzed: dngos med ni de las bzlog pa'o //
translated: Non-things are the opposite of that.

original: dngos po dang dngos med ni dngos po dang dngos med dag go //
analyzed: dngos po dang dngos med ni dngos po dang dngos med dag go //
translated: Things and non-things are things and non-things.

original: de dag gi rnam par dbye ba ni /
analyzed: de dag gi rnam par dbye ba ni /
translated: Their differentiation is

original: dngos po dang dngos med kyi rnam par dbye ba'o //
analyzed: dngos po dang dngos med kyi rnam par dbye ba'o //
translated: the differentiation of things and non-things.

original: de la sogs pa gang rnams la de bzhin no ;
analyzed: de la sogs pa gang rnams la de bzhin no ;
translated: “Etc.” refers to those that are like that.

original: / de'i ngo bo'i kun du rtog pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o //
analyzed: / de'i ngo bo'i kun du rtog pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o //
translated: The conceptualization of their nature is conceptualization.

original: de 'byung ba'i bdag nyid can zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de 'byung ba'i bdag nyid can zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “Having that as its nature” means

original: de lta bu'i rnam par rtog pa skyed par byed pa'o //🔽rnam shes zhes bya ba ni rnam par dben pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
analyzed: de lta bu'i rnam par rtog pa skyed par byed pa'o // rnam shes zhes bya ba ni rnam par dben pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
translated: that which produces such conceptualization.🔽“Consciousness” has the characteristic of being isolated.🔽“Consciousness” is what is to be known.🔽The nature of the mind is the nature of the mind.

original: rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba ni shes par bya ba'o //🔽mi bskyod spro ba'i bdag @155a * //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba ni shes par bya ba'o //🔽mi bskyod spro ba'i bdag @155a * //
translated: The nature of the mind is the nature of the mind.🔽The nature of the mind is the nature of the mind.🔽The nature of the mind is the nature of the mind.🔽The nature of the mind is the nature of the mind.🔽The nature of the mind is the nature of the mind.🔽The nature of the mind is the nature of the mind.🔽The nature of the mind is the nature of the mind.🔽The nature of the mind is the nature of the mind.🔽The nature of the mind is the nature of the mind.🔽The nature of the mind is the nature of the mind.🔽The nature of the mind is the nature of the mind.🔽The nature of the mind is the nature of the mind.🔽The nature of the mind is the nature of the mind.🔽The nature of the mind is the nature of the mind.🔽The nature of the mind is the nature of the mind.🔽The nature of the mind is the nature of the mind.🔽The nature of the mind is the nature of the mind.🔽The nature of the mind is the nature of the mind.🔽The nature of the mind is the nature of the mind.🔽The nature of the mind is the nature of the mind.🔽The nature of the mind is the nature of the mind.🔽The nature of the mind is the nature of the mind.🔽The nature of the mind is the nature of the mind.🔽The nature of the mind is the nature of the mind.🔽The nature of the mind is the nature of the mind.🔽The nature of the mind is the nature of the mind.🔽The nature of the mind is the nature of the mind.🔽The nature of the mind is the nature of the mind.🔽The nature of the mind is the nature

original: nyid can // zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyis phrog par mi nus pa nyid kyis shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: nyid can // zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyis phrog par mi nus pa nyid kyis shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The word indeed is because of the nature of the wisdom of the extremely pure dharmadhatu, which cannot be stolen away by the afflictions of conceptualization.

original: de ltar rnam par shes pa'i phung po lnga rnams par dag pa nye bar bsdu pa bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de ltar rnam par shes pa'i phung po lnga rnams par dag pa nye bar bsdu pa bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Thus, in order to show the inclusion of the purification of the five aggregates of consciousness,

original: de ltar phung po yongs shes na //
analyzed: de ltar phung po yongs shes na //
translated: it is said: Thus, having fully understood the aggregates...

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te sngon du gsungs pa'i rigs pas phung po lnga rnams la sangs rgyas lnga nyid du yongs su shes pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te sngon du gsungs pa'i rigs pas phung po lnga rnams la sangs rgyas lnga nyid du yongs su shes pa'o //
translated: Having fully understood the five aggregates as the five buddhas through the reasoning stated earlier.

original: shes na zhes bya ba ni shes par bya ba'o //
analyzed: shes na zhes bya ba ni shes par bya ba'o //
translated: Having understood means having known.

original: lung dang rigs pa'i shes pa skye //
analyzed: lung dang rigs pa'i shes pa skye //
translated: The knowledge of scripture and reasoning arises.

original: zhes bya ba ni rigs pa ni sngags kyi theg par grags pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rigs pa ni sngags kyi theg par grags pa'o //
translated: Reasoning is renowned in the Mantra Vehicle.

original: lung ni bye brag smra ba'i lugs su grags pa ste /
analyzed: lung ni bye brag smra ba'i lugs su grags pa ste /
translated: Scripture is renowned in the Vaibhashika system.

original: de dag gis 'char ba ni brjod pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de dag gis 'char ba ni brjod pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Their arising is the meaning of expression.

original: de ltar phung po rnam pa lnga'i rnam par dag pa nye bar bsdu ba bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar phung po rnam pa lnga'i rnam par dag pa nye bar bsdu ba bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the summary of the fivefold purification of the aggregates,

original: spro ba'i sngags brjod pa'i phyir //
analyzed: spro ba'i sngags brjod pa'i phyir //
translated: [the Bhagavān] declares the mantra of expansion:

original: dzi na dzi ka ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: dzi na dzi ka ces bya ba ni /
translated: Jinajik means

original: rgyal ba'i ngang tshul can ni rgyal ba ste bdud rnams so //
analyzed: rgyal ba'i ngang tshul can ni rgyal ba ste bdud rnams so //
translated: the victors are the māras, who have the nature of the victors.

original: de rnams rtsibs bcu gnyis pa'i chos kyi 'khor los rgyal bar byed pas na /
analyzed: de rnams rtsibs bcu gnyis pa'i chos kyi 'khor los rgyal bar byed pas na /
translated: Since they are conquered by the wheel of Dharma with twelve spokes,

original: dzin dzik go //
analyzed: dzin dzik go //
translated: it is jinajik.

original: drang ba'i don to //
analyzed: drang ba'i don to //
translated: This is the interpretable meaning.

original: rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis bdud bzhi 'joms pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis bdud bzhi 'joms pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the vajra-like samādhi conquers the four māras,

original: dzi na dzi ka ste nges pa'i don to //
analyzed: dzi na dzi ka ste nges pa'i don to //
translated: it is jinajik. This is the definitive meaning.

original: ratna dhri ka ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: ratna dhri ka ces bya ba ni /
translated: Ratnadhṛk means

original: re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i rin po che 'dzin par byed pas na ratna dhrik go //
analyzed: re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i rin po che 'dzin par byed pas na ratna dhrik go //
translated: he holds the jewel that fulfills all wishes.

original: drang ba'i don to //
analyzed: drang ba'i don to //
translated: This is the interpretable meaning.

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' rin po che 'dzin pas na ratni dhrak ste /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' rin po che 'dzin pas na ratni dhrak ste /
translated: Because he holds the jewel of the limit of reality, it is ratnadhṛk.

original: nges pa'i don to //
analyzed: nges pa'i don to //
translated: This is the definitive meaning.

original: a'a ro li ka dang zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: a'a ro li ka dang zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Arokik means

original: a'a ni kun nas so //
analyzed: a'a ni kun nas so //
translated: ā is all around.

original: ro ni 'khor ba las so //
analyzed: ro ni 'khor ba las so //
translated: “Taste” is from samsara.

original: li ka ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: li ka ces bya ba ni /
translated: “ Lika” means

original: 'gro bas ni a'a ro li ka go //
analyzed: 'gro bas ni a'a ro li ka go //
translated: “to go.”

original: drang ba'i don to //
analyzed: drang ba'i don to //
translated: This is the interpretable meaning explanation.

original: aa ra ao zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: aa ra ao zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “ A ro li ka” means

original: ye shes gsum gyis 'od gsal du 'gro bas na a'a ro lika ste /
analyzed: ye shes gsum gyis 'od gsal du 'gro bas na a'a ro lika ste /
translated: “to go to clear light with the three exalted wisdoms.”

original: nges pa'i don to //
analyzed: nges pa'i don to //
translated: This is the definitive meaning explanation.

original: pradzny'a dhrik ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: pradzny'a dhrik ces bya ba ni /
translated: “ Prajña dhrI ka” means

original: so sor 'byed pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi shes rab 'dzin pas na pra dzny'a dhri ka go //
analyzed: so sor 'byed pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi shes rab 'dzin pas na pra dzny'a dhri ka go //
translated: “to hold the wisdom which has the characteristic of discrimination.”

original: drang ba'i don to //
analyzed: drang ba'i don to //
translated: This is the interpretable meaning explanation.

original: shes rab ni zla ba'i snang ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: shes rab ni zla ba'i snang ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: “ Wisdom” is the appearance of the moon, etc.

original: de 'dzin pas na pradznya dhri ka ste /
analyzed: de 'dzin pas na pradznya dhri ka ste /
translated: “ To hold” that is Prajña dhrI ka.

original: nges pa'i don to ;
analyzed: nges pa'i don to ;
translated: This is the definitive meaning explanation.

original: / badzra dhri ka ces bya ba ni /🔽rnam pa lngas mngon par byang chub pa mtshon par byed pas ni /
analyzed: / badzra dhri ka ces bya ba ni / rnam pa lngas mngon par byang chub pa mtshon par byed pas ni /
translated: “ Vajra dhrI ka” means

original: badzra dny'a dhrika go //
analyzed: badzra dny'a dhrika go //
translated: “to hold the vajra which is the symbol of manifest enlightenment by the five aspects.”

original: drang ba'i don to //
analyzed: drang ba'i don to //
translated: This is the interpretable meaning explanation.

original: bden pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid kyis rdo rje 'dzin par byed pas na badzra dhrika go //
analyzed: bden pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid kyis rdo rje 'dzin par byed pas na badzra dhrika go //
translated: “ Vajra holder” is the vajra holder by the nature of the two truths.

original: nges pa'i don to //
analyzed: nges pa'i don to //
translated: This is the definitive meaning explanation.

original: de ltar sngags zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa lnga po rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: de ltar sngags zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa lnga po rnams kyi'o //
translated: Thus, the so-called mantra is that of the five, Vairochana and so on.

original: @155b yid skyo ba'i don gyi spro ba'i sngags kyi rang bzhin rnams so //
analyzed: @155b yid skyo ba'i don gyi spro ba'i sngags kyi rang bzhin rnams so //
translated: The nature of the mantra is the delight of the mind, which is the meaning of the syllable hrīḥ.

original: rim bzhin zhes bya ba ni gzugs kyi phung po la sogs rnam par dag pa'i rim pas so //
analyzed: rim bzhin zhes bya ba ni gzugs kyi phung po la sogs rnam par dag pa'i rim pas so //
translated: In order means in the sequence of the purification of the aggregate of form and so on.

original: shes zhes bya ba ni shes par bya ba'o //
analyzed: shes zhes bya ba ni shes par bya ba'o //
translated: The knowledge is that which is to be known.

original: rigs pa zhes bya ba ni rags pas dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog gi dus su spro ba'i rigs pa dang bzlas pa rnam pa gnyis byed pa'i dus su rang dang mthun pa'i rigs pas so zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rigs pa zhes bya ba ni rags pas dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog gi dus su spro ba'i rigs pa dang bzlas pa rnam pa gnyis byed pa'i dus su rang dang mthun pa'i rigs pas so zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The reason is the reason for the emanation at the time of the supreme royal maṇḍala and the reason for the two kinds of repetition at the time of practice. The meaning is that it is done with the reason that is concordant with oneself.

original: de ltar don rnam pa bdun gyis phung po'i dbye ba bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar don rnam pa bdun gyis phung po'i dbye ba bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having explained the division of the aggregates with seven topics,

original: khams kyi dbye ba bstan pa'i phyir //
analyzed: khams kyi dbye ba bstan pa'i phyir //
translated: in order to explain the division of the elements,

original: de'i yan lag mdor bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de'i yan lag mdor bstan pa ni /
translated: the summary of its branches is:

original: spyan la sogs pa bzhi po gang //
analyzed: spyan la sogs pa bzhi po gang //
translated: The four, Locanā and so on,

original: zhes bya ba ni lhan cig spyod ma bzhi'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni lhan cig spyod ma bzhi'i rang bzhin no //
translated: are the nature of the four companions.

original: de ni khams su yongs su brtag /
analyzed: de ni khams su yongs su brtag /
translated: That is investigated in the elements.

original: ces bya ba ni sa la sogs pa'i khams bzhi'i ngo bo nyid kyis brtags pa'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni sa la sogs pa'i khams bzhi'i ngo bo nyid kyis brtags pa'o //
translated: This is the investigation of the nature of the four elements, earth, etc.

original: de ltar mdor bstan pa bshad na /
analyzed: de ltar mdor bstan pa bshad na /
translated: Having thus explained the brief presentation,

original: rgyas par bshad pa brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rgyas par bshad pa brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to explain the extensive presentation,

original: de'i yan lag sa'i khams kyi rnam par dag pa bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i yan lag sa'i khams kyi rnam par dag pa bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to teach the purity of the earth element, which is a part of that,

original: sra ba la sogs bzhir phye bas //🔽zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: sra ba la sogs bzhir phye bas // zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: it is divided into four, solidity, etc.

original: sra ba'i ngo bos mtshan nyid la brten nas /
analyzed: sra ba'i ngo bos mtshan nyid la brten nas /
translated: Here, solidity is the characteristic of earth.🔽Based on that, the earth element is investigated.

original: sa yi khams su yongs su brtag / ces bya ba ni rang gi lus la gnas pa'i rus pa la sogs pa sra pa'i ngo bor yongs su brtag pa'o //
analyzed: sa yi khams su yongs su brtag / ces bya ba ni rang gi lus la gnas pa'i rus pa la sogs pa sra pa'i ngo bor yongs su brtag pa'o //
translated: This is the investigation of the nature of solidity, such as bones, etc., which are located in one's own body.

original: bzhir phye bas te /
analyzed: bzhir phye bas te /
translated: It is divided into four,

original: re re yang 'byung ba bzhi'i bdag nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: re re yang 'byung ba bzhi'i bdag nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because each one has the nature of the four elements.

original: gti mug dag la mngon par brjod //
analyzed: gti mug dag la mngon par brjod //
translated: It is said to be the abode of delusion.

original: ces bya ba ni gti mug rnam par dag pa rnam par snang mdzad la dga' ba gang la yod pa de snyam du bsams nas so //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni gti mug rnam par dag pa rnam par snang mdzad la dga' ba gang la yod pa de snyam du bsams nas so //
translated: This is because it is thought that the earth element is the abode of delusion, since it is the abode of the delusion of those who are attached to the earth element.

original: de ni spyan du zhes bya ba ni sa'i khams la cha shas kyi rang bzhin med pa nyid kyi snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni spyan du zhes bya ba ni sa'i khams la cha shas kyi rang bzhin med pa nyid kyi snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: “Eye” is the appearance of the earth element, which is the nature of parts.

original: grags zhes bya ba ni yongs su grags pa nyid do //
analyzed: grags zhes bya ba ni yongs su grags pa nyid do //
translated: “Renowned” means well known.

original: de ltar sa'i khams kyi rnam par dag pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar sa'i khams kyi rnam par dag pa bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the purity of the earth element,

original: chu'i khams kyi rnam par dag pa brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: chu'i khams kyi rnam par dag pa brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to describe the purity of the water element,

original: zhu ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhu ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: [the Bhagavān] declares, “melted,” and so on.

original: zhu ba ni 'jam pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: zhu ba ni 'jam pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: “Melted” is because of the nature of softness.

original: gcin mchi khu ba sogs zhes bya ba ni gci ba dang / mig chu dang / gtso bo'i sa bon la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gcin mchi khu ba sogs zhes bya ba ni gci ba dang / mig chu dang / gtso bo'i sa bon la sogs pa'o //
translated: “Urine, tears, mucus, and so on” are feces, tears, the principal seed, and so on.

original: rdzas kyi bye brag gang rten la //
analyzed: rdzas kyi bye brag gang rten la //
translated: “Whatever substance-specific support”

original: zhes bya ba ni khrag la sogs pa'i dbye bas tha dad pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni khrag la sogs pa'i dbye bas tha dad pa'o //
translated: is the differentiation by way of blood and so on.

original: chu'i khams su rnam par shes //
analyzed: chu'i khams su rnam par shes //
translated: “Consciousness in the water element”

original: zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten pa'i rjes su 'brangs nas so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten pa'i rjes su 'brangs nas so //
translated: is [stated] in accordance with worldly convention.

original: chu'i khams su rnam par rtog pa la bdag gi de nyid yongs su zad par byed pa'i phyir m'a ma k'i ste /🔽de'i spro ba'i bdag @156a * //
analyzed: chu'i khams su rnam par rtog pa la bdag gi de nyid yongs su zad par byed pa'i phyir m'a ma k'i ste / de'i spro ba'i bdag @156a * //
translated: In the water element, the self-identity of the self is completely exhausted, because of the conceptualization of the water element.

original: nyid ni de'i rnam pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: nyid ni de'i rnam pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The self-identity of its expansion is the meaning of its aspect.

original: de ltar chu'i khams kyi rnam par dag pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar chu'i khams kyi rnam par dag pa bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having taught the purification of the water element,

original: me'i khams kyi rnam par dag pa brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: me'i khams kyi rnam par dag pa brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to describe the purification of the fire element,

original: dro ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: dro ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: it is said, “heat,” and so on.

original: rang gi lus la dro ba'i rnam pa'o //
analyzed: rang gi lus la dro ba'i rnam pa'o //
translated: The aspect of heat is in one’s own body.

original: bza' btung smin pa dang zhes bya ba ni thun mong pa'i rdzas smin pa dang / bza' ba la sogs pa nang gi'o //
analyzed: bza' btung smin pa dang zhes bya ba ni thun mong pa'i rdzas smin pa dang / bza' ba la sogs pa nang gi'o //
translated: The ripening of food and drink is the ripening of the common substance, and the inner is food and so on.

original: gzi brjid 'phrog pa'i me yi mtshan nyid can //
analyzed: gzi brjid 'phrog pa'i me yi mtshan nyid can //
translated: The characteristic of the fire that robs splendor

original: zhes bya ba ni gzi brjid 'phrog pa'i me'i mtshan nyid tsha bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gzi brjid 'phrog pa'i me'i mtshan nyid tsha bar byed pa'o //
translated: is the characteristic of the fire that robs splendor, which is the ripening of food and drink.

original: me yi khams su shes par bya //
analyzed: me yi khams su shes par bya //
translated: One should know the fire element

original: zhes bya ba ni me'i khams zhes 'jig rten pa la grags pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni me'i khams zhes 'jig rten pa la grags pa'o //
translated: as the fire element that is renowned in the world.

original: gos dkar spro pa'i bdag nyid can ;
analyzed: gos dkar spro pa'i bdag nyid can ;
translated: The self-identity of the expansion of Pāṇḍaravāsinī

original: / zhes bya ba ni me'i khams su rtog pa mi snang bar byed pa'i phyir gos dkar mo'o //
analyzed: / zhes bya ba ni me'i khams su rtog pa mi snang bar byed pa'i phyir gos dkar mo'o //
translated: This is Pāṇḍarā, because she makes the conception of the fire element disappear.

original: spro ba'i bdag nyid can zhes bya ba ni de ltar rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: spro ba'i bdag nyid can zhes bya ba ni de ltar rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: She is of the nature of expansion means that she is of the nature of such purification.

original: de ltar me'i khams kyi rnam par dag pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar me'i khams kyi rnam par dag pa bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the purification of the fire element,

original: rlung gi khams kyi rnam par dag pa brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rlung gi khams kyi rnam par dag pa brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to express the purification of the wind element,🔽he says,

original: 'byung dang rngub pa rab tu 'phel //
analyzed: 'byung dang rngub pa rab tu 'phel //
translated: The increase of exhalation and inhalation,

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te rang gi lus la srog dang thur sel rab tu 'jug pa'o /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te rang gi lus la srog dang thur sel rab tu 'jug pa'o /
translated: means the entry of life and downward-voiding winds into one's body.

original: rlung rnams kyi ni dam tshig mchog / ces bya ba ni phung po'i rlung dang dbang po'i rlung rnams kyi bcu'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: rlung rnams kyi ni dam tshig mchog / ces bya ba ni phung po'i rlung dang dbang po'i rlung rnams kyi bcu'i bdag nyid do //
translated: The supreme commitment of the winds means the tenfold nature of the aggregate winds and sense-organ winds.

original: dam tshig ces bya ba ni rang dang 'os pa'i bya ba'o //
analyzed: dam tshig ces bya ba ni rang dang 'os pa'i bya ba'o //
translated: Commitment means one's own proper activity.

original: mchog ces bya ba ni phung po la sogs pa 'dzin pa la bdag nyid can gyi phyir mchog go //
analyzed: mchog ces bya ba ni phung po la sogs pa 'dzin pa la bdag nyid can gyi phyir mchog go //
translated: Supreme means supreme because of the nature of holding the aggregates and so forth.

original: brkyang ba dang brkum pa'i bdag nyid can no //
analyzed: brkyang ba dang brkum pa'i bdag nyid can no //
translated: It has the nature of stretching and contracting.

original: 'og dang steng du byed pa dang ni zhes bya ba ni steng dang 'og tu 'byung ba dang 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: 'og dang steng du byed pa dang ni zhes bya ba ni steng dang 'og tu 'byung ba dang 'jug pa'o //
translated: It functions above and below means it arises and enters above and below.

original: de ni rlung gi khams su shes //
analyzed: de ni rlung gi khams su shes //
translated: That is known as the wind element.

original: zhes bya ba ni de'i ming ni grags pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de'i ming ni grags pa'o //
translated: This is its well-known name.

original: sgrol ma spro ba'i bdag nyid can //
analyzed: sgrol ma spro ba'i bdag nyid can //
translated: It has the nature of liberating Tārā.

original: zhes bya ba ni rlung gi khams kyi rnam par rtog pa las sgrol bar byed pa nas sgrol ma'i rang bzhin zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rlung gi khams kyi rnam par rtog pa las sgrol bar byed pa nas sgrol ma'i rang bzhin zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it has the nature of liberating from the conception of the wind element.

original: de ltar rlung gi khams kyi rnam par dag pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar rlung gi khams kyi rnam par dag pa bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the purity of the wind element,

original: khams bzhi po nye bar bsdu pa'i phyir /
analyzed: khams bzhi po nye bar bsdu pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to summarize the four elements,

original: de ltar 'byung ba bzhi po yang //
analyzed: de ltar 'byung ba bzhi po yang //
translated: it is said, “Thus, the four elements are also…”

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te de ltar sngon du gsungs pa'i rigs pas so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te de ltar sngon du gsungs pa'i rigs pas so //
translated: Thus means by the reasoning stated previously.

original: 'byung ba bzhi po yang zhes bya ba ni 'byung ba chen po bzhi po'o //
analyzed: 'byung ba bzhi po yang zhes bya ba ni 'byung ba chen po bzhi po'o //
translated: The four elements are also means the four great elements.

original: rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba ni shes par bya ba'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba ni shes par bya ba'o //
translated: Consciousness is what is to be known.

original: rnal 'byor zhes bya ba ni spyan ma la sogs pa lha mo bzhi'i rnal 'byor gyis so //
analyzed: rnal 'byor zhes bya ba ni spyan ma la sogs pa lha mo bzhi'i rnal 'byor gyis so //
translated: Yoga means by the yoga of the four goddesses such as Locanā.

original: mchog nyid ces bya ba ni lha mo'i rang bzhin nyid kyi mchog go //
analyzed: mchog nyid ces bya ba ni lha mo'i rang bzhin nyid kyi mchog go //
translated: Supreme means the supreme nature of the goddesses.

original: de ltar khams bzhi @156b po nye bar bsdu ba bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar khams bzhi @156b po nye bar bsdu ba bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having explained the summary of the four elements,

original: spro pa'i sngags brjod pa bshad pa'i phyir /
analyzed: spro pa'i sngags brjod pa bshad pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to explain the mantra recitation of emanation,

original: mo kha ra ti zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: mo kha ra ti zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: he says moharati, etc.

original: mo har ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
analyzed: mo har ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
translated: Mohar is Vairocana.🔽Rati is Rati, the nature of Locanā.

original: de la dga' ba gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de la dga' ba gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: Moharati is the one who delights in that.

original: drang pa'i don to //
analyzed: drang pa'i don to //
translated: This is the interpretable meaning explanation.
